GSP29nystik_u:3: viśvavyāpī viśvaśaktiḥ pinākī viśveśāno viśvakṛd viśvamūrttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:14: kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadarthaṃ vārttikārambha iti śaṅkāṃ nirācikīrṣuḥ sūtrākāroktāśāstraprayojanānuvādapūrvakaṃ vārttikārambhaprayojanaṃ darśayati-yadakṣapāda iti //
GSP29nystik_u:17: na tattvanirṇayāya paryāptamiti uddyotakareṇa svanibandhoddyotena tadapanīyata iti
GSP29nystik_u:19: sūtroktaprayojanānuvādaśca prayojanavacchāstravyutpādanena svanibandhasya prayojanavattāṃ prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgaṃ darśayitum,
GSP29nystik_u:21: atra caikaviśatiprabhedabhinnasya duḥkhasyātyantikī nivṛttiḥ śamaḥ, tasmai /
GSP29nystik_u:23: paramakārūṇiko hi bhagavān muniḥ jagadeva duḥkhapaṅkamagnāmuddidhīrṣuḥ śāstraṃ praṇītavān /
GSP29nystik_u:29: tapaḥprabhāva eva hi tāddaśasteṣāṃ yata evaṃvidhāḥ pāpmāno vilīyanta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:31: na hi gajānāmudaryaṃ tejo vaṭakāṣṭhamaśitaṃ pacatītyasmadādīnāmapyudaryeṇa tejasā tathā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:33: avigītaśiṣṭācāraparamparaprāptaḥ paramaśiṣṭena vārttikakāreṇa kṛto 'pīṣṭadevatānamaskāro na śāstre niveśitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:36: tatra saṃkṣepataḥ prathamasūtramanūdya tasya tātparyamāha--pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñānānniḥ- śreyasādhigama ityetacchāstrasyādisūtram /
GSP29nystik_u:38: ādigrahaṇena kramaprāptasyaiva prathamaṃ vyākhyānaṃ yuktam na dvitīyāderiti darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:42: pramāṇādipadārthatatvajñānādityatra hi jñāyate 'neneti jñānamiti vyutpatyā tatvajñānaṃ śāstramucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:44: na hi viṣaghnamantravat svarūpamātreṇa tadavivakṣitārthaṃ niḥśreyasaheturiti padārthatatvāvagamakaraṇatayā śāstramapadiśati,
GSP29nystik_u:46: tena śāstrasya niḥśreyase kartavye pramāṇāditatvāvagamo 'vāntaravyāpāra itayuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:48: pratipādakaṃ ca śāstramiti śāstrapramāṇādipadārthatatvayorjñāpyajñāpakabhāvaśca pramāṇādipadārthatatvajñānaniḥśreyasayoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvalakṣaṇaśca saṃbandhaḥ sūcito bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:50: patpadārthatattvajñānasya ca yathā niḥśreyasādhigamaṃ pratyupayogaḥ tathāgre nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:58: tasya śāstrasya niḥśreyasādhigamena saha sūtreṇa ghaṭitasya /
GSP29nystik_u:59: kutaścinnimittād vighaṭanaśaṅkāyām anu sūtraghaṭanāyāḥ paścāt sandhasanaṃ ghaṭanam anusandhānam,
GSP29nystik_u:64: tathā hi prameyādīnāṃ tāvatpadārthānāṃ tattvajñānaṃ pramāṇatattvajñānādhīnam /
GSP29nystik_u:65: na hi pramāṇaṃ tattvenānavadhāritaṃ bodhakatvamātraṇa svagocarāvadhāraṇāyālaṃ tāvanmātrasya tadābhāsasādhāraṇyāt,
GSP29nystik_u:70: tathā hi vijñānasca tāvatprāmāṇyaṃ svato vā niścīyate, parato vā?
GSP29nystik_u:77: jñānatvamātraṃ ca tadābhāsasādhāraṇamiti na svataḥ prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:83: tacca sarvaṃ svato 'navadhāritaprāmāṇyamākulaṃ sat kathaṃ pūrvaṃ pravartakaṃ jñānamanākulayet?
GSP29nystik_u:84: svato vāsya prāmāṇye kimaparāddhaṃ pravatākajñānena yena tasminnapi tanna syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:85: na ca prāmāṇyaṃ jñāyate svataḥ ityāveditam /
GSP29nystik_u:86: yadā ca saṃvedanaprāmāṇyamaktena krameṇa duradhigamaṃ tadā kaiva kathendriyādīnāmavyabhicārisaṃvedanakāryavyaṅgyapramāṇabhāvānām?
GSP29nystik_u:87: tadeva dṛṣṭārthāḥ pramāṇabhṛtāṃ vyavahārā bhavantu sandehādapi yathātathā,
GSP29nystik_u:90: tasmāt pramāṇādipadārthatattvajñāpanadvāreṇa na śāstraṃ niḥśreyasena saṃbadhyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:107: śāstreṇa tu te nābhidhīyanta iti na niḥśreyasena saṃgatiḥ śāstrasyetvata āha--śāstrasya puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:109: tathāpi sopāyaiva sā atra śreyaḥśabdena vivakṣitā,
GSP29nystik_u:112: śāstraṃ tāvadetat puruṣaśreyaḥ sahopāyenābhidhatta ityanubhavasiddha sadaśakyānuṣṭhānatayāpavaditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:113: sā cedaśakyānuṣṭhānatāpanītā pramāṇata ityādinā saṃhitaṃ niḥśreyasena saha śāstramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:114: śāstrasyetyādi grahaṇakavākyaṃ vivṛṇoti--śāstraṃ punarityādinā upabhogāt prakṣayeṇetyantena /
GSP29nystik_u:121: evaṃ ca kvacit kenacidarthenaikena sūtravākyānāmekavākyatvaṃ samūhaḥ prakaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:125: tadevaṃ śāstrasvarūpaṃ darṃśayitvā nāntareṇa tadarthakathanaṃ puruṣaśreyo 'bhidhāyakatvamasrū sidhyitīti tadarthaṃ kathayati-- tatpadārthā iti
GSP29nystik_u:126: nanu pramāṇādīnāṃ pratinaramānantyena durjñānatvamiti tadavasthamevānarthakyaṃ śāstrasya prasaktamityata āha -- ṣoḍaśātmānaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:127: ātmā svabhāvaḥ pramāṇādīnāṃ pramāṇatvādisāmānyaviśeṣa iti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:129: āntargaṇikabhedādānantye 'pi svasāmānyaviśeṣaiḥ saṃgṛhītā na durjñānā iti yato 'sya padārthāḥ pramāṇādayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:135: prāmāṇikatve vā pramāṇādeva tatsiddheḥ śāstrasya vaiyarthyamityata āha--pratyakṣeti /
GSP29nystik_u:139: yadyapi prameyamātmādyapavargāntalakṣaṇamāgamikaṃ tathāpyāgamasyāptapraṇetṛkatayā tatrāpi mūlabhūtamanumānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vāstīti pratyakṣānumāne eva darśite /
GSP29nystik_u:140: nanūktaṃ prāmāṇikatve śāstravaiyarthyamityata āha-- tasya viṣaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:141: vyavaharamāṇā api pramāṇairlaukikā vainayikabuddhivirahiṇo naitān padārthān viviñcate /
GSP29nystik_u:142: aviviktāścete na niḥśreyasāya kalpanta iti anadhigatetyaṅktam /
GSP29nystik_u:145: tatra vivakṣitaṃ puruṣaviśeṣaṃ grahītuṃ saṃbhavinaḥ puruṣaprakārān darśayati--puruṣaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:150: vipratipannasya tu sākṣiṇāṃ purato jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ viṣyamāṇasya vigalite 'haṅkāre sandigdhasya sa/
GSP29nystik_u:152: apratipannasyāpi kenacit prakāreṇa sandehamāpādya sāpekṣīkṛtasya pratipādyatā /
GSP29nystik_u:154: asandigdho 'pi tattvapratipādanāya kārūṇikena sandigadhaḥ kṛtvā pratipādyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:156: tathā ca pramātaṇāṃ na pramāṇāntare pravṛttiḥ syādityata āha-- te yadeti /
GSP29nystik_u:166: ihābhimataṃ śreyo nirdhārayituṃ śreyomātrapramārān āha--śreyaḥ punaḥ sukhamahitanivṛttiśca /
GSP29nystik_u:169: na vyāsajya kiṃ tu pratyekamityāha-- dṛṣṭaṃ sukha strakcandanavanitādibhogajanma /
GSP29nystik_u:171: evaṃ ca duḥkhanivṛttirapi śreyo dṛṣṭāmadṛṣṭaṃ ceti yojanīyaṃ cakāralopāt /
GSP29nystik_u:182: yadyapi viṣayaḥ śarīramapi tathāpyanyathāsya duḥkhahetubhāva ityāha śarīramiti śarīrāvacchinna ātmapradeśo duḥkhāyatanamiti śarīraṃ duḥkhāyatanamuktam
GSP29nystik_u:188: sādhanapāratantyaṃ kṣayitvaṃ kāma iti duḥkhahetavaḥ sakalasukhānasaṅginaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:194: prasaṃkhyānaparipākaprabhāvāt paritastattadupabhogabhāginaḥ kāyān nirmāya tatttphalopabhāgāt prakṣiṇoti /
GSP29nystik_u:197: ko hi yogaprabhāvādṛte agastya ica samudraṃ pibati,
GSP29nystik_u:205: iyaṃ tu duḥkhavat sukhasyāpyātyantikī nivṛttiriti kathaṃ śreyaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:206: kathaṃ ca prekṣāvatpravṛttyaṅgamityata āha--puruṣā rāgādimanta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:208: te hi madhuviṣasaṃpṛktamapyannaṃ madhuratayā āpātaramaṇīyaṃ viṣaviṅgattu mārayatu mā va mīmaradupayu/
GSP29nystik_u:210: ko hi hastagataṃ pādagataṃ karotīti vicintyopabhu/jate /
GSP29nystik_u:220: tadanena prapañcena pramāṇato 'rthapratipattavityādivākyasya tātparyamabhidhāya tadavayavaṃ pravṛttisāmarthyāditi vivarītuṃ bhūmimāracayati--pravṛtterapīti
GSP29nystik_u:223: na hi tatpravṛtterniḥ- śreyasādhgimalakṣaṇaphalasaṃbandho dṛṣṭo niḥśreyasasyālaukikatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:225: pramāṇamanarthakamiti hi vipratiṣiddhamityata āha-- pramāṇaṃ tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:228: na cāpramāṇe pramāṇābhimāno vinā pramāṇādisādharmyāditi tatsādharmyaṃ pṛcchati--kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:233: kevalamekasminnava viṣaye rajatasamāropāpavādābhyāṃ buddhacorvādhakabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:237: tathā ca samarthā pravṛttiranarthavadvacatirekasaṃpannapramāṇasyārthavattve heturityāha--tasyāḥ samarthāyāḥ pravṛtterhetoḥ punaḥ pramāṇasyārthavattvamarthāvyabhicāritvam
GSP29nystik_u:245: api tu tadarthajātīyasya śreyohetutāmasakṛdupalabhya saṃpratyupalabhyamānasyārthasya tajjātīyatayā śreyohetubhāvānumānasahito viniścayaḥ pravṛttihetuḥ
GSP29nystik_u:248: prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇaṃ ca śreyohetutānumānanimittavyāptigrahaṇaṃ ca na samarthāṃ pravṛttiṃ vinā,
GSP29nystik_u:249: na ca samarthā pravṛttistābhyāṃ vivaneti parasparāśrayatā /
GSP29nystik_u:251: cadi pūrvaṃ pramāṇato 'rthapratipattiḥ rviniścitirapekṣitopayatānumānasahitā pravṛttisamārthyamantareṇa kimiti pratipadyate niścinoti apekṣitopāya eveti ca toyameveti ceti?
GSP29nystik_u:260: no khalūpāyatāvinaścayenāpi pravartamānā na anāgataphale sandihate /
GSP29nystik_u:261: tadamī saṃdihānā api pravartamānāḥ pravṛttisamārthyāt pramāṇasya tattvaṃ viniścatya
GSP29nystik_u:267: tasya yādṛśatādṛśasyāpīṣṭatvādiṣṭalakṣaṇatvācca phalasya tatsādhanatvaṃ te parīkṣante /
GSP29nystik_u:278: na ca saṃpratitanasya phalajñānasya prāmāṇyāvadhāraṇāyedānīmeva pūrvasya phalajñānasya tajjātīyatvena pramāṇyāvadhāraṇe satyanavastheti /
GSP29nystik_u:283: eteṣu ca madhye yatphalajñānaṃ svapnādyupabhogatulyatayā śaṅkitavyabhicāraṃ tadanabhyāsadaśāpannam /
GSP29nystik_u:285: anumānasya tu pravṛttisāmarthyaliṅgajanmano 'nyasya vā nirastasamastavyabhicāraśaṅkasya svata eva prāmāṇyamanumeyāvyabhicāriliṅgasamutthatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:286: na hi liṅgākāra jñānaṃ liṅgaṃ vinā,
GSP29nystik_u:287: na ca liṅgaṃ liṅginaṃ vineti svata eva gṛhītāvyabhicāliṅgasamutthaṃ niṣkampamupapadyate jñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:290: na ca kāraṇāntarāṇyapīndriyādīni asyārthena gṛhītāvyabhicārāṇi na cārthenāvyabhicārāṇi /
GSP29nystik_u:294: kiṃ tu saṅketagrahaṇamātrāt padārthapratyāyanena vākyārthamadhigamayati śabdaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:297: jñānagatatajjātīyatvaliṅgagrāhiṇaśca jñānasya mānasapratyakṣasya tādṛśasyādṛṣṭavyabhicāratayā parito nirastasamastavibhramāśaṅkasya svataḥ prāmāṇyamiti nānavasthā /
GSP29nystik_u:309: utpannamātrakasya hi bālakasya stanaṃ dṛṣṭvā prāgbhavīyastajjātīyāpekṣitānubhavajanitaḥ saṃskāra āvirasti /
GSP29nystik_u:314: evaṃ pūrvasmin pūrvasmin janmanītyanāditayā na bījāṅkuravat parasparāpekṣiteti /
GSP29nystik_u:318: tadanenoktena krameṇa pramāṇato 'rthapratipatāvityasya śāstrānusandhānavākyatva tātparyaṃ ca samāhitam /
GSP29nystik_u:327: tathā ca niḥśreyasaṃ pratyantaraṅgatvāt pramāṇānnyāyāt pravṛttireva balīyasī, na nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:328: tasmāt pravṛttireva vyutpādanīyā na pramāṇaṃ niḥśreyasaheturapi pravṛtterantaraṅgatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:329: tatredabhupatiṣṭhate pramāṇato 'rthapratipattau satyā pravṛtteḥ samārthyaṃ phalenābhisaṃbandho,
GSP29nystik_u:336: tathāpi pramāṇavyutpādanena pravṛttirapi vyutpāditā bhavatīti pramāṇasya vyutpādanamakāri śāstreṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:342: yathā hi pramāṇapratipattyupāyaṃ pratyācakṣāṇaka evaṃ praṣṭāvyo jāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:352: anyathā nāsi laukiko na parīkṣaka ityunmattavadupekṣaṇīyaḥ syā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:354: pravṛttisāmarthyāvat pramāṇa yato 'taḥ sarvaḥ pramātā pramāṇenāvagatārthavattvenārthamavadhārya
GSP29nystik_u:358: artho 'rthaśabdaḥ pramāṇato 'rthapratipattāvityatra sthitaḥ padaṃ vāyakaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:364: atra ca heyahānādhigantavyapadaiḥ pramāṇaprameyayorūpādānād gobalīvardanyāyena saṃśayādiṣu nigrahasthānānteṣu śāstrapadaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:369: tatra heyādicaturvarge cāryamāṇatayārthapadasūcite pramāṇādicaturvarge ca pramāṇasya prādhānyapradarśanārthamidaṃ bhāṣyam /
GSP29nystik_u:380: tadetasmāt prādhānyād vivakṣābhedena trivargadvayāt prāguddeśaḥ pramāṇasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:381: etena yadāhureke yadi prādhānyāt prāthamyaṃ tat prameyasyaiva,
GSP29nystik_u:389: pramāṇādicaturvargastu kathaṃ pradarśita iti pṛcchati--kathaṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:391: tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ vyākhyāyāvayavārthaṃ vyākhyātumupakramate--tadidaṃ vākyāmavayavaśa upanyasya varṇyate vyākhyāyate 'vayavaśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:392: tatrāsyāvayaveṣu vyākhyātavyeṣu prāthamyāt pramāṇata iti vivṛṇoti--tatreti /
GSP29nystik_u:394: nimittapañcamī cet kasmāt pramāṇāditi nābhihitamityata āha-- asyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:403: yatra dvayorbahūnāṃ vā saṃpalvaḥ pramāṇānāṃ tatraikaikasyāpyasti pratipattisādhanatvaṃ pramāṇasyeti kathayituṃ saṃplavāvasare 'pi pramāṇenetyaṅktam
GSP29nystik_u:409: kasmāt punaḥ karaṇārtho gamyata ityata āha--pramāṇeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:411: atra ca karaṇabhāvanāntarīyakasya hetubhāvasya pañcamya abhidhānaṃ pramāṇaphalayostādātmyapratiṣedhārtham,
GSP29nystik_u:414: pramāṇaprātipadikalabdhakaraṇatvānuvādaśca pramākārakāntarebhyo 'bhyarhitatvenāsya vyutpādyatvaṃ ca prāthamyaṃ ca yuktamiti darśayituṃ saṃplavamākṣipati--saṃplaveti
GSP29nystik_u:417: viśiṣṭo bhinno viṣayo yeṣāṃ tāni tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:432: tadidamanādivāsanodbhūtavikalpadhiṣṭhānaṃ vikalpākārasya vā alīkasya vā bāhyatvamanumānagācaro 'bhyupeyam /
GSP29nystik_u:436: tad vijñānādau bhāve śaśaviṣāṇādau cābhāve sādhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:437: bhāvābhāvasādhāraṇaśca vikalpagocaro 'sti ghaṭo nāsti ghaṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:438: yadi punarasādhāraṇo bhāvo bhaved astiśabdo na prayujyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:442: na cālīkasya sarvasāmarthyavirahiṇaḥ paramārthasattā svalakṣaṇena sādṛśyaṃ manyate 'nyavyāvṛteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:443: na ca gauriti niyatau buddhivyapadeśau vināścādivyāvṛttim /
GSP29nystik_u:444: tasmāt sāmānyamanyavyāvṛttirūpamabāhyaṃ bāhyabhedāgrahād bāhyatvenāvagāhyamānamanumānaṃ bāhyo pravartayati /
GSP29nystik_u:445: pāramparyeṇa ca bāhyapratibandhād bāhyaṃ prāpayat saṃvādakaṃ sad bhrāntamapi pramātrāśayavaśāt pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:451: na ca sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāmanyadasti prameyāntaraṃ yatraite tat saṃploṣyete ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:453: yathā caitat tathā tatra tatra nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:461: nāsti vaiyarthyamadhigatīnāmāśutaravināśitayā tadgocarādhigatyantarotpādaṃ prati pramāṇāntarasyārthavattvādityata āha--adhigataṃ cārthamadhigamayatā pramāṇeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:463: tathāpyekatarapramāṇajanitārthādhigalibdhajanmanaḥ saṃskārādeva sthāyinastadarthasmṛtisantatisaṃbhāvād adhigamarthamadhigamayatā pramāṇena piṣṭaṃ piṣṭaṃ syāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:470: nāpi svakāraṇabalalabdhajanmāni pramāṇāni dirśito 'yamartho 'nyatamena cāsmāsu pramāṇena,
GSP29nystik_u:478: cattu pramāṇaṃ pramitsādhīnapravṛtti tadyadi pramātā na vyāpārayet kimāyātaṃ pramāṇasya?
GSP29nystik_u:479: na hi toyamapi pipāsunā na pīyata iti tasya pipāsopaśamanaśaktirapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:482: sa eva cānena sāmagrībhedaḥ pradarśitaḥ anyathā pratyakṣeṇetyādinā /
GSP29nystik_u:485: yadi ca dravyaṃ tvacā gṛhītamiti kṛtaṃ cakṣuṣā,
GSP29nystik_u:489: tathā ca saṃplavavaiyarthye 'pi vyavasthāyāṃ na vaiyarthyamityāha--viṣayāntara iti /
GSP29nystik_u:512: jñāpakatvena kāryatvena vā kathañcidarthasaṃbandhe saṃskārasyāpi tat samānamiti tasyāpi smṛtirūpopalabdhihetoḥ prāmāṇyaṃ prasaktam /
GSP29nystik_u:514: pramāsādhanaṃ hi pramāṇam na ca smṛtiḥ pramā /
GSP29nystik_u:517: tasmāt taddhetuḥ pramāṇamiti na smṛtihetau prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:518: anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ ca dhārāvāhikavijñānānāmadhigatārthagocarāṇāṃ lokaprasiddhapramāṇabhāvānāṃ pramāṇyaṃ vihantīti nādriyamahe /
GSP29nystik_u:521: na cādyenaiva vijñānenopadarśitatvādarthasya pravartitatvāt puruṣasya prāptitvāccottateṣām,
GSP29nystik_u:526: pradarśana ca pūrvavaduttareṣāṃ vijñānāmabhinnamiti kathaṃ pūrvameva vijñānaṃ pramāṇa nottarāṇyapi?
GSP29nystik_u:528: na cātidavīstayā tadarthasya heyatayā tadapi puruṣasyāpekṣitam,
GSP29nystik_u:531: upalabdhihetuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ vadatā anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ cārthasārūpyaṃ cātmānātmaprakāśanaśaktiśca pramāṇamiti nirastāni bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:533: upalabdhihetuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ vadatā anadhigatārthagantṛtvaṃ cārthasārūpyaṃ cātmānātmaprakāśanaśaktiśca pramāṇamiti nirastāni bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:543: sarvaḥ karttā karaṇagocaravyāpāro na tu sākṣāt phale vyāpriyate /
GSP29nystik_u:545: tatra siddhaṃ paraśvādi dārūdvaidhībhāvāyodyamyodyamya dārūṇi nipātayan dārū cchinattītyucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:547: kiṃ tu sparśavadvegavataḥ karaṇībhūtasya paraśoḥ saṃyogasyodyamananipātanalakṣaṇastu kartṛvyāpāraḥ paraśugocara eva /
GSP29nystik_u:548: evaṃ svargakāmo 'pi kartā na sākṣāt svarge vyāpriyate,
GSP29nystik_u:552: asiddhaṃ ca tatsannikarṣādi vyāpārayannutpādayan vā karaṇa eva caritārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:553: karaṇaṃ tvindriyādi tatsannikarṣādi vā nānyatra cāritārthamiti sākṣādupalabdhāveva phale vyāpriyate /
GSP29nystik_u:556: indriyameva tu tattatsannikarṣādi vā sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:557: tataḥ siddhametat na pramātā sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ kartṛtvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:558: yo yaḥ kartā sa sarvo na sākṣāt phalahetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:562: tathā pratyakṣaṃ prameyaṃ na sākṣāt pramāhetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:564: yad yat prameyaṃ vattat sarvaṃ na pramāheturanumeyādivat /
GSP29nystik_u:567: tadidaṃ pramātṛprameyayoḥ pramāṇe caritārthatvamacaritārthatvaṃ ca pramāṇasya,
GSP29nystik_u:569: pramātṛprameye tu phaloddeśena pravṛtte iti taddhetū kathañciditi /
GSP29nystik_u:574: yadā jñānaṃ pramāṇa tadā jñānasya pramāṇasyotvattāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:584: astu tarhi tadīyo 'vāntaravyāpāraḥ pradhānakriyāyāṃ sādhyāyāṃ kārakam,
GSP29nystik_u:585: tasyāpi pradhānakriyāyāṃ nimittatvādityata āha--na ca kriyāmātramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:588: kva tarhi kārakaśabdaḥ pravartata ityata āha--kārakaśabdo hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:590: dvaidhībhāve hi phale pradhānavyāpāre kartuḥ karaṇagocara udyamananipātanādiḥ avāntaravyāpāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:593: tasmādavāntarapradhānavyāpārasaṃpannaṃ kārakamiti sāmānyataḥ prasādhya prakṛte yojayati--pramātṛprameyaśabdau ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:602: tat kasya hetorapacatyapi pākasaṃbandhaṃ pratyasti svarūpśaktirdevadattādāviti?
GSP29nystik_u:603: dvayī hi śaktiḥ kārakāṇāṃ kāryopajananaṃ prati svarūpaṃ ca sahakārigrāmasamavadhānaṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:605: satyapi ca svarūpe trekālyavyāpini trekālyayogikāryāsaṃbhave 'pravṛtteḥ traikālyayogikāryopahitamaryādameva svarūpaṃ kārakaśabdānāṃ pravṛtau nimittamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:606: asatyapi pratyutpannapramāhetupramāṇasaṃbandhe pramātṛprameyaśabdayoḥ pravṛttiriti upapannaṃ pramātṛprameyābhyāṃ pramāṇa janyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:610: sādhākatamāsādhakatamayoḥ sādhakatame kāryasaṃpratyayāt sātiśayatvenodbhūtattvāt tasyetyāha--sādhakatamatvād veti /
GSP29nystik_u:612: uttaram--pramāṇasya bhāvābhāvayoḥ pramāyāḥ kāryasya tadvattā bhāvābhāvavattā sādhakatamārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:614: na tu pramātṛprameyānvayavyatirekānuvidhānamapyasti pramāyā anvayavyatirekayorityata āha--na pramātarīti /
GSP29nystik_u:617: pramātṛprameye hi pramāṇopakṣīṇavṛttinī na pramāyāṃ vyāpriyete /
GSP29nystik_u:619: pramāṇasya vyāpāre tu pramā bhavatyeveti kalpāntaramāha- yadvān vā pramimīte so 'tiśayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:620: pramimīta iti svatantraṃ kartāraṃ daśayati pratipādyāt karaṇād vyavacchettum /
GSP29nystik_u:627: pramātā prameyavānapi kvacid bhavet tattantratvāt prameyasya /
GSP29nystik_u:641: tacca siddhamasiddha vā pramātṛprameyavyāpārasya paścādeva tathātvena saṃpadyata iti caramabhāvītyucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:643: tathā tantūnāṃ paṭe janayitavye 'ntyāḥ saṃyogabhedā yadanantaraṃ paṭa utpadyata eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:646: ata eva tadanantaraṃ pratipatteḥ pramāyā bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:655: na ca prameyamekasyāpi prameyasya saṃplave sarvapratipattisādhāraṇyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:656: pramāṇāni tu yathāyathaṃ catasṛṣvapi pramitiṣvasādhāraṇānīti bhinnabuddhivyapadeśanibandhanāni /
GSP29nystik_u:662: nāsau pramātrā prameyeṇa vā śakyo viśeṣṭum,
GSP29nystik_u:665: eve sukhādiprameyāṇāmapi mana evāsādhāraṇaṃ vyavacchedaṅka draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:669: kasmāt punarniṣidhyate pramāṇaviṣayā pratipattirityata āha--yato na pramāṇaviṣayeti /
GSP29nystik_u:681: samarthapravṛttijanikā hi pratipattirnāpramāṇādbhāvatītyarthādeva pramāṇāditi gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:688: arthapratipattistu pramāṇakāryeti samarthā pravṛttiḥ pramāṇakāryā satī pramāṇasyārthavattvamanumāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:690: anyathā pramāṇamarthavadarthapratipatteḥ masarthapravṛttijanakatvāditi kiṃ kena saṃgatam?
GSP29nystik_u:693: sa evārtho yasya pramāṇagrahaṇasya tat tathoktam /
GSP29nystik_u:695: tasmādetaduktaṃ bhavati--pramāṇakāryāyā arthaprapitteḥ pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ na tadābhāsakāryāyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:697: tadidamuktam--tad yeha pramāṇena pratipattiḥ sā pravṛttisāmarthyaṃ pratipādayati pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:700: pravṛttisamārthyaṃ pratipadyamānaṃ prāpnuvattat pratipādayati prāpayati pramāṇakāryārthapratipattiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:701: idamapi pramāṇagrahaṇasya prayojanamityāha-- na ca pramāṇagrahaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:705: sarvasya sukhaduḥkhataddhetutvena heyapakṣanikṣepāt upādeyānāṃ pramāṇaśāstrāpavargāṇānāmabhāvaprasaṅgād vyāghātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:713: na caitanniḥśreyasahetuṃ śāstraṃ praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya tadanuvartino vā bhāṣyakārasya vivikṣitamityāha--na ca pramāṇādihānaṃ vivakṣitam /
GSP29nystik_u:718: na kevalaṃ vyāghātāśakyahānāvivakṣitatvairarthapadena na sarvasaṃgraho 'śakyatvādapi na sarvasaṃgraha ityāha--na saṃvida iti /
GSP29nystik_u:719: sukhaduḥkhataddhetutayā na saṃvido grahaṇaṃ saṃgrahaḥ sarvamadhyapatitāyā api /
GSP29nystik_u:723: na tāvat sarvā eva saṃvidaḥ saṃvidgocarā manoyonayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:729: na ca sukhaduḥkhe tatreturiti na sarvasaṃgrahaḥ saṃvido 'saṃgrahādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:730: tadevamādivākya vyākhyāya bhāṣyavākyāntaramavatārya tatraikaderśivyākhyānaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati--so 'yaṃ pramāṇārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:734: prāṇabhṛdbhedasyāparisaṃkhyeyatvāditi ca hetuḥ śvetaḥ prāsādaḥ kākasya kārṣṇyāditivanna pratijñārthena saṅgacchate ityāha--prāṇabhṛdbhedasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:737: kaṇṭakādiviṣayaṃ ca pramāṇaṃ duḥkhotpādaprayojanamevetyetadubhayaṃ parisaṃkhyātuṃ niyantumaśakyamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:740: svābhāvikatve nīla iva sarvān pratyarthaḥ sukha iti karabhavanmanuṣyāṇāmapi kaṇṭakaḥ sukhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:743: evaṃ tṛṣṇaja ivāpāṃ suhitasyāpaḥ sukhāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:746: nivedayiṣye hi kṣaṇabhaṅgādhikāre tathā sthemabhājāmapi vastunāmakramāṇāmapi kramavatsahakārikāraṇasamavadhānavaśādupajanāpāyadharmāṇaḥ kramavanto dharmā bhavantīti, tadihāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:747: yadyapi na jātyā sukhaduḥkhahetubhāvo bhāvanāṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:756: kasmāt punaḥ pramātrādicaturvarge pramāṇasyaivārthavattvamucceta na pramātrādīnāmapītyāśaṅkānirākaraṇārthaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:757: bhāṣyamanuvadanneva vyācaṣṭe-- arthavati ca samarthe samyagarthe 'rthāvyabhicāriṇīti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:759: arthasya tu samyaktvamidameva yad yādṛśaḥ pramāṇenopadarśistasya tathātvaṃ na punaranyathābhāva iti /
GSP29nystik_u:761: tadaivaṃ vyākhyānam-- arthavati ca prayojanavati ca yataḥ samarthaṃ śaktaṃ pramāṇa pratipattyādikrameṇa pūrvoktena prayojanaṃ prati,
GSP29nystik_u:762: ataḥ samarthe pramāṇe pramātrādīnyarthavanti prayojanavanti bhavanti,
GSP29nystik_u:763: yatastānyapi pramāṇavadeva samarthāni śaktāni prayojanaṃ pratīti,
GSP29nystik_u:769: tad yathā śivikāvahanapakrame puruṣamānayeti puruṣaśabdo viṣṭau /
GSP29nystik_u:770: tadvadihāpi pramātrādiparihāṇyā pramāṇasyārthavattvābhidhānaniyamaprakrama iti pramātrādibhyaḥ pramāṇasya viśeṣo vācya iti tatraivānyatamaśabdo vartate /
GSP29nystik_u:772: tathāpyadṛṣṭe viṣaye na tajjanitaprapittayavyabhicāreṇāvyabhicāraḥ śabdasya pramāṇasya śakyo vijñātum,
GSP29nystik_u:777: adṛṣṭārthaviṣayasya ca caturvargasyehārthavattvena prayojanaṃ dṛṣṭārthe sandehādapi vyavahāra siddheḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:784: na khalvīpsājihāsayorvā pravṛttau vā svāntryaṃ pramātṛtvam,
GSP29nystik_u:786: ipsādisvātantryeṇa tu taduttarakālabhāvinā pramāyāṃ svātantryaṃ parvakālābhāvyupalakṣim /
GSP29nystik_u:788: na hi sarvaḥ kartā samastakārakajanyaṃ svargādi vaudanādi vā bhuṅkte ṛtvikpācakādiṣu ca vyabhicāradarśanāt /
GSP29nystik_u:789: kārakasya tu sataḥ kartṛtvottarakālabhāvinī phalopabhoktṛtā kartṛvanāntarīyakatayā dupalakṣayati,
GSP29nystik_u:792: tadabhisandhipūrvakaṃ preṣaṇamadhyeṣaṇaṃ va yuktaṃ tasarvaṃ pacyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:795: kārakābhidhānena sannidhāpitāṃ kriyaṃ taditi sarvānāmnā parāmṛśati /
GSP29nystik_u:796: yasya hi vyāpāraṃ prādhānyena dhāturākhyātapratyayo vābhidhatte sa svatantraḥ kartā /
GSP29nystik_u:808: acetanasya tu bhāktava kartṛtvaṃ na svābhāvikamiti bhāvaḥ parisamāptipadārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe--tattvaparisamāptiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:811: paryavasānaṃ parisamāptiḥ viniyojyeti vaktavye yogyatāgrahaṇamīpsite 'pi dṛṣṭe vastuni kutaścit pratibandhāt puruṣeṇānupātte mā bhūt tattvāparisamāptiriti
GSP29nystik_u:812: yadyapi hi tat puruṣeṇānupāttaṃ tathāpyupādānayogyatāpradarśanādasti tattvaparisamāptiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:813: tatpratiṣedhaśca ityatra tacchabdena hānopādānalakṣaṇaṃ viniyogaṃ parāmṛśati //
GSP29nystik_u:822: pṛthivyāpastejovayuriti vā catvāri bhūtānītyādīti na tado vācyāni bhavantītyata āha-- pramāṇaviṣayatvenādhikārāt /
GSP29nystik_u:823: sūtrabhāṣyavākyatadvivaraṇeṣu pramāṇa pramāṇaviṣayaścādhikṛtaḥ na ca saṃkhyādisiddhāntabhedānupātino 'rthāḥ pramāṇaviṣayāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:845: yadi sadasatī samarthe kutastarhi tayormeda ityata āha--svatantreti /
GSP29nystik_u:850: saṃprati sadupalambhakasya pramāṇasyāsadūpalambhakatvaṃ pratipipādayiṣatā bhāṣyakāreṇa pradīpo dṛṣṭānta upanyastaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:853: gopālāṅganā api hi kimatrāsti steno 'smaddhanaṃ vā apavarake na veti sandihānā pradīpamupādāya samantādavalokyāpavarakamastīhāsmaddhanaṃ nāsti stena iti samameva niścinvanti,
GSP29nystik_u:855: tenāgāpālāḍnamā ca paṇḍitarūpebhyaḥ siddhaḥ pradīpo dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:857: anāśrayaṇe hetumāha pradīpena dṛśyamāne hi ghaṭādike 'rthe svatantre nānena samānajātīyaṃ tulyopalambhayogyataṃ dṛśyāntaramasti /
GSP29nystik_u:867: tadevaṃ laukikaparīkṣakasaṃmataṃ dṛṣṭāntamupapādya dārṣṭāntike yojayati--eve pramāṇenāpi indriyādinā sati pramīyamāṇe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:872: kasmāt sadbhedā ivāsadbhedā api sūtrakṛtā nocyanta ityata āha--tatra teṣu sadasadbhedeṣu madhye svātantryeṇāsadbhedā na prakāśanta iti nocyante
GSP29nystik_u:873: niṣedhyaniṣedhādhikāraṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvādasadbhedānāṃ bhāvabhedatantraṃ pramāśanamiti bhāvabhedakathanenaivābhāvabhedā api gamyanta iti noktā ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:874: atha vā kathitā eva yeṣāṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasopayogi,
GSP29nystik_u:875: yaṃ tu na tathā na teṣāṃ prapañcaḥ anupayuktabhāvaprapañca iva vaktavya ityāha--caturvargānantarbhāvād vā bhāvaprapañcavad abhāvaprapañca iti
GSP29nystik_u:878: atha niḥśreyasopayogābhāvaḥ kuto 'vagantavya ityata āha--bhāvopadeśādevābhāva upadiṣṭo bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:884: tadevaṃ tātparyaṃ vyākhyāya avayavārthaṃ vyākhyātuṃ bhāṣyaṃ paṭhati--sacca khalu ṣoḍaśadhāvyūḍhamupadekṣyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:889: dvitīye tu kalpe pāramārthike caḥ samucce,
GSP29nystik_u:893: sūtrasya saprapañca tātparyaṃ vyākhyāya avayavārthaṃ vyācikhyāsunā bhāṣyakāreṇa tāsāṃ
GSP29nystik_u:894: khalvāsāṃ sadvidhānāmiti bhāṣyeṇa sūtramavatārya paṭhitaṃ tadasya vārtikakṛt tātparyamāha--ta
GSP29nystik_u:896: ta ete pramāṇādayaḥ sadbhedā niḥśreyasopayogino na gaṅgāvālukādayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:901: bahuvrīhikarmadhārayayorasaṃbhāvāt ṣaṣṭhīsamāsaparigrahe nigrahasthānasyāntyapadārthasya prādhānye vivakṣitārthahānaprasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:903: anyonyanirapekṣāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ pramāhetubhāvaḥ pramāṇānāmiti hi bahuvacanaprayojanam /
GSP29nystik_u:904: prameyeṣu tu yadyapi prameyatā vāstavī pratyekamasti tathāpyapavargahetubhāvena prameyatā samudāye samāpyate,
GSP29nystik_u:906: ātmādīnāmanyamatasyāpyatattvajñāne saṃsārānanivṛtteriti yadeva hi nirdeśa vacanabhedasya prayojanam,
GSP29nystik_u:909: pramāṇādīnāmiti vibhaktyarthavyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ paṭhitvā pṛcchati--kaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:914: kārakagrahaṇena ca tannāntarīyakatayā pradhānakriyāpyānīteti vivaraṇe sāpi darśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:915: yadyapi svasvāmibhāvādāvapi saṃbandhe 'ntargataḥ kriyākārakasaṃbandho 'sti saṃbandhamātrasya kriyāgarbhatvāt tannāntarīyakatvācca kārakasya,
GSP29nystik_u:925: iṣusthityā yathā tadbhāvapratiṣedha iṣobhāvo dharmo gatiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:928: evamatrāpi na pramāṇaprameyādimātramacyate tattvagrahaṇenāpi tvarthāntaraṃ teṣveva yat yat samāropitaṃ rūpamanyathātvamiti yāvat tat pratiṣidhyate
GSP29nystik_u:933: tena gati mattvamarthāntaramiṣornabhavatītyasminnarthe iṣoḥ sthitiriti prayujyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:935: pramāṇadibhyo 'narthāntarasya tattvasya ca iṣoranarthāntarasya gatyabhāvasya cāsiddheḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:942: sā ca dvayī svrūpalakṣaṇā sahakārisākalyalakṣaṇā ca,
GSP29nystik_u:944: śakteśca bhāvatvena bhavitṛnirūpaṇādhīnanirūpaṇatvād bhaviturapi nirūpaṇaṃ bhavatītyuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:946: takrijñadṛṣṭaṃ niḥśreyasaṃ grahītuṃ dṛṣṭamatiprasaṅgāpādanena dūṣayati--eve ca kṛtveti /
GSP29nystik_u:949: yadyapi niḥśreyasapadamabhimatamātravāci pramāṇāditattvajñānasya ca dṛṣṭamapi niḥśreyasaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:959: tasya āgamānumānasahakāriṇā kāraṇābhāvena kāryābhāvānumānamevātrārthe pramāṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:960: ye tu vaiyātyāt manyeran padārthatattvajñānamātrameva paraniḥśreyasaheturiti, yathāhuḥ---
GSP29nystik_u:964: na hi bhāvānāṃ tattvamanyadataḥ pratyakṣaviṣayīkṛtād rūpāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:966: sani muco 'karmakasya guṇo vā iti guṇābhyāsalopau /
GSP29nystik_u:970: kimarthamātmādasūtreṇa dvādaśaiva prameyāṇi nādhikāni na nyūnāni cetyavadhāryate sūtrakārerṇa?
GSP29nystik_u:971: tasmāt tadeva sākṣādupayoti niḥśreyase na padārthamātramityāha--prameyāvadhāraṇārthāyāṃ cotrarasūtraprikriyāyāmakuśalaḥ sūtrakāraḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:973: tasmād yadyupapattiḥ yadi ca sūtrakārabhimatasubhayathāpi prameyatattvaparijñānaṃ parasya niḥśreyasasya hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:975: atha kiṃ tattvajñānasyātmādiviṣayasyādṛṣṭa eva ko 'pi sāmarthyātiśayo yataḥ paraniḥśreyasotpādaḥ, maivam /
GSP29nystik_u:976: kiṃ tarhi? dṛṣṭayaiva dvāretyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ-- taccaitaditi niḥśreyasahetubhāvābhidhānasya anu paścāt udyate anūdyate /
GSP29nystik_u:990: na kevalaṃ heyādhigantavyabhedena dvādaśavidra prameyaṃ darśayataḥ tadviṣayatattvajñānāya ca sopakaraṇanyāyābhidhānapramāṇavyutpādakaṃ śāstraṃ praṇayataḥ sūtrakārasya saṃmatam,
GSP29nystik_u:992: tatra saṃśayādīnāṃ pṛthagvacanamanarthakam ityādi codyabhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭesaṃśayādyagrahaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1002: sa cāyaṃ kiṃsviditi vastuvimarśamātramanavadhāraṇajñānaṃ saṃśaya iti bhāṣyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1004: saṃśayastāvaditi jñānamavadhāraṇaṃ pratyaya iti paryāyā iti manvānaścādayati--anavadhāraṇātmaka iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1006: api tu tidvaśeṣaviścayavacanaḥ kiṃsviditi dolāyamānasyobhayakoṭispṛśaḥ pratyayasyārthe 'navadhāraṇātmakasyāpi pratyātmaṃ mānasena pratyakṣeṇāvadhāryamāṇatvāditi
GSP29nystik_u:1009: tatra nānapalabdhe ityādi bhāṣyamavatārayituṃ pṛcchati-- sa kathaṃ nyāyasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1017: tasyāśrayo viṣaya upalabdha ucyamāno nirṇota eva vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1018: sandigdhe hi tasmin hetuḥ sandigdhāśrayatayā asiddhaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1027: upalabdho nirṇota iti hi sāmānādhikaraṇyāt samānaviṣayatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1029: sāmānyaviśeṣabhedena tu vyāghātaṃ pariharan sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na samarthayasa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1034: sa eva viśeṣato 'nirṇoto 'pi saṃbhavatīti na vyāghāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1037: na hi kariṇi dṛṣṭe cītkāreṇa tamanumīme pekṣāvanta iti //
GSP29nystik_u:1046: pūrvasmina kalpe kāma ityevāstu kṛtaṃ dharmādibhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1051: tasmādayuktamediti manvāna āha-- vayaṃ tu paśyāma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1052: sukhasyāptyā duḥkhasya hānyā viṣayeṇa viṣayiṇaṃ pratyayamupalakṣamati /
GSP29nystik_u:1055: tathāpi sukhaduḥkhāptitahānyoreva kartuḥ pravṛttiprasaṅgo na tatsādhane,
GSP29nystik_u:1056: na hyanyadvijānāti icchati ca karoti cānyaditi ghaṭate,
GSP29nystik_u:1073: tadāśrayaśca nyāyaḥ pravartate iti bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--tadidaṃ prayojanaṃ nyāyasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1079: na jātu niṣprayojanā kākadantādau parīkṣāmārabhante prekṣāvanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1084: nanvevamapi nīyate prāpyate vivakṣitārthasiddhiraneneti vyupattyā pratyakṣādi pratyekaṃ nyāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1102: na tadvirodha iti pradarśanārthaṃ bhāṣyamanubhāṣya tātparyāṃ vyācaṣṭe--prayakṣāgameti /
GSP29nystik_u:1103: kathaṃ punaranena bhāṣyeṇa taducyata ityata āha--yadihānumāneneti /
GSP29nystik_u:1109: sa khalu tādṛśaḥ pañcāvayavaprayogo lābhapūjākhyātikāmaiḥ paṇḍitavya/
GSP29nystik_u:1112: tadevaṃ samudāyato bhaṣyaṃ vyākhyāyavayavavibhāgāya paṭhati-yat punaranumānamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1116: na cet, tata eve tarhi tadanumānābhāsamiti kṛtaṃ pratyakṣavirodhena /
GSP29nystik_u:1127: na ca sapakṣāsapakṣāvevānvayavyatirekāgamyāvinābhāvadarśanaviṣayau na pakṣa iti sāmpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:1128: yadi hi pakṣaṃ vihāya bahireva sapakṣāsapakṣayoravinābhāvo gamyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:1129: tadā bahirvyāptimātrabalena pakṣadharmo 'pi heturna pakṣe sādhyaṃ sādhayet /
GSP29nystik_u:1133: evaṃ ca siddhaḥ pakṣe 'pi vyabhicāraḥ sādhanadharmasyetyanaikāntikatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:1136: na hyasti saṃbhavo rūpatrayasaṃpannaṃ viruddhaṃ cetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1140: sa caivaṃ pravartate--yo yaḥ kṛtakaḥ sa sarvo 'nuṣṇo yathā ghaṭadiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:1141: na ca vahneriva dhūmasaṃbandhe ārdrendhanasaṃyogo gurvantavāsinoḥ sāhacarye iva svādhyāyādhyayanamupādhiḥ kṛtakatvānuṣṇatvayoḥ saṃbandhe upalabhyate
GSP29nystik_u:1142: so 'yaṃ śaṅkitaḥ samāropito vā prayatnena punaḥpunaranviṣyamāṇo 'nupalabhyamānastatra tatra ghaṭādāvupādhirnāstīti pratyakṣeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:1148: kṛtakatvasyānuṣṇatvena svābhāvika autsārgikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ sāmānyena yo yaḥ kṛkaḥ sa sarvo 'nuṣṇa ityavadhāritaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1152: tathā ca tatra tatraikadeśe pratyekaṃ vyāptipradarśanamaśakyam, ānanyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1155: viśeṣe tejovayavini sādhayitumanuṣṇatonmukhaṃ yanna sādhayet tat kiṃ pratyakṣeṇāpahṛtaviṣayatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:1159: uṣṇe tejovayavini kṛtakatvasya darśanād anaikāntikamapakṣadharmo vā kṛtakatvamiti cet-na,
GSP29nystik_u:1161: pratyakṣeṇa tejo 'vayavina auṣṇyagraheṇa tatra kṛtakatvasya hetorvṛttāvutpannamapi vyāptivijñānaṃ bādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1164: anyathā tadgatasādhyadharmasandehe tatropalabhyamānaḥ sādhanadharmaḥ sandigdhabyatirekivādanaikāntikaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1172: evaṃ cānumāne dūṣite kṛtamapakṣadharmatvavyabhicārābhyāṃ tadupajīvibhyāmiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1173: yat punaḥ dignāgena pratyakṣaviruddhamanumānamudāhṛtaṃ tadupanyasyati- apare punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:1174: aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭādivaditi bruvāṇaḥ śabdasvarūpamevāpalapati /
GSP29nystik_u:1185: sati vibhave na jīrṇamalavadvāsāḥ stātakaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1187: tadvadihāpi aśrāvaṇaḥ śabda iti śrutivākyayoḥ sāmarthyāt śrāvaṇatvaviśeṣaṇopasaṃkānto niṣedho na viśeṣyeṇa śabdena saha saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1189: vacanārthāvirodhino 'rthasyārthagamyatvānna tadvirodhinaḥ śrāvaṇatvaniṣedhasya cādhikāraṇa śabda iti na śabdābhāve tanniṣedho 'vakalpate /
GSP29nystik_u:1205: uttaram- śuci naraśiraḥ- kapālamiti bruvatā śrutismṛtītihāsapurāṇānapekṣeṇānumānamātrasahāyenātra vastuni vayā śucirūpo 'rtho vaktavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1218: kāpalikānāṃ tvāgamavihitamakurvatāṃ kurvatāṃ ca tanniṣiddhamarthaṃ prayatnenānādirapi vyavahāraḥ śākyamallakādīnāmiva na vedānumānamūlamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1222: api cāgamānapekṣo 'numānena śaucaṃ naraśiraḥkapālaṃvyavasthāpayan praṣṭavyo jāyate-- śuci naraśiraḥkapālamiti ko 'rthaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:1223: nanu ca eva vākyāt pratīyate sa evārthaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1224: tat kiṃ pṛcchacata ityata āha--viśeṣavidhānaṃ ca śeṣapratiṣedhaparaṃ loke dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nystik_u:1225: yathā dakṣiṇena cakṣuṣā paśyatīti ukte na vāmeneti gamyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1229: āgamapramāṇyaṃ ca na manyasa iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1230: atha trayīvidveṣād anumānapakṣāpātinā tvayā sarvameva naraviṭkapālādi śaucapakṣe nikṣipyata ityāha--atha sarvameva śuci /
GSP29nystik_u:1234: na khalu pramāṇatvena pratyakṣāgamābhyāmanumānasya kaścid viśeṣo yena tau bādhakāvanumānasya nānumānamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1236: ayamabhisandhiḥ---yat tāvadanumānaṃ pūrvapravṛttaṃ tena bādhitaviṣayaṃ tabdalabhāvi paścattanamanumāna na svakāryāya paryāptam,
GSP29nystik_u:1239: na tu jñānākārālīke bahiriti tṛtīye nivradayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1240: tadiha śrāvaṇatvaṃ śabdasya niṣedhatāpūrvaṃ śravaṇamindriyamatīndriya tadgrāhrātvaṃ ca vastunī anumātavye śabdopalambhalakṣaṇena kāryeṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:1241: tathā caitenaivānumānenāpahṛtaviṣayamaśrāvaṇatvānumānaṃ caramamanvayavyatirekasaṃpannamapi na svocitaṃ kāryā janayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1242: eve tanubhuvanādīnāṃ na karteśvaro 'śarīritvānmuktasatmavat prayojanābhāvādityādyāpīśvaradharmigrāhimūlānamānenāpahṛtaviṣayatayā nyāyābhāsaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1244: na hyanayoranyatarad bādhyaṃ bādhaka vā saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1245: kiṃ tu mithaḥ satpratipakṣatayā na pramāṃ kurutaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1247: asamāveśe vā kutaḥ satpratipakṣatetyata āha--na hyanvayavyatirekasampanne iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1249: etaiḥ sampannayoryadi samāveśa ekasmin viṣaye bhavet,
GSP29nystik_u:1250: tata ekatarasya bādhyatvaṃ bādhakatvaṃ vā gamyetāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:1256: na pratyakṣeṇa tadviruddhārthopasaṃhāriṇā samāveśa iti na bādhyabādhakabhāva iyabhiprāyeṇa
GSP29nystik_u:1259: tulyabalau hi mithaḥ pratipakṣau bhavataḥ na tu durbalottamabalau /
GSP29nystik_u:1260: na hi bhavati tarakṣuḥ prapikṣo hariṇaśāvakasya,
GSP29nystik_u:1263: pūrvabhāvi pratyakṣamananyathāsiddhaṃ sadasatpratipakṣamanumānaṃ samānaviṣayasamāveśād bādhata iti yuktamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1265: gosadṛśo gavaya ityāraṇyakasya vākyaṃ śrutvā yadā nāgarako vanaṃ gato gosadṛśaṃ piṇḍamupalabhe,
GSP29nystik_u:1266: tadāsya vākyārthānubhavāhitasaṃskāraprabodhajanitasmṛtyapekṣa gosādṛśyajñānamupamānaṃ puro 'vasthitasya piṇḍasya gavayaśabdavācyatvajñāne pramāṇam
GSP29nystik_u:1268: pramāṇayet naiṣa piṇḍo gavayaśabdavācyo gopiṇḍasādṛśyād gopiṇḍāntaravaditi,
GSP29nystik_u:1279: prayojanasvarūpopayogābhidhānānantaraṃ dṛṣṭāntapade vyākhyātavye tadullaṅghanena vādajalpayoḥ ko 'vasara ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1283: vādajalpakathayorhi na dvayorvādiprativādinoḥ sādhane samīcīne saṃbhavataḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1286: ekasya tu nyāyābhāsa iti vādajalpābhyāṃ vivicyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1295: tathā vitaṇḍacate vyāhanyate 'nayā pratipakṣasādhanamiti vyutpattyā parapakṣopaghātena pāriśeṣyāt svapakṣasiddhirasyāḥ prayojanaṃ pratīyate
GSP29nystik_u:1298: tatra yadi niṣprayojanā tato na sarvā vidyāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1300: tanmukhena ca sarve prāṇinaḥ prayojanena vyāptāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1301: vitaṇḍāyā eva karmarūpāyā vidyārūpāyā vā niṣprayojanātvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1309: na hi parvatanitambavartiti dhūme asiddhatvādinā dūṣite vahnestatrābhāvo niścīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1314: sa tu svapakṣaseddhacaiva prayojanena pratipakṣasādhanamāhantīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1317: atha na pratipadyata ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭa--atha pakṣamapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1319: nāstiko hi sadasadubhayānubhayarūpatayā na vicāraṃ sahanta iti prameyāṇi sarvathā dūṣayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1321: na tvasyāsti pakṣo na ca sthāpanā /
GSP29nystik_u:1324: edadvibhajate--etasminnapi pakṣe caturvarga cet pratīpadyate so 'sya pakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1327: tathāpi tannāntarīyakatayā abhyupagamamātreṇa caturvargo 'pi pakṣa uktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1329: eṣa sādhanavādī jñāpayati--ahaṃ vaitaṇḍiko jāne anena pañcāvayavena sādhānāvākyenedaṃ sādhyaṃ jñāpyata iti caturvargaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1330: tatpratītyā khalvasya vaitaṇḍikasya parapakṣaniṣedhaḥ prayojanaṃ sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1331: tathā ca na viṣprayojano 'yaṃ vaitaṇḍika ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1332: dvitīyaṃ kalpaṃ dūṣayati--atha na pratipadyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1333: caturvarganāntarīyakatvāt dūṣaṇamapi na pratipadyate ityunmattavadupakṣaṇīya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1337: athāsiddhaviruddhādīnāṃ sadbhāvābhyupagame prameyamadhyapātināṃ prameyamātravicārāsahatvābhyupagamo vighaṭata iti svavākyābhihitamevāddhiviruddhādi na pratipadyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1340: tasmād vitaṇḍāpi prayojanavatīti nāvyāpakaṃ prayojanamiti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:1347: nāpi yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa sarvaḥ pratyakṣa viṣayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1354: anyathā yadaprasiddhaṃ laukikānāṃ kevalaṃ paṇḍitarūpavedanīyaṃ paramāṇvādi tasyādṛṣṭāntatā syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1355: atra ca yo dṛṣṭāntaḥ sa evam,
GSP29nystik_u:1356: ta tu ya eve sa dṛṣṭānta iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1359: na kevalaṃ prameyavirodhaḥ sūtravirodhaścetyata āha--tataścodāharaṇasūtraṃ vyāhanyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1360: yat teṣu teṣu śāstrapradeśeṣvatīndriyodāharaṇasūtraṃ siddhānte pūrvapakṣe vā yathā,
GSP29nystik_u:1378: saṃbandhagrahaṇaṃ ca śābdasyāpi jñānasya nimittaṃ prathamaśrāviṇaḥ śabdādarthajñānābhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:1393: asyāpi prameyāntargratasyāpi sataḥ pṛthagupādānaprayojanamāha--tasya prameya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1396: tathā hi yadi ghaṭo nāma na sarvatantrasiddhāntasiddhaḥ kimāśrayā avayavī vā paramāṇusamūho
GSP29nystik_u:1397: vā jñānākāro vā pradhānapariṇāmo vā brahmapariṇāmo vā tadvivarto veti pratitantrasiddhāntāḥ pravartante?
GSP29nystik_u:1401: kathaṃ sādhyasāmānyavyāptaṃ sādhanasāmānyamiti sāṇanaviśeṣat sādhyaviśeṣo gamyeta?
GSP29nystik_u:1403: abhyupagamasiddhāntaṃ copariṣṭād vicārayiṣyati vāttikakṛt iti tatprayojanamihāsmābhinogktamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:1405: nanu yathā tantavaḥ paṭasya samavācikāraṇaṃ kiṃ tathaivaite pratijñādayo vākyasya?
GSP29nystik_u:1406: no khalu rāganaguṇā varṇāḥ samavāyikāraṇatāṃ pratipadyanta ityāha-- vākyaikadeśā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1409: yathā hyavayavāḥ samudāyina ekasminnavayavini kārye dhārayitavye ca,
GSP29nystik_u:1410: evamekasmin vivakṣitārthapratipādane pratijñādayo 'vayavā vākyasya samudāyasya samudāyina iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1411: nanu varṇānāmāśutaravināśināṃ kramavatāmekakālatvābhāve samudāyābhāvāt kutastatsamudāyo vākyam,
GSP29nystik_u:1415: kriyā vā kārakaṃ vā prātipadikārtho vā padārthāntaraviśiṣṭo vākyārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1416: yathā somena yajeta godohanena paśukāmasya yasya pitā pitāmaho vā somaṃ na pibet sa vrātya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1422: na ca tadaviditaṃ sattāmātreṇa cakṣurādivad viśeṣyaṃ pratipādayatītyata uktam--pratyaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1426: na hi kramavadvarṇasamudāyaḥ padaṃ śravaṇendriyānubhavagocaraḥ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1437: ata evādhyayanasamaye gurumukhād gṛhīto vedarāśirvedāṅgopāṅgajñānasaṃskṛtena smaryamāṇa eva tasyārthaṃ bodhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1438: evaṃ ca yadā padārthapratyāyana eva padānubhavo na kāraṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:1440: yadi tarhi viśeṣyapadameva smaryamāṇaṃ viśiṣṭamarthamavagamayati kṛtaṃ padāntaraiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1445: yadyapi smaraṇāni na saha saṃbhavanti tathāpyekasmṛtisamārūḍhāni vā padāni nirantarasmṛtisaṃtānasamārūsani vā parasparāpekṣāṇi /
GSP29nystik_u:1446: tathā ca smaryamāṇaṃ viśeṣyapadaṃ viśeṣaṇapadāpekṣaṃ viśiṣṭamarthamavagamayatīti //
GSP29nystik_u:1454: tathāpi padārthasmṛtiravāntaravyāpārabhūtā apekṣate kāṣṭhānīva pākapravṛttāni jvalanamavāntaravyāpāram /
GSP29nystik_u:1455: na ca padānyagṛhītasaṅketāti padārthān smārayantīti upapannā padārthasmṛtisaṃbandhasaṃvedanayorapekṣeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1457: hanta daśadāḍimāni ṣaḍapūpā bhavantītyevamādīnāmapi vākyārthabodhakatvaṃ syādityata āha--pratisandhīyamānaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1460: na ca daśadāḍimādivākyādiṣu tadastīti na tato vākyārthāvabodha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1461: tadevamekasmṛtisamāroheṇa emārthāvacchedena ca padānāṃ samūho vākyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1472: tadgocarastu viniścayaḥ puruṣadharmo niṣpattiriti viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1473: kiyadbhiḥ kimabhidhānaiśca vibhāgaiḥ siddhiḥ parisamāpyata ityāśaṅkya bhāṣyakṛtoktam--tasya pañceti /
GSP29nystik_u:1488: āgamopacārasya ca prayojanamidaṃ yadarthasaṃvādenāgamenānugṛhyate nyāyaḥ saprayojanaśca bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1490: tasmād yadyapi na nyāyamātravartinī pratijñā āgamaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1492: tathā cāgamārthasaṃbandhena pratijñāyāḥ kalpitaviṣayatvamapi parākṛtaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1501: liṅgadarśanamātre dṛśyamāne liṅgarūpe saṃbandhasmaraṇarahite hetūpacārāt anumānatvopacārat
GSP29nystik_u:1513: yat tad dvitīyaṃ liṅgadarśanaṃ śuddhamapyāpātataḥ saṃbandhasmṛtihetubhāvāt saṃbandhasmṛti sahakāryeva /
GSP29nystik_u:1515: evaṃ ca tatpratipādakasya vacasa upapanno 'numānatvopacāra iti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:1516: evaṃ ca vāstavena liṅgena saṃbandhāt tadvacanasya buddhivikālpitaliṅgaviṣayatvaṃ parāstaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1520: yatra pratyakṣaviṣaye pūrvaṃ vyāptirgṛhītā tasya smṛtiriti smṛtiviṣayasya pratyakṣataḥ punarūpadarśanāt avipratipattyā punaḥ smaraṇāt tatsmārakaṃ vacanamudāharaṇaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:1527: upanayo hi tathā caitaditi pravartamāna udāharaṇasthaṃ yathāśabdārthamapekṣata iti yathā tatheti pravartata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1528: kiṃ punarūpamānaṃ yasyāyamekadeśa ityata āha--upamānaṃ khalu tathā gaustathā gavaya ityupadeśopayoge /
GSP29nystik_u:1530: tasmin sati paśvād vanaṃ gato nāgarakaḥ pratyekṣeṇādṛṣṭapūrvaṃ piṇḍaṃ paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1532: piṇḍasya ca purovartinaḥ smaryamāṇena gavā sādṛśyaṃ pratyakṣeṇaiva paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1533: tadevaṃbhūtaṃ sārūpyajñānaṃ gavayaśabdavācyo 'yaṃ piṇḍa iti pratītiheturūpamānam /
GSP29nystik_u:1534: tadetasyopamānasyopadeśārthasmaraṇagavayapiṇḍagosārūpyāpratyakṣarūpasyaikadeśe sarūpye yo yathātathābhāvaḥ sa upanaye 'pyastītyetāvatopamānatvopacāra upanaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1537: na khalvavayavānāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vā vākye samavāyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1543: iha tu vibhajyamānānāmavayavānāṃ nanmūlānāṃ ca pramāṇānāṃ sākāṅkṣatvameva dharmaḥ samārthyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1544: tadatra samastarūpasampannaliṅgapratipādanamekaṃ prayojanaṃ vibhajyamānasākāṅkṣatvaṃ cāstīti siddhamekavākyatvamavayavānāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1546: so 'yamiti bhāṣyamanubhāṣya pṛcchati--kaḥ punaḥ paramaśabdasyārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1549: yadyapi loke pratyakṣādīnāmekaikaśo 'pi vipratipannapuruṣapratipādakatvaṃ tatra tatropalabhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1557: yata eva vādādipravṛttihetavo 'ta eva tattvavyavasthāyāścāśrayā bhavantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1567: astu tarhi pramāṇapadasaṃgṛhītebhyaḥ pramāṇebhyaḥ pramāṇāntaramasaṃgṛhītaṃ pramāṇapadena prameyapadenevāsaṃgṛhītāḥ saṃśayādayaḥ prameyā ityata āha--na pramāṇāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:1573: na hi vayaṃ guṇatvenotpattimattvena vā rūpeṇāniścāyakatvaṃ tarkasyācakṣmahe,
GSP29nystik_u:1583: etaduktaṃ bhavati pramāṇaṃ tattvāvadhāraṇāya pravṛttaṃ karaṇatayā itikartavyatāmapekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:1584: tarkaśca pramāṇaviṣayayuktāyuktavicārātmā pramāṇaṃ yukte tattve pravartamānamanujānan pramāṇamanugṛhṇarati /
GSP29nystik_u:1586: na ca pramāṇaviṣaye cet tarkaḥ pravartate kṛtamasya pramāṇānujñayā,
GSP29nystik_u:1589: asti hi prasaṅgo na prasaṅgo hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1590: tathā hi pratyakṣameva tāvad bhūtale pravartamānaṃ tadviśeṣaṇatayā ghaṭābhāve 'pi pravartamānaṃ yadyatrābhaviṣyad ghaṭo bhūtalamivādrakṣyata,
GSP29nystik_u:1593: tasmānnāstīti tarkeṇānujñāyamānaṃ ghaṭābhāviśiṣṭe bhūtale pravartate kevalamevedaṃ bhūtalaṃ neha ghaṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:1594: evaṃ svargakāmo yajeta iti śabdo 'pi pravartamānaḥ paramāptasya bhagavatar iśvarasya
GSP29nystik_u:1595: niyogo nāsvargaphalāyāṃ yāgabhāvanāyāmavakalpata iti samānapadenopatto 'pi duḥkhatayā
GSP29nystik_u:1597: bhinnapadopatto 'pi puruṣaviśeṣaṇamapi svarga eva bhāvanāphalaṃ yukta iti tarkeṇānujñāyamānaḥ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:1598: na ca yadyabhaviṣyad ghaṭa iti vā yadyabhaviṣyad dhātvarthaḥ sāghya iti vā kriyātipattirasti,
GSP29nystik_u:1602: niśvayāya tu pravṛttaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadviṣayavivecanenānugṛhṇan itikartavyātvenopayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1625: yadyekaṃ nimittaṃ syād vaicitryaṃ na bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:1630: yāgādikā tu kriyā āśutaravināśinī na cirabhāvine svargāya kalpata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1631: avasthitaṃ ced yāgādyāhitamapūrvaṃ dharmo 'stīti sadaiva sukhinā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1632: evamadharmo 'stīti sadaiva duḥkhī syāditi sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kādācitkatvaṃ vyāhanyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:1635: kiṃ tu tāvadanena sthātavyaṃ na yāvadantyasukhaduḥkhasaṃvijñānaṃ janayati,
GSP29nystik_u:1641: ekadravyaṃ cedastu tarhi sarvasādhāraṇe pṛthivyādau yatra kvacit /
GSP29nystik_u:1643: atha pṛthivyādyeva kāraṇa janmavaicitrye kasmānna bhavatītyāśayavān pṛcchati--kiṃ kāraṇamiti kasmāt kāraṇādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1653: paramārthatastu tarkapūrvakastattvaviniścayo nirṇaya iti pratyakṣādīnāmapi tarkasahāyānāṃ nirṇayaphalatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1655: dhūmādigocareṇa nirṇayena vahnyādāvanumīyamāne pramāṇabheva nirṇayo na phalamityāśayavān pṛcchati--kadā punatiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1665: ekasyāpi śāstrakartuḥ pūrvapakṣottarapakṣasādhanadūṣaṇapratipādako vacanasamūho vādaḥ syāditi nānāpravaktṛka ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:1666: siddhāntabhedānavidhānena hi dvāvapi svasiddhāntānurūpaṃ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ cāhaturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1670: pratyadhikāraṇa sādhanaṃ yasmin vāde sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1673: tathā ca nānāpravaktṛkatvena tulyatve 'pi vādasya vitaṇḍāyāḥ pratyadhikaraṇasādhanatvena bhadeḥ siddho bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:1676: asti hi jalpasya pratyadhikaraṇasādhanavatvaṃ ca nānāpravaktṛkatvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:1699: netyāha--etāvatā viśeṣeṇa kathāmārgabheda iti etāvāneva viśeṣo na sarvathā,
GSP29nystik_u:1706: pañcasu caturṣu vā liṅgarūpeṣvanyatamaṃ liṅgaṃ dharmamekaṃ dvayaṃ trayaṃ vānuvidadhānā ahetavo hetuvadābhāsānta iti hetvābhāsā uktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1715: atha ye ye vāde codyante te sarve pṛthugupadiśyante iti?
GSP29nystik_u:1719: tasmāt nāyamavinābhūto heturvāde codanīyatvaṃ vā pṛthagupadeśo vā bhāṣyakāreṇokta ityupasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:1722: tadevamekadeśimataṃ dūṣayitvā svamatena bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe--etadeva tu nyāyyāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1723: nigrahasthānebhyo hetvābhāsānāṃ pṛthagupadeśe prayojanaṃ yad bhāṣyākṣarebhyaḥ sākṣāt pratīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1724: sāmānyopadeśena viśeṣa upadiṣṭe viśeṣopadeśaḥ prayojanādhikyaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1725: yathā brāhmaṇān bhojaya kaṭha ceti kaṭhabhojane viśeṣo gamyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1726: tadvadihāpi nigrahasthānopadeśenaiva hetvābhāseṣu labdheṣu teṣāṃ viśeṣeṇābhidhānaṃ prayojanādhikyaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1727: etāvāneva sūtrakṛto vyāpāro yat sūtraṇaṃ nāma /
GSP29nystik_u:1728: tatra nigrahasthānaviśeṣāṇāṃ hetvābhāsānāṃ svarūpaṃ vādasya ca tattvanirṇayāvasānatvamālocya
GSP29nystik_u:1729: vāde codanīyā bhaviṣyanti nigrahasthānatvena hetvābhāsā nāpratibhādaya iti prayojanaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:1741: yadi vāde hetvābhāsāḥ prayujyeran tato nigrahasthānatvena codyeran,
GSP29nystik_u:1742: na tu teṣāmasti prayogo 'pramāṇatvāt pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhatvācca vādasya /
GSP29nystik_u:1750: tathā cāsti teṣāṃ vāde prayoga iti vāde nigrahasthānatvena hevābhāsāścādyantām,
GSP29nystik_u:1756: samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛttaṃ rūpaṃ vādasya ca nigrahasthānānāṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:1758: kānicideva nigrahasthānāni vāde na tu sarvāṇīti sāmānyato 'bhidhāya tadeva lakṣaṇaparatantratvamabhimate viśeṣe yojayati--vādasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:1763: na niścayaḥ sarvaḥ pramāṇamūlo 'pramāṇamūlasyāpi tasya darśanāt,
GSP29nystik_u:1767: upāsyopāsakayoḥ parasparaṃ na dhvaṃsanaṃ saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1769: hetvābhāsānāṃ ca pṛthakkaraṇaṃ na vāde tanmātrāvadhāraṇārtham,
GSP29nystik_u:1770: api tu yasminnanuddhāvite 'pi nigrahasthāne tattvapratipattivyāghāto bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1772: evaṃ ca nyūnādhikāpasiddhāntā api saṃgṛjītā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:1776: sāhaṅkāro vijigīṣurapratibhādibhirapi nigrahasthānaistiraskṛto galitāhaṅkārastattvabubhutsutāṃ nītaḥ paścād vādena vyutpādyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1783: atra hi jāteḥ svavākye parivarjanamuktvā punaḥ svayaṃ prayogo na yuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1788: tad vibhajate--svayaṃ ca sukaraḥ prayoga iti anena bhāṣyeṇa kimuktaṃ bhavati?
GSP29nystik_u:1789: pareṇa prativādinā jātau prayuktāyāṃ vādī prāśnikān sabhyān bravīti jātiranena prativādinā prayukteti /
GSP29nystik_u:1791: jīran he vādin kathaṃ kena prakāreṇa jātiḥ catuviṃśatyāṃ jātiṣu katamā jātiriti?
GSP29nystik_u:1799: yadyapītarā vidyāḥ pramāṇikamevārthamabhiniviśante tathāpyetadvidyāpratipādyameva pramāṇādyupajīvya sve sve vyutpādye tattve pravartantra,
GSP29nystik_u:1801: yathā pratyakṣādyupajīvya pravartamānamanumānaṃ na pratyakṣādiviṣayamapi tadānīmeva gocarayati /
GSP29nystik_u:1803: saṃprati vidyānāṃ yāni karmāṇi pratipādyāni sāmāgrihotrakṛṣyādīni tatrāpyānvīkṣikyupāya ityāha--upāyaḥ sarvakarmaṇāṃ vidyāvyutpādyānām,
GSP29nystik_u:1810: tasmāt saṃśayaparīkṣāpramāṇaviniveśa dvāreṇa tadarthatattvamavadhāryā tatra trayī viniveśanīyā /
GSP29nystik_u:1812: tasmādānvīkṣikīpariśodhitapramāṇapramāśitaṃ sāmādi itarā vidyāḥ kurvanti viṣayamiti śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1813: api ca dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmabhimatānabhimatopāyatāprajñāpanena yathāyatha sarvā vidyāḥ prekṣāvataḥ pravartayanti nirvayanti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:1818: atha sādhyāṃśaṃ rāgataḥ prāptamanūdya sādhanetikartavyate eva vidharayete,
GSP29nystik_u:1819: tataḥ śyenādisādhyāyā hiṃsāyā avihitatvena na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni iti pratiṣadhādanarthatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:1823: tadevamānvīkṣikīmāśrayante sarvavidyā ityāha--āśrayaḥ sarvadharmāṇām sarvāsāṃ vidyānāṃ puruṣapravartanā dharmāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1832: sa ca vidyāntarasādhāraṇa iti vidyāntarādhigamyena niḥśreyasena saṅkaraprasaṅga ityata āha--tadidaṃ tattvajñānaṃ niḥśreyasādhigamaśca yathāvidyaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:1833: vidyāntarāṇi tāvad yat tattvajñānaṃ kurvanti tatsvabhāvālocanayā hi tadvidyāsādhye eva niḥśreyasabhade upayujyante nānyatra /
GSP29nystik_u:1841: vādādīnāṃ nigrahasthānāntānāmupadeśaḥ parābhibhavopāyatayā madamānādihetutvena niḥśreyasaparipanthīti manvānaścodayati--madamānādīti /
GSP29nystik_u:1848: tatra jalpādīnā parāhaṅkārapraśamanamavāntaravyāpāra iti na niḥśreyasaparipanthitā,
GSP29nystik_u:1855: tadevaṃ prathamasūtreṇa śāstrasyābhidheyaprayojanasaṃbandhān darśayatā padārthāḥ pramāṇādaya uddhiṣṭāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1859: na ca prayojanasaṃbandhanirṇayaḥ parīkṣāṃ vineti tatparīkṣārthaṃ dvitīyaṃ sūtram /
GSP29nystik_u:1861: dvividhaṃ hi prayojanābhidhānaṃ granthakṛtāṃ dṛṣṭaṃ samīcīnamasamīcīnaṃ ca,
GSP29nystik_u:1864: tatrotsūtreṇa prayojanābhisaṃbandhapratipādanaparaṃ pūrvapakṣabhāṣyam--tat khalu vai niḥśreyasamityādi /
GSP29nystik_u:1879: dvitīyā tu śrutasya parīkṣya nyāyana vyavasthāpanam,
GSP29nystik_u:1892: atha pariniṣpannadhyānopāyaḥ sākṣātkāravatīṃ pratipadya caturthau pratītiṃ nirmuktasakalakleśajālaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:1895: na caivamavastho vītarāgo 'pi sahasaiva dehādibhiḥ viyujyate,
GSP29nystik_u:1897: na ca prāyaśvittenevātmajñānenādattaphalānyeva karmāṇi kṣīyanta iti yuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:1907: yogārddhivaśāccāniyatavipākakālānyapi dīrghakālaphalānyapi karmāṇi piṇḍīkṛtya bhūtendriyadavijayitayā yugapadeva bhuṅkte /
GSP29nystik_u:1909: na cācintyatvād vinaivopabhogena karmāśayān prakṣayiṣyatīti yuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:1913: tādṛśaśca munistattvajñānavān śāstrasya praṇeteti na vātaputrīyaṃ śāstramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1914: paraṃ tu riḥśreyasaṃ yogarddhiprabhavasampadā yugapadupabhogenopāttakarmāśayasya kṣayāt sarvaduḥkhoparama ityupapannaṃ niḥśreyasadvaividhyamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:1922: na hyasti saṃbhavo na tatra tṛpyati tacca tasya sukham,
GSP29nystik_u:1923: na ca tad dveṣṭi tacca tasya duḥkhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:1928: atha aparaniḥśreyasotpādasamaya eva paraniḥśreyasotpādo 'pi kasmānna bhavatītyāha--paraṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ tattvajñānāt krameṇa bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:1931: na hi kaphodbhāvajvarapraśamanāya kaphanivṛttau satyāṃ yatnāntaramātiṣṭhate,
GSP29nystik_u:1933: paraṃ tu niḥśreyasaṃ na tāvad bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1936: tathā ca na tulyakāla utpādaḥ parāparayorniḥśreyasayoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1942: tasmāt janmaduḥkhocchedakramasamabhivyāhṛto mithyājñānādyucchedakramaḥ parasyaiva niḥśreyasasya śāstraprayojanasya /
GSP29nystik_u:1948: na cāsau duḥkhādīnāṃ mithyājñānāntānāmapradarśite kāryakāraṇabhāve sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:1954: ataḥ siddhe kāryakāraṇabhāve uttarottarāpāye tadanantarābhāvādapavarga ityanena yogena kāraṇocchedakrameṇa kāryocchedakramapratipādanenāpavargaḥ pratipādyate /
GSP29nystik_u:1962: evanivṛttyā anyanivṛttyaiva kāryakāraṇabhāva ākṣipta iti nāsau sūtre darśanīyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:1979: śāstrasya niḥśreyasādhigamalakṣaṇena prayojanena yaḥ saṃbandhaḥ pūrvamākṣiptaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:1983: yadyapi sāmabhedādau halaśakaṭadau ca mithyājñānamanekaprakāraṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:1984: tathāpi na tat saṃsāraheturapi tvātmādidvādaśavidhaprameyaviśeṣaviṣayamiti sūtrasthaṃ mithyājñānaṃ viśeṣṭumāha--tatreti /
GSP29nystik_u:1988: na khalu yathā kuṇḍe vadaraṃ paṭe vā śauklyam,
GSP29nystik_u:1996: tadāha--tatrāyaṃ bhedaḥ tatrātmani tāvat pradhāne prameye nāstīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2000: sarvatra hi rajatodakādivibhrameṣu śuktirajatayorvā marūmarīcisalilayorvā sārūpyameva nimittaṃ pratīmaḥ na hi jātu rūpaṃ rasādiṣu hastinaṃ vā maśakādiṣu āropayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:2003: pītaḥ śaṅkhastikto guḍa iti ca dṛśyata iti cet--na,
GSP29nystik_u:2006: śaṅkhaṃ ca doṣācchāditasitimānamanubhavan pītagaṇasya ca tadasaṃbandhamananubhavaṃstadasaṃbandhāgraheṇa pītacīravilvādisāmānādhikaraṇyena sārūpyāt śaṅkha pīta iti viparyasyati /
GSP29nystik_u:2011: na ca brūmo yatra sārūpyaṃ tatra bhrama iti,
GSP29nystik_u:2013: api tu yatra bhramastatrāvaśyaṃ kathañcit sārūpyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2023: tathā ca kasya kutrāropa ityata āha--kriyāguṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:2024: so 'yamasaddharmān kriyāguṇarahitatvādīn satyātmani samāropya asattayā viparyasyati--nāstyātmeti,
GSP29nystik_u:2033: astu nāstitāsamāropa eva tāvad yato na pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2035: sukhī bhaveyaṃ duḥkhī vā mā bhūvamiti tṛṣyataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2049: na hi jātu kaściccetanaḥ sukhamāpsyāmīti madhuviṣasampṛktamannamupabhuṅkte /
GSP29nystik_u:2060: tāṃ khalvayaṃ śarīrādiṣvāropya eta evāhamiti śarīrādiṣvātmabhāvamāropayati //
GSP29nystik_u:2062: saṃprati sandihāno viparyayasvarūpaṃ pṛcchati--kaḥ punarayaṃ viparyayaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:2070: idamatrākūtam--na tāvat svākāraṃ rajatādi bāhyatayā ālambante vibhramāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2080: bhrāntaṃ hi jñānaṃ svākārameva bāhyatā ālambate /
GSP29nystik_u:2083: hanta cakṣuṣī nimīlya vaitālikapakṣapātaṃ parityajyālocayatvāyuṣmān ki purovartidravyākāratāmātraṃ pratiṣedhati rajatasya,
GSP29nystik_u:2085: tatra jñānākāratopadarśanavyāpāraṃ bādhakapratyayasya brūvāṇaḥ ślāghanīyaprajño devānāṃpriyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2090: santu tarhi bādhakapratyayānurodhād asatprakāśanaśīlā eva mithyāpratyayāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2091: tathā hi bādhakaṃ vijñānaṃ nedaṃ rajatamiti rajatajñānagocarasyāsattvaṃ gṛhṇāti /
GSP29nystik_u:2093: na hi viṣayatvaṃ nāma kāraṇatvaṃ yenāsati na syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:2101: āhosvit sadeva sadantarātmanā gahṇāti sataśca sadantarātmatvena asattvādasadviṣayamucyate?
GSP29nystik_u:2103: rajatātmanā cet asadālambeta na satī śuktikām,
GSP29nystik_u:2104: kathaṃ punarasau rajātartho śuktau pravartate na punā rajatābhāve /
GSP29nystik_u:2105: kaskāccedamiti purovarti dravyamaṅgulyā nirdiśya tasya rajatatvaṃ niṣedhati nedaṃ rajatamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2106: yadi tatra na prasañjitaṃ rajatatvaṃ pūrvavijñānena?
GSP29nystik_u:2107: atha śuktireva rajatātmanā asatīti tadākāratayā tāmālambamānaṃ mithyājñānamasadālambanamucyate?
GSP29nystik_u:2119: yaḥpunaḥ advaitavādinā prapajco vaināśikānāṃ vā sāmānyādirno bahiḥ ki tvalīkam /
GSP29nystik_u:2120: tadviṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ mithyājñānamityapi na saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:2124: tasmāt prapañcaśca sāmānyādi ca vastusatī nāmamīcīnavijñānagocarau /
GSP29nystik_u:2130: tanmātrasya sarvapratyayasādhāraṇyena sarve 'rthāḥ savarpratyayaviṣayā iti savarsarvajñatāpattiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2137: api ca cakṣurādīnāṃ samīcīnajñānopajananasāmarthyamiti kathamebhyo mithyājñānaṃ bhavitumarhati?
GSP29nystik_u:2138: na hi śyāmākabījaṃ parikarmasahasreṇāpi kalamāṅkurāya kalpate /
GSP29nystik_u:2139: doṣasahāyā locanādayo mithyāpratyayamādadhata iti cet--na doṣā hi kāraṇānāṃ sāmarthya nighnanti,
GSP29nystik_u:2141: na khalu bhṛṣṭaṃ kuṭajabījaṃ nyagrodhadhānāyai kalpate,
GSP29nystik_u:2143: api ca svagocare vyabhicāre vijñānānāṃ sarvatrānāśvāsaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2145: tathā hi rajatamidamiti dve jñāne smṛtyanubhavarūpe /
GSP29nystik_u:2148: tāvanmātraṃ ca gṛhītaṃ sadṛśatayā saṃskārodbodhakrameṇa rajate smṛti janayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2149: sā ca gṛhītagrahaṇasvabhāvāpi doṣavaśāt gṛhītatāṃśapramoṣeṇa grahaṇamātramavatiṣṭhate /
GSP29nystik_u:2150: tathā ca rajatasmṛteḥ purovartimātragrahaṇasya va mithaḥ svarūpataśca viṣayataśca
GSP29nystik_u:2151: bhedāgrahaṇāt sannihitarajataviṣayavijñānasārūpyeṇedaṃ rajatamiti bhinne api grahaṇasmaraṇe
GSP29nystik_u:2155: atra hi viniryannayanaraśmivartinaḥ pittadravyasya kāyasyevātisvacchasya pītattvaṃ ca gṛhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2160: tadupapattau ca bhrāntatvamapi lokaprasiddhaṃ siddhra bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2161: tasmād yathārthāḥ sarve 'pi bhramāḥ pratyayatvāt paṭapratyayatvayavaditi prāptam //
GSP29nystik_u:2162: evaṃ prāpte 'bhidhīyate--asti tāvad rajatārthino rajatamiti jñāne sati purovartidravyapravṛttiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyavyapadeśaśceti sarvajanīnam
GSP29nystik_u:2167: purovartivastugrahaṇarajatajñānādagṛhītabhedaṃ svarūpato viṣayato vā rajatārthinaṃ purovartidravye pravartayatīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:2168: hanta bhoḥ kimetāvatā purovartivastugocaraṃ jñānaṃ rajatagocaraṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:2174: na hi vṛkṣamātradarśanaṃ niścayena śiṃśapārthinaṃ pravartayati,
GSP29nystik_u:2178: nanu rajatavijñānaṃ purovartini dravye na vartate,
GSP29nystik_u:2179: purovartijñānaṃ ca na rajata iti tatra purovartidravyamātrārtho purovartini pravarteta na rajatārtho /
GSP29nystik_u:2180: evaṃ rajatārtho yatra kvacana pravarteta na niyamena purovartina dravye /
GSP29nystik_u:2189: so 'yamubhayato bhedābhedagrahasārūpyāt pravṛttinivṛttibhyāṃ yugapadākṛṣyamāṇaḥ pratipattā kaṣṭāṃ daśāmāveśitaḥ prajñāśālibhirativyākhyayā //
GSP29nystik_u:2193: tathā ca śakyaṃ tatrāpi vaktum--yathā bhedagrahād viparyayajñānotpāda evamabhedāgrahāt kasmānna samīcīnajñānotpāda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2198: cetanavyavahārāṇāṃ tvabuddhipūrvakāṇāmapratīteḥ buddhipūrvakatve tu vivekāgraha upayujyate,
GSP29nystik_u:2200: yadyavivekagraho 'pi tatparipanthī vidyata iti kuto 'nyataranibandhano vyavahāraḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:2204: yad yadarthina niyamena yatra pravarpayati tadvijñānaṃ tadviṣayam,
GSP29nystik_u:2209: tatra kiṃ śuktikātvasya rajatamiti jñānaṃ pratyanālambanatvaṃ sādhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:2223: tadevamātmani mithyājñānaṃ vyākhyāya śarīrādiṣvekādaśasu mithyājñānaṃ bhāṣya eva darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:2225: tatra śarīrādiṣu manaḥparyanteṣu yathāyogaṃ mithyājñānaṃ duḥkhe sukham ityādinā apratihātavyam ityantena bhāṣyeṇoktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2226: pravṛttyādiṣu śṛṅgagrāhikayoktaṃ pravṛttau ityādinā rocayet ityantena bhāṣyeṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:2227: evaṃ mithyājñānasya svarūpaṃ darśayitvā mithyājñānadoṣapravṛttitajanmaduḥkhānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo doṣādīnāṃ svarūpaṃ coktam etasmāt ityādinā tāpa ityantena bhāṣyeṇa /
GSP29nystik_u:2232: tathā ca nāpavarga iti vakṣyamāṇamarthamupapādayitumaktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā,
GSP29nystik_u:2234: tad vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭa--ta hame duḥkhādaya iti bhāṣyakāroktakramād viparītakramābhidhānaṃ vārttikakṛtaḥ evaṃ sūtrakāroktakramād viparītakramābhidhānaṃ bhāṣyakṛtaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2235: tad duḥkhādīnāṃ mithyājñānapūrvakatvena mithyājñānasya duḥkhādipūrvakatvenānāditvaṃ darśayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:2237: yadyeta eva saṃsārastarhi sūtrakāraḥ prameyasūtre kasmād duḥkhādibhyaḥ pṛthak pretyabhāvaṃ saṃsārāparanāmānamupādatte?
GSP29nystik_u:2244: evamasati janmani mithyājñānasyānutpattaraviṣayo 'pi janma mithyājñānasya kāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:2245: evaṃ vinā pravṛttiṃ janmābhāvāt janmadvādeṇa pravṛtterapi mithyājñānakāraṇatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:2256: kāraṇanivṛttau kāryanivṛtteriti kathanaparaṃ bhāṣyam anubhāṣyākṣipati--yadā tu tattvajñānāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:2261: tasyāśutaravināśinaḥ saṃskārād vā jñānāntarād vā apāyasya tattvajñānasādhāraṇyena tasyāpi bādhyatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2263: na hi śuktikājñānaṃ rajatajñānasya rajataviṣayatāmapahartumutsahate jātaṃ hi tad rajataṃ viṣayīkṛtya /
GSP29nystik_u:2272: yasminneva hi purovartini dravye pūrveṇa rajatatvamāsañjitaṃ tatraivottaraṃ tadviruddhaṃ śuktikātvaṃ dharmamupanayati /
GSP29nystik_u:2273: tathā ca pūrvasya vijñānasya mithyātvamādarśayattajjanitāṃ pravṛttiṃ vighaṭayat phalamasyāpaharatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2280: parasparābhāvadharmiṇorekatra samavāye nedaṃ svābhāvikaṃ nānātvaṃ kvacidapītyadvaitaprasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2297: tattu na pūrveṇa nāpyanyena kenaciditi bhāvatyarthasahāyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2313: tasmād dṛḍhamūlatvāt tadapi tattvajñānaṃ mithyājñānaṃ nivartayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2316: āgamamayena hi jñānena prameyaṃ gṛhītvā śāstrīyeṇa ca nyāyavijñānenānumānāparanāmnā
GSP29nystik_u:2319: tatra trayāṇāmapi pramāṇānāṃ pratisandhānam astīti dṛḍhamūlatvāt tena mithyājñānaṃ bādhyate //
GSP29nystik_u:2321: samāhitatvena cetaso dhāraṇāṃ darśayati--ananyamanā iti pratyāhāram,
GSP29nystik_u:2329: saṃprati tu tattvajñānavāsanayā atyantabalīyasya samūlakāṣaṃ kaṣitatvāt mithyājñānavāsanāyā bhavati viviktā tattvajñānavāsanā tasyāmityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:2331: nivṛttaṃ taṃ tattvasākṣātkārasamaye 'pi kasmāt punaḥ svavāsanāvaśānna jāyate?
GSP29nystik_u:2332: na khalu mithyājñānavāsanā anādikālapravṛttā ādimatā tattvajñānena tatsaṃskāreṇa vā śakyā nivartayitumityata āha--nivṛtte ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:2333: tāvadeva puṃsāṃ buddhayo 'sthirā bhrāmyanti svocitaṃ ca saṃskārajātamātanvate,
GSP29nystik_u:2351: na ca tasmādeva rāgādīnāmabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2354: tayā virodhiguṇena viṣayatṛṣṇā ca tatparipanthini vidveṣaśca tadadhikaraṇāśrverṣyādayo nivartante /
GSP29nystik_u:2359: yadi hi janmanaḥ pravṛttiḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:2361: na punarasau kṣaṇikā sato āmuṣmikāya janmane kalpate /
GSP29nystik_u:2367: vartamānānāgatayoraviśeṣeṇa doṣāpāyāt nivṛttirūkteti bhrāntyā deśayati--yau tāvadanāgatāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2385: syādetat, mahāpralaye 'pi mithyājñānādinā duḥkhāntenāsti viyoga iti atrāpi muktiprasaṅga ityata āha--so 'yaṃ mithyājñānādineti /
GSP29nystik_u:2391: tannivṛttau śarīrādivat tattvajñānasaṃskārasyāpi pralaya ityaśeṣaviśeṣaguṇavimukto mukta ityucyata iti saddhim //
GSP29nystik_u:2397: no khlvayaṃ prekṣāvatāṃ samācāro yad duḥkhabhiyā sukhaparityāga iti,
GSP29nystik_u:2398: api tu sukhaṃ duḥkhād vivicya upādadate duḥkhaṃ ca varjayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:2399: na hi mṛgāḥ santīti śālayo nopyante,
GSP29nystik_u:2403: tathāpyanityatvakṛtakatvavat parasparānuṣakte iti na khalu sukhasya kevalasyopādānaṃ duḥkhasya vā kevalasya parivarjanaṃ śakyamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2408: na cāvinābhāvo vinā saṃbandhāditi tatsiddhaye saṃbandhavikalpānāha--samānanimittatā vā anuṣaṅgo 'vinābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2422: yatraikaṃ tatretaraditi vā yatra yasminnimitte satīti vā yatrādhāra iti vā yatropalabdhisādhane satīti vyākhyeyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2427: svapadebhyaḥ pramāṇādayaḥ padārthāstattvato jñātā yathāyathaṃ mithyājñānādinivṛttikrameṇa apavarge upayokṣyante,
GSP29nystik_u:2431: api tu lakṣaṇaparīkṣaṇābhyām ityasti prabandhasyottarasyopayoga iti bhāṣyārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2438: śāstrakāryasya tattvajñānalakṣaṇasya tathaiva trividhayaiva śāstrapravṛttyā bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2441: na cāsya dharmidarśanamantareṇa pakṣadharmatā sidhyatīti tadupadarśanāya nāmadheyamātreṇa dharmiṇāmuddeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2444: na cāparīkṣito heturvyatirekī catūrūpo bhavatīti parīkṣāpyavaśyaṃ kartavyā /
GSP29nystik_u:2455: ghrāṇādisūtre 1.1.12 tu lakṣaṇapare kārakatvaṃ vivakṣitam anyathā lakṣaṇatvāyogāditi adoṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2456: atra ca yadyapi sūtrakāreṇa saṃśayapramāṇaprameyeṣu parīkṣā sākṣāt kṛtā na prayojanādiṣu,
GSP29nystik_u:2457: tathāpi tatkaraṇādeva prayojanādiparīkṣāpi sūcitā sūtrakāreṇa iti trividhetyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2467: tathāpi pramāṇapadasamabhivyāhṛtaṃ sat sāmarthyāt pramāṇatvamapi lakṣayatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:2469: pramā ca smṛteranyaḥ arthāvyabhicārī svatantraḥ paricchedaḥ tasmād vibhāgaparādapi
GSP29nystik_u:2472: tathā ca vibhāgaparatvena sākṣāt sāmānyalakṣaṇānabhidhānād vibhaktasya lakṣaṇamucyata ityuktam tacceha /
GSP29nystik_u:2477: pramāṇeṣu prameyeṣu ca viśeṣata iti gamayitavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:2481: na ca vivekaḥ svarūpa upayujyata ityata āha--athoddiṣṭavibhāgadvāreṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:2499: pramāṇalakṣaṇakaraṇapravṛtto yat catvāryeva lakṣayati tadavagamyate na nyūnānyadhikāni vā pramāṇanītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2505: na ca pratyakṣādīnāṃ samānāsamānajātīyasya vyavacchede pañcamyādyabhāva upayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2512: akṣamakṣaṃ prati vartata iti vigṛhyāvyayībhāve kṛte sarvendriyāvarodho bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2514: kasmāt punarbhāṣyakāreṇa akṣasyākṣasyeti vigṛhyata ityata āha--anyathā tu vastunirdeśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2517: atha kasmāt samāsa eva tena vigraheṇa na pratipādyata ityata āha--samāse hi akṣasyeti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeteti /
GSP29nystik_u:2519: anyatra punarasya kaḥ samāsa iti pṛcchati--kaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:2521: tathā hi, prāptāpannālaṃpūrvagatisamāseṣu paravalliṅgatāpratiṣedhādabhidhayaliṅgopādānāt pratyakṣo 'rthaḥ pratyakṣābuddhiḥ pratyakṣaṃ jñānamityabhidheyaliṅgatā siddhā bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2522: kvacit pāṭhaḥ samāse hi pratyakṣasyeti ṣaṣṭhī na śrūyeteti /
GSP29nystik_u:2533: tannimittaḥ khalvayaṃ pratyakṣaśabdastatra tatra laukikaparīkṣakaiḥ prayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2534: yathā mayūraśabdo mayūratvasāmānyanibandhanaḥ kāsucideva patatrivyaktiṣu vartamānaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2536: tadidaṃ pratyakṣamuddhiṣṭamapi sat pramāṇatadābhāsasaṃkīrṇamiti tadvivekāya lakṣaṇamupayujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2543: yaḥ kārakaiḥ phale janayitavye cāramabhāvī dharmabhedaḥ phalotpādānukūlo 'pekṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2546: tathehāpi indriyādinā pramāṇena pramāyāṃ phale pravṛttena tadutpādanānukūlaḥ sannikarṣo jñānaṃ vā caramabhāvī dharmabhedo 'pekṣyata iti bhavati vyāpāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2548: vyavasthāṃ darśayati--yadā sannikarṣo vyāpāra indriyādeḥ pramāṇasya tadā jñānam ālocanaṃ vā savikalpakaṃ vā sākṣātkāravadvijñānaṃ pramitiḥ phalam,
GSP29nystik_u:2550: na cāntarālikena nirvikalpakenendriyavyāpāraviccheda iti pratyakṣavyākhyānāvasare nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2551: yadā jñānam ālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā vyāpāra indriyādīnāṃ tadā hānopādānopekṣābuddhayaḥ phalam /
GSP29nystik_u:2552: tatropādeyamidaṃ salilamiti buddhiranāgatopādānaviśiṣṭaṃ salilamālambamānā na sākṣātkāravatī,
GSP29nystik_u:2566: na ca vyāptismṛtivicchinnamālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā na liṅgaparāmarśajñānaheturiti vācyam,
GSP29nystik_u:2567: tadudbodhitasaṃskāradvāreṇa vyāpsmiraṇe ca parāmarśe ca tasya tadānīmasato 'pi kāraṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2576: kiṃ tu kāraṇānāṃ svarūpaṃ vā sahakārisākalyaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:2579: janīyam, na tu tat toyarūpadarśanamātrāt śakyānumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:2580: tat kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadanumānasya gocara iti? atrocyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2587: idameva cāsya kāryopadhānaṃ yat kāryotpādāt pūrvamavaśyaṃbhāva ānantaryaniyamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2588: na ca tajjātīyasya dṛṣṭacarasya tathābhāvadarśane 'pi dṛśyamānasya toyasya tad dṛṣṭaṃ bhavati yena tatra smaryeta /
GSP29nystik_u:2594: kimiyaṃ hānaprayatnamapi prasūte yato hānaṃ syāt?
GSP29nystik_u:2595: tasmād yā nobhayaprayatnaprasavahetuḥ sopekṣābuddhistṛtīyā lokaprasiddheti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:2613: anumānajñānasya phalāvasthāyāmevārtho mita iti meyaṃ nāvaśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:2615: tatra phalaviśeṣaṇapakṣamāsthāya yata ityadhyāhṛtya sāmadhatte---naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2620: na svagocaraṃ pratītyata āha--sarva ca pramāṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:2624: na hi panasaviṣayeṇa paraśunā khadire dvaidhībhāvo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2625: tathāpi phalāntarānapekṣamutpattāveva vijñāne yat prakāśate sa tasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2630: bhāvasādhanaścet pramāṇaśabdaḥ phalamasyārtho na tu phalaṃ svaviṣaye karaṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:2636: tathāpi yatrānena pramāṇena satā hānādibuddhayo janayitavyāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2646: api tu pramāṇena nirūktiriti na vayāghāta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2653: yadā hyetat pramāṇaṃ tadā vākyārthavijñānaṃ phalam /
GSP29nystik_u:2654: yadānumānavad vākyārthavijñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadā hānopādānādibuddhayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2655: atra pratyakṣādīnāṃ kramoddeśaprayojanaṃ prati ekadeśimatamupanyasyati---kecit tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2656: pratyakṣaparā hi pramāṇāntarajanyāḥ pramitaya iti pratyakṣasya prādhānyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2665: ato mahāviṣayatvaṃ prāthamya eva heturna caramatva ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2678: tathāpi śāstre vyutpādyatvenānumānasyāpi tadastīti sādhāraṇatayā na heturiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:2683: na cānumānaviṣaye sāmānyarūpe saṃbandhini pratyarkṣa pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:2688: tasmāt nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamiti vibhāgavacanamanupapannamiti śaṅkāmapanetuṃ vimarśapūrvakaṃ vicārayati sma bhārūyakāraḥ---kiṃ punaḥ pramāṇānīti
GSP29nystik_u:2700: tadanena dhūmavyāpakatvopadhānena dhūmād gamyamāno bahniḥ parokṣa iti darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:2704: upadhānānapekṣastu pratyakṣeṇāvyavahitaṃ sākṣād varhina viṣayīkṛtya nirākāṅkṣo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:2710: tasmād vyavasthāyāṃ guṇapradhānabhāvo na cintya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2715: tatra teṣu madhye prāthamyāt pratyakṣalakṣaṇam indriyārthasannikarṣotpannam ityādi sūtram /
GSP29nystik_u:2722: yaḥ khalu kutaścid vyāmohāt samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛttaṃ tadrūpaṃ na śakroti grahītum,
GSP29nystik_u:2726: itastvavagatalakṣaṇaḥ tenaiva vivicya pratyakṣatattvaṃ gṛhṇātīti samānāsamānajātīyavyavacchedaḥ sūtrārtha ukta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2727: atra ca yaha ityadhyāhṛtya yattadonityābhisaṃbandhāt tat pratyakṣamiti pramāṇavāci pratyakṣapadra yojanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2728: evaṃ ca jñānapramāṇyapakṣe 'pi yat tadviśeṣyajñānaṃ pratyakṣaphalaṃ liṅgaparāmarśo
GSP29nystik_u:2738: na cāsāvaṇvākāśādīnāmastīti satyapi saṃyogādau nāsāvarthasannikarṣa iti tadvyudāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2741: anyathā kuḍyādisaṃyuktenendriyeṇa kuḍyādivyavahitasya tatsaṃyuktasya ghaṭādeḥ tatsamavetasya ca rūpāderapi grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2742: na caitāvatā trividha eva sannikarṣaḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyuktasamavāyaḥ samavāyaśceti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:2744: ye hi dravyaguṇakarmāśrayaṃ sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśsayamarthānataraṃ rocayante,
GSP29nystik_u:2745: teṣāṃ kathaṃ rūpādibhedānāmanyonyasya sādṛśyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavet ?
GSP29nystik_u:2752: tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu parasparavyāvṛttimatīṣu ete nānubhūyeran asati sannikarṣāntare /
GSP29nystik_u:2754: tadā prativaktavyaṃ kutastyo 'yamanantāsu rūpagandhādivyaktiṣu rūpamiti vā gandha iti vā vyapadeśabhedaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:2759: tasmādastīndriyeṇa rūpatvādisāmānyānubhavo yannibandhanāḥ kāsucideva kecideva vyaktiṣu vyapadeśebhedā iti siddhaṃ sannikarṣāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:2760: viśeṣaṇabhāvena ca saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇaṃ samavetaviśeṣaṇa ca saṃgṛhītam //
GSP29nystik_u:2761: yasyendriyeṇa yādṛśaḥ sannikarṣaḥ tādṛśaṃ tatra darśayati--tatra cakṣuriti /
GSP29nystik_u:2765: santānena śrotre samutpādaḥ samavāya ityādi dvitīye nipuṇataramupapādayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2766: avayavāvayavinau guṇaguṇinau kriyākriyāvantau jātijātimantau ca mithaḥ saṃbaddhāvanubhūtete /
GSP29nystik_u:2771: śuklaḥ paṭa ityādi sāmānādhikaraṇyajñānaṃ na tu saṃbandhijñānamiti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:2779: tasmād bhinne eva vastunī saṃbaddhe sāmānādhikaraṇyena bhāsete,
GSP29nystik_u:2783: na hi jātu dadhiśabdaḥ kuṇḍe vartate kuṇḍaśabdo vā dadhni /
GSP29nystik_u:2784: vartante tu surabhimadharaśuklādiśabdāḥ svābhidheyaṃ nimittīkṛtya paṭādiṣu,
GSP29nystik_u:2785: evaṃ paṭādiśabdā api jātyādi nimittīkṛtya dravye pravartante iti sāmānādhikaraṇyam /
GSP29nystik_u:2789: śabdānāṃ tu tatraikasmin dravye pravṛtteḥ tadvācyānāmaikātmyabhramaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2790: ayutasiddhyā tu kuṇḍe dadhītivat na sphuṭataro vivekaprakāśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2804: tasmād vinā saṃbandhāntaraṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāva eṣitavya iti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:2805: evamabhāve 'pi yadindriyasaṃyuktaṃ vā yadvendriyasamavetu yathā bhūtale ghaṭo nāstīti vā nāstyakāre 'nudāttasvara iti vā tasya saṃyuktasya vā
GSP29nystik_u:2807: na ca bhūtalādirūpameva ghaṭābhāvo nārthāntaramiti sāṃpratam,
GSP29nystik_u:2809: na ca kaivalyaṃ tasya dharmo ghaṭabhāvavirodhī ghaṭābhāvādanyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2810: na ca dṛśye ghaṭādau bhūtalopalambhaḥ kaivalyamabhāvavyavahāraheturiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:2811: evaṃ hi ghaṭasaṃsṛṣṭabhūtalagraho 'pi kaivalyamiti ghaṭābhāvavyavahāraṃ pravartayet /
GSP29nystik_u:2813: dṛśye 'nupalabhyamāna iti tu viśeṣaṇe kimaparāddhamupalabhyābhāvena yena tadapākaraṇāyopalambhābhāvo 'bhyupeyate?
GSP29nystik_u:2816: na ca pratiyogismaraṇavyavahita indriyārthasannikarṣo nālamabhāvadhiyamupajanayitumiti sāṃpratamityagra darśayiṣyāmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2824: ghaṭābhāvānubhavasya tu ghaṭasmaraṇaṃ heturiti na pratiyogi,
GSP29nystik_u:2826: nanu svarūpamātraṃ dṛṣṭaṃ veśmādyarthaṃ smaranneva bahirnitaśrcaitro yadā pṛcchyate kenacit--vayasya,
GSP29nystik_u:2827: tava gṛhe tadā kimāsīt maitra iti ?
GSP29nystik_u:2828: sa caitraḥ pratiyogismaraṇavirahāt pūrvamapratipannamaitrābhāvo 'pi tatpraśnajanitamaitrasmṛtiḥ kṣaṇaṃ dhyātva tadabhāvamavagamyāha,
GSP29nystik_u:2832: naitat, saṃyuktaviśeṣaṇalakṣaṇena manaḥsannikarṣeṇa smartavyasya smaraṇābhāvaṃ maitrasya gṛhītvā tena liṅgena tadabhāvasya tadānīmanumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2835: yad yasya jñānārhasyājñāne jñāyate tat tadabhā vavat /
GSP29nystik_u:2839: na ca yat kadācidānumānikaṃ tenenidrayagamyena na bhavitavyam,
GSP29nystik_u:2843: tadanena prabandhena indriyasyārthena sannikarṣād yadutpadyate jñānaṃ tat pratyakṣamiti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:2849: ātmīyena hi rūpeṇālokacakṣuṣī dravyaṃ darśayata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2853: tasmādanyonyanirapekṣatvaṃ mahattvānekadravyavattvayoriti vikalpa eva nyāyya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2854: satyapyevaṃlakṣaṇakatve cukṣuravayavinastaijasasya na cākṣuṣatvamityata uktam--upalabdhikalaḥ saṃskāra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2859: pratyakṣalakṣaṇakaraṇapravṛtto hi sūtrakāraḥ tadeva brūyāt yadasyāsādhāraṇaṃ kāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:2876: yadyapīndriyamanaḥsannikarṣe 'pīndriyam asti pratyakṣajñānasya viśeṣakam indriyeṇa vyapadeśādindriyajñānamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2877: tathāpi manasā vyapadeśāmāvāt manasastatrāviśeṣakatvam indriyārthasannikarṣe tūbhayamapi viśeṣakam,
GSP29nystik_u:2881: yu/jānasya hi yogino yadātmamanaḥsayogādātmani buddhayo bhavanti tāḥ khalvātmanā vyapadiśyante ātmabuddhaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2888: etaduktaṃ bhavati---yathā cukṣuṣā indriyatvena jñānaṃ vyapadiśyate cākṣuṣamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2890: evaṃ yathā rūpeṇārthena vyapadiśyate jñānaṃ rūpajñānamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:2894: liṅgādi vā tatra cātmā nārtho 'pi tu pramātaiva /
GSP29nystik_u:2895: yathā rūpādijñāne 'numānādijñāne vā na tatra jñānaṃ mānasamiti vā ātmajñānamiti vā vyapadeśaḥ sa kasya hetāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:2899: yadā hi nāgarayoṣitaḥ kutūhalāt praṇihitamanaso vikasitaniḥspandanayanotpalāḥ saudhamālāgavākṣakairavanipatiṃ sabalavāhanamaticiraparāvṛttaṃ gopureṇa niviśamānamālokayanti,
GSP29nystik_u:2900: tadā khlvāsāmekenaivendriyamanaḥsaṃyogena kramavadanekendriyārthasannikarṣasahakāriṇā bhinnāni kramavanti hāstikāśvīyādipratyakṣajñānāni jāyante
GSP29nystik_u:2903: yadā hi mandaṃ gacchati gavi dūrataḥ saṃyuktasamavāyenendriyārthasannikarṣeṇa śuklo gaurityajñāsīt,
GSP29nystik_u:2904: atha pratyāsīdan gacchatītyapi vijānāti tenaiva saṃyuktasamavāyena sannikarṣeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:2905: tena pratyakṣajñānasya śukla iti ca gacchatīti ca bhede 'pi indriyārthasannikarṣo na bhidyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2910: nanu bhavatūktamuttaraṃ bhede 'bhedādityasyākṣepaḥ samādhātavyaḥ ityata āha--anabhyupagamācca /
GSP29nystik_u:2913: tat kimidānīṃ bhidyamānasya pratyakṣajñānasya nāyaṃ bhidyata iti samānatvānnokta iti bhāṣyam anupapannameva?
GSP29nystik_u:2920: pratyakṣajñānasya rūpajñānasya rūpajñānamiti vā cakṣurvijñānamiti vā vyapadeśena bhidyamānasya ātmamanaḥsaṃyoga iva ayam indriyamanaḥsaṃyogo na bhidyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2924: na tvasti indriyamanaḥsannikarṣādhārābhyāmindriyamanobhyāṃ pratyekamasya vyapadeśo yathendriyārthasannikarṣādhārābhyāṃ indriyārthābhyāṃ vyapadeśo rūpajñānamiti cakṣurjñānamiti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:2928: lakṣaṇaṃ hi prasiddhaṃ bhavati yathā dhūmo vahneḥ na cātīndriyadvayādhārasannikarṣastathā prasiddho yathendriyārthasannikarṣo 'rthasya saṃbandhina ekasnaya prasiddhatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:2933: tadanenātīndriyādhāratvaṃ svarūpeṇoktvā tadevaṃ viṣayāvṛttitvamanovṛttitvābhyām atīndriyādhāratvaṃ sāmānyamāha--viṣayāvṛttitvaṃ veti /
GSP29nystik_u:2939: cakṣuṣastatra prāpterityata āha--na tu cakṣuṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:2942: tasya prasāda indriyāvyavadhāyakatvam kuḍyādibhyo viśeṣaḥ yaḥ khalu kācābhrapaṭalādiṣu svaccheṣu samasti /
GSP29nystik_u:2947: etaduktaṃ bhavati--bhūtaviśeṣaḥ karmāpekṣo rūpaṃ caṣṭa iti cakṣurityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2948: karmakṣāyāt tu prasannāndhasya na rūpaṃ caṣṭa iti na cakṣuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2952: kecit tu sāntaramiti grahaṇaviśeṣaṇaṃ hentu bruvate,
GSP29nystik_u:2954: sādhyaviparyayādasya vyatirekaṃ darśayati--na hi prāpyakāriṣviti pakṣadharmatāmāha--dṛṣṭaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:2960: mā bhūt sarvatra rathādīnāṃ tatsaṃyogādīnāṃ copalabdhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2961: tena yāvanmātra rāṣṭravanādergolakena vyāptaṃ tāvanmātrasya grahaṇaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2965: yadyapi gatikṣaṇānāṃ pratyekaṃ spāśrayasya deśāntaravibhāgasaṃyogopajananaṃ prati kṣipratayā na viśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2966: svāśrayapratyāsattau cāviśeṣaḥ tathāpyā cāpādānavibhāgāt ā ca prāpanīyadeśaprāpterantarālavartī yāvān gatikṣaṇapracayaḥ pūrvāparībhūto gatiriha vivakṣitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:2967: tasya sāntaratvaṃ mandatvaṃ vilambaḥ nairantaryaṃ tu pāṭavaṃ kṣipratā /
GSP29nystik_u:2968: tāmimāṃ gatimabhindad nairantaryeṇa kurvadapi sannikṛṣṭamāśu prāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:2972: sāntaragrahaṇaṃ na syāt prāptau jñāne 'dhikasya ca /
GSP29nystik_u:2979: yadi ca syāt tadā paśyedapyunmīlya nimīlanāt //
GSP29nystik_u:2980: yadi ca syāt unmīlya nimīlitanayano 'pi rūpaṃ paśyet,
GSP29nystik_u:2982: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sāntaragrahaṇāditi hetuṃ vikalpya dūṣayati--yat tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:2988: yat tu prasādasvabhāvaṃ tejaḥ tanna gṛhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:2989: kiṃ tu tasya rūpamātraṃ visphāritākṣaṇa dṛśyate /
GSP29nystik_u:2993: mā na bhūtāṃ ca nirantare dravye,
