GSP29nystik_u:2995: na cāpātajanmālocanaṃ vā vikalpo vā dravyānumānaṃ pratīkṣate yena rūpajñānānumitaṃ dravyam indriyarthayordravyayorantaraṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:2996: api ca rūpamātramagṛhyamāṇe dravye svatantraṃ gandhādivad gṛhyamāṇaṃ kathamantarā svāśrayamanumāpayet,
GSP29nystik_u:2998: tasmād viṣaktāvayavatejodravyāpratyakṣatvasamāropamātreṇa dūṣaṇaṃ vakṣyamāṇaṃ tvanyathāsiddhatvadūṣaṇaṃ pāramārthikaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3001: dūṣayati--sa svatantraśrcakṣurviṣayo na bhavati indriyaṃ cārthaṃ cāntarā abhāvo grāhyaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3003: na cendriyārthayormadhyate kasyacit saṃyuktasya vā samavetasya vā grahaṇamasti,
GSP29nystik_u:3006: mā bhūdāntarālikaṃ saṃyuktaṃ vā samavetaṃ vā viśeṣyaṃ gṛhyamāṇameva tu rūpādiviśeṣyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3009: pratīyate hi tvagādibhiḥ apīndriyaiḥ prāpyakāribhirauṣṇyābhavaviśeṣaṇa śiṣirataraṃ pāthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3017: ye tu sāntara iti grahaṇamiti hetumāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3021: tatra ya eva śarīrāsaṃbaddha ityanubhūyate tameva sāntara iti manyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3024: śarīrasaṃbandhena tasya sparśādau na sāntaratvābhimāna ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3032: na caitat niryatā vinā pṛthvagratāṃ bhavatīti pṛthvagratā sūcitā /
GSP29nystik_u:3033: yathā vartideśe piṇḍitamapi tejaḥ prasarpat prāsādodaraṃ vyāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:3041: dehamarthaṃ cāntarāvasthitasya pṛthivyādeḥ saṃyuktasaṃyogālpīyastvaṃ bhūyastvaṃ cāpekṣamāṇasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:3043: sa ca tādṛgālokāvayavī pratyakṣo 'nyathā na rūpamātreṇa tadanumānaṃ śakyamityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3044: na ca khagānāmuparyupari saṃcaratāṃ dūrantikapratyayaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3045: na ca patati patatriṇīha prāpto neheti bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:3050: acintyo hi tejaso lādhavātiśayena vegātiśayo yadudayagiriśikharam ārohatyeva mārtaṇḍamaṇḍale bhavanodareṣvāloka ityabhimāno laukikānām /
GSP29nystik_u:3051: tādṛśaṃ cākṣuṣamapi teja iti krameṇāpi gacchad yugapattatra tatra lakṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3052: na caikasmādeva karmaṇo yugapad durāntikasaṃyogā bhavantīti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3054: anyathā madhurāsthasya devadattasya karma pāṭaliputreṇa devadattaṃ yojayet /
GSP29nystik_u:3055: vegākhyasaṃskārajamapi karmana sahasā śaramantarāladeśena ca lakṣyeṇa ca yojayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3059: na cāyamasati bādhake mithyeti vaktuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3063: kimasya kuḍyakaṭādyāvaraṇamapakuryāt yena tadāvṛtaṃ na gṛhṇīyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3064: gatau tu sparśavatā prasādarahitena saivāsya pratibaddheti na prāpnoti viṣayam,
GSP29nystik_u:3069: yajjanakaṃ sad yadaprāptau yanna janayati tat tatprāptāveva tajjanayati,
GSP29nystik_u:3070: yathā kumbhajanakaḥ kumbhakāro mṛdo 'prāptāvakurvan kumbhaṃ tatprāptāveva karoti /
GSP29nystik_u:3078: prāptau tu dūraṃ gacchat prakṣīṇaṃ sat prāptamarthaṃ na gṛhṇāti ataijasam,
GSP29nystik_u:3083: yogyo hi tādṛśa indriyakṣaṇaḥ svakāraṇādupajātaḥ pariṇato vārthakṣaṇaśrca,
GSP29nystik_u:3089: tena sthemabhājāṃ bhāvānāṃ svarūpayogyatā vā mahattvādirviṣayībhāvaḥ sahakārisākalyaṃ vā jñānopajananaṃ prati pariśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3091: tadā yadevāvyavahitaṃ sannihitaṃ sad ajanayad vijñānaṃ viprakṛṣṭamapi vyavahitamapi tadeveti tathaiva tena jñānaṃ janayitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3094: tasmāt na saṃbandhamantareṇa viṣayībhāva iti sūktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3097: kulālādau prāpyakāriṇi dṛṣṭaṃ yathā viprakṛṣṭo vyavahitaśrca na karotīti,
GSP29nystik_u:3098: tasmāt aprāpyakāriṇi cācaskāntādau dṛṣṭaṃ yathā viprakṛṣṭo vyavahitaśrca lauhaṃ maṇirākarṣati,
GSP29nystik_u:3099: tasmāt tatra pramāṇaṃ vaktavyamiti uttaram--indriyatvameva pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:3101: yadi tu kaśrcit dṛṣṭāntasya sādhyavikalatvam ubhdāvayet tvagādīnāmaprāpyakāritvāditi,
GSP29nystik_u:3110: sa ca vyastānāmapyastīti yatra tatra vyavasthitebhyo 'pi kāryotpādaprasaṅkaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3115: prāptereva tatra tatra kāryotpādaṃ prati upayogasya viditasvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3123: ata eva bahirnisṛtāpyacchinnamūlā dṛṣṭiḥ kāryāya samarthā na chinnamūleti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:3125: pratyakṣasamākhyātalakṣaṇānuvādena lakṣaṇe vidhīyamāne jñāyata evaitajjñānameveti loke sākṣātkārijñānahetoḥ pratyakṣatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3132: na khalu yaiva candanasparśajñānasyotpattau sāmagrī saiva sukhasyāpīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3133: asti hi śītārtasyāpi candanendriyasaṃyogāt śītasparśajñānam iti tadvadevāsya sukhamapi bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:3139: api copādānābhedaśrca kutaśrcit kāraṇabhedāt kāryabhedaśceti ko virodhaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:3140: ata evāsmākamabhede apyupādānasya piṭharasyauṣṇyāparākhyasya ca vahinasaṃyogasya
GSP29nystik_u:3141: pūrvarūpādipradhvaṃsānāṃ kāraṇānāṃ bhedād bhinnajātīyā jāyante gandharūparasasparśā iti siddhāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3146: yatrāpīndriyārthasannikarṣastatrāpi jñānamastīti tadeva sukhaduḥkhayoḥ kāraṇaṃ kluptasāmarthyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3151: sukhaduḥkhabuddhyutpāda eva cātra dharmādharmopayogo na tu susaduḥkhotpāde /
GSP29nystik_u:3152: na cāsatīndriyārthasannikarṣe jñānamanyanmanorathādi vā tādṛśaṃ sukhabhedaṃ vidhatte yādṛśo viṣayopabhogajanmā /
GSP29nystik_u:3156: hantar, iśvarasyāpyasti tatrabhavato yogarddhisaṃpannānāṃ ca mahādhiyāṃ samastavastusākṣātmāra iti teṣāmapi sukhaduḥkhotpādapracayaḥ prasajyet,
GSP29nystik_u:3159: sa ca satyapyarthasākṣātkāre nāsti siddhānāmiti na teṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhotpādaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3160: api ca caramabhāvi kāraṇaṃ gṛhītvā pūrvabhāvināmakaraṇatvāpādane tantvādīnāmapi paṭādīn pratyakāraṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3161: saṃyogabhedādeva tādṛśapaṭātpatteḥ tantvādīnāṃ ca saṃyogabheda evopayogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3167: tatrobhayyapi indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamavyabhicārīti lakṣaṇena saṃgṛhītāpi svaśabdenopāttā,
GSP29nystik_u:3173: tadyathā ḍittho 'yaṃ gaurayaṃ śuklo 'yaṃ kamaṇḍalumānayaṃ gacchatyayamiti sarvaṃ hi savikalpakaṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvena vastuṣu pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:3175: na tu jātyādīnāṃ mitho viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāvagāhīti yāvat //
GSP29nystik_u:3176: tatra nāmarahitamavikalpakaṃ nāstīti ye vipratipadyante tanmatamapacikīrṣurūpanyasyati bhāṣyakāraḥ yāvadarthaṃ vai nāmadheyaśabdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3178: nāsti so 'rtho yaḥ kadācit kvacit kathañcit nāmadheyena viyujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3181: arthā hi pratīyamānāṃ nāmadheyairūpetāstatsāmānādhikaraṇyenāvagamyante gaurityartho 'śva ityartha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3185: na hi bhavati dhūmo 'yaṃ vahinariti kiṃ tu dhūmo 'yaṃ dhūmatvāt vahinamāniti /
GSP29nystik_u:3186: api cāśabdopāye 'numeyādau na śabdasaṃbhedenādhigamo bhavet, asti tu /
GSP29nystik_u:3187: tasmāt tairnāmadheyaiḥ saha samānādhikaraṇasyārthasya pratyayo yata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3189: kiṃ ca gavādiṣu ṣaḍjādiṣu ca śabdāpakarṣe 'rthapratyayāpakarṣāt tadutkarṣe tvarthapratyayotkarṣāt
GSP29nystik_u:3192: tadidaṃ samaḥ prayojanaṃ saṃpratyaya iti samadhikaḥ pratyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3195: asti hi purovartidravyasāmānādhikaraṇyena rajatapratyayo na caitāvatā śuktī rajatātmikā bhavatītyata āha---arthasaṃpratyayācca vyavahāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3198: viṣayajñānaṃ rūpamiti vā rasa iti vā evaṃ rūpādyarthasāmānādhikaraṇyena bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3201: uktamapi vyapadeśaṃ savyākhyānamāha--rūpamiti jānīte rasa iti jānīte iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3202: tathā cārthānāṃ nāmadheyātmakatvāt tadgocaramālocanamapi nāmadheyagocaramityarthavat nāmadheyena vyapadiśyamānaṃ śābdaṃ prasajyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3208: na so 'sti pratyayo loke yaḥ śabdānugamādṛte /
GSP29nystik_u:3216: iti parīkṣāparvaṇi vacanārhamapi subhāṣitarucitayā tadvilambamasahamāno bhāṣyakāro
GSP29nystik_u:3222: sāmānādhikaraṇyena śabdātmakatvaṃ rūpādīnāmabhidhīyānaṃ śabdabrahmātmakatvaṃ vocyeta śreyamāṇagaurityādipadabhedātmakatvaṃ vā?
GSP29nystik_u:3225: na salvasmadādisamastadarśanapathātivṛttena śabdabrahmaṇā rūpādīnāmasti sāmānādhikaraṇyapratītiḥ laukikānām /
GSP29nystik_u:3226: śrūyamāṇaśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyena tu tādātmyaprasādhane anupayuktaśabdasaṃbandhasya bālamūkādeḥ rūpādijñāneṣu nāsti śrūyamāṇaśabdagandho 'pi,
GSP29nystik_u:3228: na ca teṣāmapi prāgbhavīyaśabdabhāvanānugamena tatsāmānādhikaraṇyamiti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:3229: na khalu rūpādyātmanaḥ śabdasya rūpādivaiśadyaināvaiśadyaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3233: na ca tādātmyādanyad vācakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ yatra saṃbandhagrahāpekṣā bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:3236: na hyasti saṃbhavo bhedakalpanā ca sāmānādhikaraṇyaprathā ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3240: ārddhekta eva sāmānādhikaraṇyanirāsāya saṃbandhagrahaṇasvarūpamāha--asthārthasya sāsnādimadrūpasya ayaṃ gakarādyokāro nāmadheyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3242: tathā ca yo ḍittho nānādeśakālāvasthāsaṃsṛṣṭaḥ piṇḍabhedaḥ so 'yamiti sannihitadeśakāla ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3243: na tvayaṃ piṇḍo ḍitthaśabda iti pratyayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3244: autsargikaṃ hi śabdānāmarthaparatvaṃ kvacit punarityādibhiḥ śabdaistadapodyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3246: tatrāpi śabdo vācyatvaparo na svarūpaparaḥ yathā gaurvāhīka iti lakṣyamāṇaguṇayogaparaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3247: na ca tanmātreṇa vāhīkasya gotvaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3248: tasmād bhinnayoreva śabdārthayoḥ saṃbandhagrahāt tanmūlatvācca śabdavyavahārasya na śabdapuraḥsaramapi jñānaṃ śabdasāmānādhikaraṇyamātmano 'rthasyāvagamayati
GSP29nystik_u:3249: yattu śabdānupāye 'pi jñāne śabdaḥ pūrvaṃ bhavati tadgṛhītasaṅketasya prathamamindriyārthasannikarṣādālocanena
GSP29nystik_u:3253: tena vyutpannasya nirvikalpakāt parāñcaḥ pratyayāḥ śabdānupāyā api śabdapuraḥsarā jāyante /
GSP29nystik_u:3256: piṇḍa eva hi dṛṣṭaḥ san saṃjñāṃ smārayituṃ kṣamaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:3257: tasmād vyutpannasyāpi nāmadheyasmaraṇāya pūrvameṣitavyo vinaiva nāmadheyamarthapratyayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3258: tadidam uktam--gṛhīte 'pi śabdārthasaṃbandhe asyārthasyāyaṃ śabdo nāmadheyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3259: yadā tu so 'rtho gṛhyate nāmadheyarahito nāmadheyasmaraṇāt pūrvamavikalpena tadā pūrvasmād avyutpannāvasthāyām arthajñānāt na viśiṣyate iti
GSP29nystik_u:3260: yato na viśiṣyate tasmāt tadarthajñānaṃ tādṛgeva bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3261: nanu parapratipādanādilakṣaṇavyavahārāya svarūpeṇa jñāne vyapadeṣṭavye yadarthavyapadeśena vyapadiśyate tadavagacchāmo 'rthavyapadeśākāramiti
GSP29nystik_u:3264: tasmāt punarapi tādātmyaṃ prasaktamityata āha--tasya tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:3265: arthākārameva tu jñānamarthavyapadeśena vyapadiśyate anyathā aśakyatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3268: tadevamarthajñānakāle sa na samākhyāśabdo vyāpriyate pratīyamānatayā,
GSP29nystik_u:3269: vyavahārakāle tu parapratyāyanakāle tu vyāpriyate kāraṇatayā /
GSP29nystik_u:3270: tadanena gopālāvipālādīnāṃ saṃjñāniveśanaṃ tāsu tāsu vyaktiṣu vyavahārotkarṣahetuḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3275: cākṣuṣaṃ hi rūpajñānaṃ rūpa eva niyataṃ na śabde pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:3276: evaṃ śrautramapi śabda eva niyataṃ na rūpādau pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:3282: asti hi tasya śrotraṃ ca śabdajñānaṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3284: asti hi tasya locanaṃ ca rūpajñānaṃ ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3285: aśabdo 'bhāva iti ca vivakṣitaviparītāpattiḥ śabdābhāvasyārthasya śabdatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:3286: aśabdatve vā sa evāsyārthaḥ śabdād bhinnaḥ prasajyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3295: indriyārthasannikarṣeṇa hi liṅgena yadindriyagātijñānaṃ tadapi pratyakṣalakṣaṇopetamiti pratyakṣaṃ prasajyata iti tannivāraṇāya avyapadeśyapadam
GSP29nystik_u:3303: ata evātīte 'pi dhūmādau liṅge tatsmaraṇamātrādevānumeyajñāna bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3304: na ca sannikarṣapadasya mukhyatve saṃbhavati jñānalakṣaṇā yuktetti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3307: kramaprāptasyāvyabhicāripadasya tātparyaṃ brūvāṇo bhāṣyasyāpi tātparyamāha--grīṣme marīcaya itīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3308: yadyapi sāmānyalakṣaṇenaiva vyabhicāriṇo nirastāḥ pratyayāḥ tadapekṣaṃ ca viśeṣalakṣaṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:3316: na khalvagṛhītaṃ liṅgaṃ vā śabdo vā āgamasahitaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vā yathāviṣayam ādadhāti pramām /
GSP29nystik_u:3319: śabdādau tu yadyapi pramopajananaṃ prati nārthāvyabhicāragrahāpekṣā,
GSP29nystik_u:3325: evaṃ yathā mudgastambastathā mudgaparṇīti āptavākyaśravaṇādeva mudgastambasādṛśyajñānasyānupajanitaphalasyāpi śakyaṃ tadarthāvyabhicāritvaṃ niśrcetum /
GSP29nystik_u:3326: pratyakṣasya tu pramāṇasyātyantaparokṣasvarūpolambha eva tāvat pramopajananāt prāg durlabhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3328: yadyapi ca saṃvedanaprāmāṇyapakṣe 'pi tatsaṃvedanaṃ manasā sulabham,
GSP29nystik_u:3330: api tu asādhāraṇendriyārthasannikarṣasahāyamiti tatsahāyasya tasya parokṣatvameva /
GSP29nystik_u:3332: na svarūpataḥ ityetat pramāṇāntarebhyo vyāvṛttamasādhāraṇaṃ pratyakṣasya rūpamādarśayitumavyabhicāripadopādānam /
GSP29nystik_u:3334: na hyasti saṃbhavo 'vyabhicaritapratyakṣagṛhītapakṣadharmatākaṃ tarkasahāyapratyakṣagṛhītāvinābhāvaṃ cānumānaṃ vyabhicāratīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3336: tadapi yadyapi prathamaṃ vyāptigrahaṇadoṣeṇa na khaṇḍitam,
GSP29nystik_u:3338: tathā ca vyāptigrāhi pratyakṣaṃ tatrāpi vyabhicārīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3339: evamāgamo 'pi sākṣāt kvacit pāramparyeṇa pratyakṣapūrvakastadvyabhicāreṇaiva vyabhicarati /
GSP29nystik_u:3341: tadevaṃ pratyakṣāvyabhicāre pramāṇānāmavyabhicāro 'stīti pratyakṣasyaiva viśeṣaṇamavyabhicāripadaṃ cakāra,
GSP29nystik_u:3350: tasmāt suṣṭhūkaṃ grīṣme marīcaya iti bhāṣyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3361: indriyeṇālocya marīcīn uccāvacamuccalato nirvikalpakena gṛhītvā paśrcāt tatropaghātadoṣād viparyeti,
GSP29nystik_u:3368: no khalu saṃśayajñānaṃ vikalpyamānavastugocaraṃ tadrūpaṃ vastu prāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3374: na ca tadevāsya preṣiturvi dhitsitam, tathehāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:3376: tathā hi vyavasāyo viniśrcayo vikalpa ityanarthāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:3377: sa evātmā rūpaṃ yasya tat savikalpakaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3378: tadetadatisphaṭatvāt śiṣyairgamyata eveti bhāṣyavārttikakārābhyām avyākhyātamapi asmābhiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3384: na cendriyārthābhyāṃ labdhajanma vijñānamarthāvabhāsaṃ śakyamabhilāpena yojanayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:3391: na hi rūpāt jāyamānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ rasasahitametadādarśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:3406: tathā hi yadabhilāpakalpanānugataṃ na tadarthasāmarthyajaṃ yatheśvarapradhānādivikalpavijñānam /
GSP29nystik_u:3407: tathā caite vivādādhyāsitā vikalpā iti vyāpakaviruddhopalabdhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3408: niṣedhyamarthasāmarthyajatvaṃ tadabhilāpakalpanānanugatatvena vyāptaṃ tadviruddhaṃ ca sadanugatatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3410: arthasāmarthyena hi tadutpadyamānamartharūpam anukuryād na śabdarūpam /
GSP29nystik_u:3411: na hyarthe śabdāḥ santi tadātmāno vetyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3414: yatra tarhi te kṛtasaṅketāḥ tadeva smārayedetān /
GSP29nystik_u:3415: tatraiva ca te kṛtasaṅketā yadanugataṃ sāmānyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3421: tasmād yad dṣṭaṃ na tena śabdānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3423: api ca dṛṣṭasya śabdavācyatve darśanādiva vahinaruṣṇa iti vākyādapi pratīyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3424: tathā ca śabdādapi tasmin pratīte śītāpanopanaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3426: tādṛśaṃ ca taddarśanasya kāraṇamiti nirvikalpakena prathamākṣatannipātajanmanā jātimadvastuvedanāt tatropalabdhacarasaṃbandhasya śabdasya smaraṇam
GSP29nystik_u:3427: tathā ca tacchabdābhidheyajātiviśiṣṭadravyāvagāhīndriyārthasannikarṣajanmā vikalpapratyayo gaurayamityevamākāro jāyata iti cet? yathāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3434: na hi jātijātibhantau vā kriyākriyāvantau va guṇaguṇinau vā tatsamavāyo vā vivekena cakāsati /
GSP29nystik_u:3435: na ca vivekenāpratibhāsamānaḥ śakyā mitho yojayituṃ kṣīrodakavadatadvedinā /
GSP29nystik_u:3444: api ca vastuniveśe jātyādīnāmupādhīnāmekasya vastunaḥ sattvaṃ ca dravyatvaṃ ca pārthivatvaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:3445: ca vṛkṣatvaṃ ca śiṃśapātvaṃ copādhaya iti dūrādekopādhiviśiṣṭasya grahe sarvopādhiviśiṣṭagrahaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3447: patanadharmaṇo hi badarasyottarasya kuṇḍamadharaṃ pratayāsannamapatanadharmakaṃ badaraṃ vidadhadādhāraḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3451: tasmāt svabhāva eva svakāraṇādhīnajanmā dravyasya sa tādṛśo yena bahūnāmupādhīnāmupakarotīti vācyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3452: tathā ca sattvopakārasamartheṃ tasmin dravye gṛhyamāṇe dravyatvādyupakārasamartho
GSP29nystik_u:3453: 'pi sa evāsya svabhāva iti tatsvabhāvāvacchinnāḥ sattvavikalpakena paramārthasaddravyāvagāhinā
GSP29nystik_u:3454: sarva eva dravyatvapārthivatvavṛkṣatvaśiśapātvādayo viṣayīkṛtā iti vikalpāntarāṇāmānarthakyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3462: asmākaṃ tu anādivikalpavāsanopādānā vikalpā yacca gṛhṇanti,
GSP29nystik_u:3463: yacca adhyavasyanita tayorūbhayorapyanyanivṛttirūpatayā avastutvāt matāgapi na paramārthasad vastu gāhante,
GSP29nystik_u:3464: pāramparyeṇa tu vastupratibandhāt tatra pravartayantaḥ prāpayantaśca na visaṃvādayanti lokam /
GSP29nystik_u:3466: api cālocite vastunīndriyeṇa tadanantarotpannaṃ śabdasmaraṇavyavahitavyāpāramindriyamarthaśrca na savikalpikāmapi dhiyamupajanayitumarhataḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3470: na ca yadevālocanamajījanadindriyaṃ tadeva smaraṇasahakāri vikalpapratyayamādhatte /
GSP29nystik_u:3483: viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ ca saṃbandhaṃ laukikīṃ sthitim /
GSP29nystik_u:3487: jātiguṇakriyāvatāṃ caitanna saṃbhavatyeva rūpavivekasaṃbandhayorapratibhāsanena ghaṭanāyogāt kṣīrodakavadatadvedinetyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3495: tena tajjanitaṃ jñānamarthasāmarthyajaṃ cābhilāpasaṃsargayogyapratibhāsaṃ ceti na virodhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3497: na ca dravyādyabhinnaṃ jātyādi bhinnaṃ kalpayanto vikalpā nārthasāmarthyajanmāna iti sāṃpratat /
GSP29nystik_u:3499: yathā ca bhede 'pi teṣāṃ tadvācakānāṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tathopapāditamadhastāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3500: na ca bhinnena śabdena ḍittho 'yamityabhedakalpanādarthasya vikalpānāmanarthajatvamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3508: śabdastu saṃpātāyāto na niveśayatyātmānam indriyaje vikalpe /
GSP29nystik_u:3511: cakṣuṣāpi sa evāyaṃ piṇḍaḥ saṃprati dṛśyate //
GSP29nystik_u:3515: saṃjñā hi smaryamāṇāpi pratyakṣatvaṃ na bādhate /
GSP29nystik_u:3520: na ca prāgavasthāsmaraṇasāpekṣatayā nendriyārthasannikarṣaḥ kāraṇaṃ vikalpasyeti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:3526: na hi nājījanat kuśūlasthaṃ bījamaṅkuramiti na samavahitakṣityādisahakārigrāmamapyasyājanakaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3527: na ca janakatvājanakatvalakṣaṇo viruddhadharmasaṃsargo bhedaheturityupapādayiṣyate kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge //
GSP29nystik_u:3530: na ca vartamāno 'rthaḥ smaraṇagocaraḥ smaraṇasyānubhavajanitasaṃskārodbodhajanmanaḥ pūrvānubhavagocaraṃ prati niyamāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3532: na hi rūpaviṣayāḥ sahasramapi nayanapradīpādayaḥ śabdaviṣayasya śravasaḥ sahakāritāmāpadyanta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3533: tat kiṃ bhavatāṃ yatra gandhajñānānantaraṃ cākṣuṣaṃ rūpajñānaṃ jāyate tatra gandhajñānam na samanantarapratyayaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:3534: tatrāpi hi cakṣūrūpaviṣayaṃ na gandhaviṣayasya jñānasya sahakāri bhavitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:3540: tathā satyākāśaparamāṇvādayo 'pi tatsaṃyuktā iti te 'pi pratyakṣāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:3558: yathā hyekasmin padmarāgamaṇau gṛhyamāṇe tadabhāvo vyavacchidyate,
GSP29nystik_u:3559: yadi punarnaṃ vyavacchidyeta tadā bhāvo na paricchidyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:3561: tadabhāvāvinābhāvinaśrca puṣparāgādaya iti te 'pi sarve vayavacchinna bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:3563: sa eva puṣparāgādyatmeti tadavinābhāvī padmarāgābhāvaḥ padmarāgaśrca syāditi durghaṭamāpadyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3570: tasmāt pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhādanyo 'paradeśakālasaṃbandha iti siddho viṣayabheda iti //
GSP29nystik_u:3577: tasmād viṣayabhodāt virodha iti cet---na tvihāpi tadekaṃ jñānaṃ tasyaivaikasya vastunaḥ pūrvadeśakālasaṃbandhe parokṣamaparokṣaṃ vā paradeśakālasaṃbandha iti ko virodhaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:3580: yato yuktaṃ yat padmarāgasvarūpagrahe tadabhāvo vyavacchidyata iti,
GSP29nystik_u:3585: tayoḥ kadācidapi tādā tmyenānupalambhāditi cet---yatra tarhi tādātmyamupalabhyate na tatra tadabhāvāvinābhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3586: tathā ca pūrvāparadeśakālasaṃbaddhastādātmyenānubhūyamāna indriyajena vikalpena padmarāgo na bhinno bhavitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:3587: tasmāt parvāparadeśakālau tatsaṃndhau vā kāmaṃ bhidyeyātāṃ parasparābhāvāvinābhāvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:3593: na cendriyārthasannikarṣābhāve 'pi pūrvāparāvasthāparāmarśātmano vikalpasya bhāvādanindriyajayatvamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP29nystik_u:3594: tathā satyavikalpakamapi kāmāturasya kāminīṃ bhāvayataḥ tadviṣayamindriyārthasannikarṣaṃ vināpi dṛṣṭamiti nīlādyanubhāvātmāno 'pi avikalpakā anindriyajāḥ prasajyeran /
GSP29nystik_u:3595: yadi tu nīlādyanubhavānāṃ kāminyanubhavāt kathañcid viśeṣaṃ brūyāta,
GSP29nystik_u:3596: tadā asmākamapi anindriyajebhyo vikalpebhya utprekṣāvyāpārebhyo 'stīndriyajānāṃ darśanavyāpārāṇāṃ bhedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3597: na ca vikalpagato darśanavyāpāro 'nubhūyamānaḥ sati saṃbhave nirvikalpakopādhiriti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3598: sarvā eva hīndriyajā buddhayo vikalpikā avikalpikā vā dhārāvāhinyo 'mahamikayā parasparānapekṣā ekamarthamavagāhamānā udayante vyayante ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3600: tasmāt indriyārthasannikarṣalabdhajanmāno vikalpā darśanavyāpārā nānya iti yuktamutpaśyamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3601: na ca śabdapratyakṣayorvastugocaratve satyapi pratyayābhedaḥ kāraṇabhedena pārokṣyāpārokṣyabhedopapatteḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3604: na caikopādhinā sattvena viśiṣṭe tasmin gṛhīte upādhyantaraviśiṣṭatadgrahaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3606: na tūpādhayo va tairviśiṣṭatvaṃ vā tasya svabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3607: na ca yat svabhāvasaṃbandhi sa svabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3610: api ca rūpajñānaṃ viṣayagrahaṇadharma nānāparamāṇuviṣayaṃ na paramāṇusvabhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3611: tatsvabhāvatve vā teṣāṃ sarvān pratyaviśeṣāt sarvaireva te paramāṇavo viditāḥ syuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3612: na cāsaṃbaddhā eva svajñānena rūpaparamāṇavo viṣayāstasyeti vācyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3614: svabhāva evārthajñānabhedayoḥ saṃbandho yadartho viṣayo jñānaṃ ca viṣayīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:3615: hantopādhyupādhimatorapi svabhāva eva saṃbandho 'stu tathāpi vijñānārthavanna svarūpābhedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3626: na tvasti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvo vāstava iti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:3631: tathā sati darśanavyāpāratvamasya sākṣāt samarthitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3634: hanta bhoḥ kiṃ mānasamapi jñānaṃ saṃkalayitumarhati?
GSP29nystik_u:3638: asmākaṃ tu manaḥ sarvaviṣayamapi acetanatayā na vicārakam /
GSP29nystik_u:3639: tasmādātmaiva sakalajñānatajjanitavāsanādhāraḥ smartā ca pratisandhātā ca /
GSP29nystik_u:3641: ātmanyeva sthitaṃ jñānaṃ sa hi boddhātra gamyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3642: smaraṇe cāsya sāmarthyaṃ sandhānādau ca vidyate //
GSP29nystik_u:3643: ślo. vā. pratyakṣa. 122 sa salvindriyārthasannikarṣādālocya jātimantaṃ saṃmugdhamartham udbuddhasaṃskārasamupajātapūrvapiṇḍānusmṛtisahāyaḥ prāgeva cakṣuṣā vikalpayati,
GSP29nystik_u:3646: karaṇaṃ cendriyaṃ buddheḥ kartā cātma sacetanaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3651: arthau hi rūparūpibhāvena sthitāvapi nāpātajanmanā jñānena tathā gṛhītau,
GSP29nystik_u:3655: savikalpakaṃ tūktasāmagrījanma jātyādirūpatayā dravyaṃ ca rūpitayā kalpayat paścājjāyamānamapīndriyārthasannikarṣaprabhavatayā pratyakṣaṃ bhavatyeva
GSP29nystik_u:3657: tat siddhametad vivādādhyāsitā vikalpāḥ svagocare pratyakṣā avyabhicāritve sati indriyārthasannikarṣajatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3658: yo ya evaṃbhūtaḥ sa sarpaḥ pratyakṣo yathālocanam,
GSP29nystik_u:3665: nanu satīndriyārthasannikarṣe purovartini dravye dhūma iti vā reṇuriti vā jñānamutpadyamānaṃ kathamanindriyajamityata āha--na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3667: saṃpūrvo hi śīḍ bhāvapratyayānto viśeṣāpekṣe vimarśe vartate sa caikādhikaraṇau smaryamāṇau mitho viruddhau dharmāvāropayan anyatarannāvadhārayati
GSP29nystik_u:3670: ata eva visphāritākṣāḥ saudāminīsaṃpātāt sakṛdālocya kañcit samānadharmavantaṃ dharmiṇaṃ samandhakāre sandigdhe,
GSP29nystik_u:3671: tasmānmānasa evaiṣa saṃśayo na tvindriyaja ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3672: tadetat pariharan na caitadityādi bhāṣyaṃ vcācaṣṭe---tacca naivam /
GSP29nystik_u:3678: indriyeṇopalabdhaṃ sannikṛṣṭaṃ sannikarṣapūrvakatvāduparladheḥ manasopalabhate jānīte cakṣuḥsahāyenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3679: atra bhāṣyaṃ yacca tadindrayānavadhāraṇapūrvakaṃ manasānavadhāraṇaṃ tadviśeṣapekṣaṃ vimarśamātraṃ saṃśayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3686: yaduparatendriyavyāpārasya saṃśayajñānaṃ dṛṣṭāntatayā hṛdi sthitaṃ śaṅkiturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3690: nanu smaraṇavyavahitavyāpāramasya kāraṇaṃ nendriyamityata āha--tasya hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:3691: upapāditametadadhastāt yathā smaraṇaṃ nendriyavyāpāraṃ vyavadhatta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3694: syādetat, mana evendriyānapekṣaṃ bāhye pravartate ityabhyupeyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3695: anyathā ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti jñānaṃ nirnimittaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3701: yadi ca ghaṭādau bāhye na manaḥ pravartena,
GSP29nystik_u:3706: tathā ca sarva eva saṃśayo mānasa ityāśaṅkyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3710: tathā ca saṃśayajñānotpāde apīndriyārthasannikarṣo 'pekṣaṇīya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3718: āntaraṃ ca mana ityata āha--pṛthak ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3722: tat kimatra prameyārthena pramāṇena ityata āha---na ca teṣāmiti nanūktaṃ svasaṃvedanatayā na pramākarmabhāva eṣāmityata āha--na cānyā gatiriti
GSP29nystik_u:3729: na sukhādi prameyaṃ vā mano vāstvindriyāntaram /
GSP29nystik_u:3752: api ca vaidharmyāt manovat śrotramapi na vaktavyamityāha--śrotre ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3757: darśayiṣyati hi vārttikakāro yathā svārthiko na kaśrcidapi pratyaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3760: tadadena sati cendriyārthasannikarṣe ityādi bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:3761: yaccāparaṃ vaidharmyaṃ ghrāṇādibhyo manasa uktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa tadapi siṃhāvalokanena dūṣayati---saguṇānāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:3762: ghrāṇādīni yathā svasvaguṇena gandhādinā bāhyaṃ gandhādi bodhayanti ,
GSP29nystik_u:3763: naivaṃ svaguṇena śabdena śrotraṃ bāhyaṃ śabdaṃ bodhayati,
GSP29nystik_u:3766: bhūtatvābhūtatvalakṣaṇaṃ vaidharmyaṃ na bhautikatvābhautikatvagrahaṇena śakyaṃ vaktumityavadhāraṇābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3769: tabhdāvānavagame ca nendriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ sukhādijñānaṃ śakyaṃ vaktumityata āha--tantrāntareti /
GSP29nystik_u:3770: tantryate vyutpādyate anena tattvamiti tantraṃ śāstram /
GSP29nystik_u:3777: sarvasya tantrāntare loke ca siddhatvādavaktavyatāyāṃ svamatamiti nāsti /
GSP29nystik_u:3778: vacanaliṅgaṃ hi matājñānaṃ na cānanumate niṣedhamātraṃ śakyaṃ vaktum,
GSP29nystik_u:3785: indriyārthasannikarṣotvannaṃ jñānamavyabhicārīti hi pratayakṣalakṣaṇamanavayavena samānāsamānajātīyebhyo vyāvṛttaṃ śakyameva lakṣayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:3786: na khalvayamasāvaśva iti jñānamindriyajaṃ śabdajaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3790: tatra dravyamaindriyakameva na śābdamityaśakyaṃ hi jñānaṃ vyavacchettum,
GSP29nystik_u:3797: atha na vācyatvaṃ nāma mīmāṃsakānāmiva kiñcidatīndriyam,
GSP29nystik_u:3806: vyavasāyātmakapadena tu savikalpake jñāne 'varuddhe nirvikalpakasyāpratyakṣatā mā
GSP29nystik_u:3813: dvipadaparigraheṇa daśa--indriyārthasannikarṣotpannapadaṃ dhravaṃ kṛtvā jñānādyekaikapadasaṃbandhena carastraḥ koṭayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3814: jñānaṃ ca ghavaṃ kṛtvā avyapadeśyādi ekaikapadasaṃbandhena tistraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3815: evamavyapadeśyapadaṃ dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādyekaikapadasaṃbandhena dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3818: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyapadeśyādyekaikapadasaṃbandhe tistraḥ koṭayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3819: jñānamavyapadeśyamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādipadasaṃbandhena dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3821: avyabhicārivyavasāyātmakapadayostu dhruvayorindriyārthasannikarṣotpanna padena jñānapadena ca pratyekaṃ saṃbandhe koṭidvayam,
GSP29nystik_u:3824: indriyārthasannikarṣotpannaṃ jñānamavyapadeśyamiti dhruvaṃ kṛtvā avyabhicāryādyekaikasaṃbandhe dve koṭī,
GSP29nystik_u:3829: na hyatra tadvyavacchedavācakaḥ kaśrcidasti śabda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3835: tadevaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ samarthya vāsubandhavaṃ tāvat pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitum upanyasyati--apare punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:3838: yadi tata eva tabhdavati nārthāntarād vyapadeśāsaṃbandhinaḥ tat pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3839: ata eva vyapadeśāsaṃbandhino 'rthāntarāt śuktirūpāt rajatena vyapadiśyāmānaṃ śuktijñānaṃ na pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:3842: etasya pratyakṣābhāsasya vyāvṛttiḥ suprasiddheti tāmupekṣyānumānavyāvṛttim āha--eteneti /
GSP29nystik_u:3843: kutaḥ? na hi tata eva vyapadeśakādeva vahneḥ tad vijñānamanumānaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:3845: tataśca yatra tu dṛṣṭamātra eva vahnerūparamāduparato dhūmaḥ tatrānyataśrca tabhdavati smaryamāṇād dhūmādasati vyapadeśake vahnau /
GSP29nystik_u:3846: tato 'rthāt ityatra hi arthaviśeṣaṇaṃ tata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3851: na hi jñānavyapadeśa ātmanā vā indriyeṇa vā saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3856: asati cārthapade kasyedaṃ viśeṣaṇam iti viśeṣaṇasaṃgato naivakāro 'yogaṃ vyavacchindāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3859: anyathā abhidhānāparyavasānād yasya tad vyapadiṣyata iti vyapadeśasaṃbandhī viśeṣyaḥ prāpyata eveti sidhyatyeva viśeṣaṇatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:3868: tathā cānumānādyapi liṅgajñānādestata upajāyate iti pratyakṣaṃ prasajyeteti tannivṛttyarthamarthāditi vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3872: yasya tad vyapadiśyate ityapekṣya tataḥśabdasāmarthyenānumānādivyudāso 'pi pratyuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3876: tat pratyakṣaṃ tato ghaṭa ityapi jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ prasajyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:3879: tasya vicārāsahatayā paramārthasattvābhāvena saṃvṛtisato vijñānaṃ prati kāraṇabhāvābhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3883: rūpādiparamāṇava eva nirantarotpādāḥ paramārthasanto bhinnāḥ svavijñānasyāvikalpakasya janakāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3884: teṣāṃ tu nānātvaṃ svena rūpeṇa saṃvṛṇvatī nirvikalpakapṛṣṭhabhāvinī ghaṭa iti vikalpikā buddhiḥ tāneva rūpādīn ekodakāharaṇādikriyākāriṇo bhedina iva darśayantī saṃvṛtirityucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3887: nirākaroti--manomodaketi bhavantu vyatiriktāḥ kimetāvatāpītyata āha--sarvaṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3888: yatsaṃvṛtitvena bhavatāmabhimataṃ yaccāvikalpakaṃ tatsarvaṃ svaviṣayād bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3891: mithyājñānanivṛttyarthaṃ bhaviṣyatīti codayati---nanu ca mithyājñānamatasmādapi bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:3892: yathā purovarti dravyamidamiti vyapadiśyate rajatamiti na,
GSP29nystik_u:3894: tena yadyapi sāmānyarūpeṇa tasya vyapadiśyate jñānam,
GSP29nystik_u:3896: tathāpi yena viśeṣaṇarūpeṇa tasya vayapadiśyate na tatastabhdavati iti atasmādapītyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:3897: tasmāt tata eva yabhdavati tat pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:3900: pariharati--na hyatasmāt āropitādrūpāt tatrāsataḥ tat mithyajñānaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:3902: yasya sāmānyarūpasya vyapadiśyata idamiti tata eva /
GSP29nystik_u:3908: yato bhavati jñānaṃ sa grāhyo 'rthaḥ kāraṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:3910: tayorayugapabhdāvāt vartamānābhaṃ jñānamatīte mithyeti na pratyakṣaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3914: kṣaṇikatvād bhāvānāṃ kāraṇasaya nāśaḥ kāryasyotpāda ityekaḥ kālaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:3918: bhinnakālaṃ kathaṃ grāhyamiti ced grāhyatāṃ viduḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3930: tathā sati jñānametasmin mithyeti kathaṃ pratyakṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:3934: na ca gauṇamukhyalakṣaṇā girāṃ gatayo jñāneṣuśakyā niyojayitum bhinnaprasthānatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:3935: tasmāt nirākāraṃ jñānamātmano bhinnaṃ gocarayatīti vācyam /
GSP29nystik_u:3936: sa cet kāraṇaṃ vinaṣṭasya pratyakṣateti tathā ca vartamānābhamavartamānaṃ gocarayati mithyātvamapratyakṣatvaṃ ca syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3943: yadṛcchāśabdeṣu hi nāmnā viśiṣṭo 'rtha ucyate ḍittha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:3948: seyaṃ kalpanā yatra jñāne nāstyarthataḥ svarūpato vā tatkalpanayā apoḍhaṃ pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:3949: tadidamāha--yat kila na nāmnā abhidhīyate arthataḥ svarūpataśrca na jātyādibhirvyapadiśyate /
GSP29nystik_u:3962: tasmānna avikalpakaṃ jñānaṃ tadgocaraṃ vā paramārthasad gocarayanti vikalpāḥ śabdāścetyayamabhisandhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:3967: na hi yathā samyagjñānam adhikṛtya pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ kīrtinā tathā dignāgena yenādhikārāt jñāne vyavatiṣṭheta kalpanāpoḍhamiti bhāvaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:3968: nanu yadi svarūpato nābhidhīyetānabhidheyaṃ tarhi vastu prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:3969: tathā cāvāstavaḥ syāt śābdo vyavahāra ityata āha--sarvasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:3979: athāścakarṇādivadavyutpannaḥ kalpanāpoḍhaśabdaḥ pratyakṣasvarūpasya vācaka iti śaṅkate--atheti /
GSP29nystik_u:3981: bhavatu kalpanāpoḍhaśabdaḥ avyutpanno mā vā bhūt,
GSP29nystik_u:3990: asti ca mithyājñāne 'pi bodhyena saṃbandha indriyāṇām,
GSP29nystik_u:3992: atha yathā bodhyaṃ tādṛśo nāsti saṃbandha indriyāṇām,
GSP29nystik_u:3997: api ca prābhākare darśane anumānādijñānamātmani pratyakṣaṃ na bhavet,
GSP29nystik_u:4004: NyS_1,1.5: atha tatpūrvakaṃ trividham anumānaṃ pūrvavaccheṣavatsāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ ca //
GSP29nystik_u:4006: atrānumānamiti sidvavat pramāṇāviśeṣarūpalakṣyānuvāda eva nāpratyakṣaṃ pramāṇamityaprāmāṇyamanumānasya sudūdaṃ pratikṣipati /
GSP29nystik_u:4007: dṛṣṭaprāmāṇyāprāmāṇyavijñānavyaktisādharmyeṇa hi kāsāṃcid vyaktīnāṃ prāmāṇyamaprāmāṇyaṃ vā vidadhīta /
GSP29nystik_u:4008: dṛṣṭasādharmyaṃ cānumānam eveti kathaṃ tenaiva tasyāprāmāṇyam?
GSP29nystik_u:4009: api cānumānamapramāṇamiti vākyaprayogo 'jñaṃ vipratipannaṃ sandigdhaṃ vā puruṣaṃ pratyarthaṃvān /
GSP29nystik_u:4010: na ca parapuruṣavartino dehadharmā api sandehājñānaviparyāsā gauratvādivat pratyakṣamīkṣante /
GSP29nystik_u:4014: jāno nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka ityunmattavadanavadheyavacanaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4028: anumānādipūrvakaṃ cānumānaṃ na pratyakṣapūrvakamiti nānumānaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4032: tatra prathame vigrahe tānītyanantaraṃ sūtram uvallaṅghya vibhāgasūtragatāḥ pratyakṣādayaḥ saṃbandhanīyāḥ yogyatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4041: te iti vigrahe anantarasūtragatameva pratyakṣapadaṃ saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4042: yathā ca dve pratyakṣe pūrve yasya pratyakṣasya liṅgaparāmarśajñānasya pratyakṣaphalasya /
GSP29nystik_u:4050: atha tadarthaviṣaye dvitīye pratyakṣe sati yā tatpadaviṣayā smṛtirutpadyate sāpi pratyakṣadvayapūrvā /
GSP29nystik_u:4051: evaṃ liṅgalliṅgsiṃbandhasmṛtirapi pratyakṣadvayapūrveti tadavasthaivātivyāptirityāśayavān pṛcchati--- katare dve iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4056: vyāptisaṃskārobdodha samayajanmanā svajanitena saṃskāreṇāsya vyāptismaraṇasamaye vināśāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4057: vinaśyadavasthasya dvitīyaliṅgadarśanasya vyāptismaraṇena saha yaugapadye 'pi tayoḥ parasparavārtānabhijñatayā mitho ghaṭanāyogaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4061: tasmād ubhābhyāmutpannaṃ parāmarśajñānamindriyārthasannikarṣajaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pratyakṣam eṣitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4070: tatra yo buddhau sākṣādātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ niveśayati sa pratyakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4071: sa hi svaviṣayāyā buddheḥ janaka iti tamantareṇa buddhirātmānamanāsādayantī tasya sattā niścāyayatīti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4076: sa hi pratibaddhasvabhāvo yathāvidhaḥ siddhaḥ tathāvidhasannidhānaṃ sūcayati /
GSP29nystik_u:4078: tathā sati sa śyāmo maitanayatvāt paridṛśyamānamaitratanayastomavadityapyanumānaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4081: yathāha kāryakāraṇabhāvād vā svabhāvād vā niyāmakāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4083: tathā ca liṅgavikalpaṃ vinā na liṅgivikalpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4086: na cāvinābhūtaṃ liṅgaṃ vinā liṅginamiti liṅgisvalakṣaṇāpratibhāsyapi pāramparyeṇa tatpratibandhāt tatrāvisaṃvādako 'numānavikalpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4088: asmin sati bhavati satsvapi tadanyeṣvasminnasati na bhavati evamākāro nānvayavyatirekābhyāmatiricyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4090: tathā hi satyagnau dhūma iti pratyakṣameva vikalpānugatavyāpāramadhyavasyati /
GSP29nystik_u:4091: asati cāgnau na dhūma ityapi pratyakṣameva,
GSP29nystik_u:4095: yathā sattvasya kṣaṇikatayā saha tādātmyaṃ vipakṣai'kṣaṇike kramākramayorvyāpakayoranupalambhanniścīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4099: tasya yatra pratibandhaḥ tadvidastasya tadgamakaṃ tatretyanujānīmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4100: sa eva tu pratibandho na tāvat tadutpattyā saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4103: sa tādṛśo 'sti rāsabhasyāpīti tatpratibaddho 'pi dhūmaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4105: na ca rāsabhānantaraṃ bhavannapi tadanantarameva bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:4107: asatyapi tasmin sati ādrendhanavati vahnau tadbhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4108: atha yadyapi dhūmasya vahnibhāvābhāvānuvidhānaṃ tatropalabdhaṃ tathāpi deśāntarādiṣu tadbhāvo 'sya kutastyaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:4109: tathā hi bhūyo bhūyo rāsabhe dṛṣṭe dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4112: tajjātīyasyaiva dhūmasya rāsabhaṃ vinā sati vahnau bhāvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4113: evaṃ satyapyagnau piśācena janito dhūmaḥ kvacit deśādau tajjātīya eva rāsabhavad vahnyabhāve 'pi piśācādeva bhaviṣyatīti,
GSP29nystik_u:4120: yo yo dhūmo dṛṣṭaḥ sa sarvastāvadārdrendhanasahitavahnyanantarameva na piśācānantaram /
GSP29nystik_u:4121: sa ca kādācitkatayā nimittamapekṣamāṇo yadanantarameva gamyate tadevāpratītavyabhicāraṃ nimittīkaroti,
GSP29nystik_u:4124: yadi na tannimittaṃ kasmāt vināpi vahni kvacid dhūmo nopalabhyate?
GSP29nystik_u:4126: tathā satyādrendhanavat kathaṃ vahnirapi na kāraṇam?
GSP29nystik_u:4128: akāraṇasya hi kāryasya nityaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vā syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4133: vahnyanantarameva bhāva iti hi dhūmasya vahnikāryatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:4134: sa cet avahnerapyanantaraṃ naivakārārthaḥ syāditi na vahneḥ kāryam /
GSP29nystik_u:4141: tadeva tu tadanantarameva bhāva ityevaṃrūpaṃ nāsti /
GSP29nystik_u:4142: yadyapi ca vinā vahni nopalabdho dhūmo yadyapi ca piśācānantaraṃ nopalabhyate teṣāmanupalabdheḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4143: tathāpi piśācakārya eva dhūmasyatra tatra vahniḥ kutaścit svahetorūpanipatito rāsabha iva na tu dhūmasya janamaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4144: tena tadabhāve 'pi tajjātīya eva kāraṇabhedajanmā kadācit kādācitko dhūmaḥ syāditi anivṛttireva śaṅkāyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4145: na dṛṣṭasaṃbhave nādṛṣṭaṃ kalpayituṃ yuktamiti śakyaṃ bhavadbhirvaktum,
GSP29nystik_u:4149: na ca yad yadanyasahitānantaram mupalabdhaṃ tat tadanyarahitāt tasmād bhavad bhinnajātīyaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4150: uktaṃ hi rāsabhasahitād vahneryādṛśo dhūmaḥ tādṛśa eva tadvirahitād vahneriti /
GSP29nystik_u:4151: tasmādevaṃvidhā śaṅkāpiśācī svanivārakaṃ tadutpattiniścayamāskandantī na śakyā nivārayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:4153: tathāpi kasmāt kāraṇamantareṇa na kāryaṃ bhavati?
GSP29nystik_u:4158: astu tarhi saṃbandhaḥ svābhāvikatayā anyānapekṣo 'vyabhicārī gamakāṅgam /
GSP29nystik_u:4159: sa ca yo vā sa vā bhavatu,
GSP29nystik_u:4162: api ca kāryāt kāraṇamanumīyamānaṃ tataḥ pūrvamevānumīyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:4166: na hi nadīpūrabhedaḥ svasattāsamayavarti varṣaṃ gamayatyapi tu tatpūrvakālam /
GSP29nystik_u:4168: ata eva sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāvena tatkālavartina varṣe sandihānā na tadarthinaḥ pravartante /
GSP29nystik_u:4171: tathā ca sati na tadarthinaḥ tatra niḥśaṅkaṃ pravarteran /
GSP29nystik_u:4173: na cānayorasti kā kāraṇabhāvaḥ tādātmyaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:4175: sa svakāraṇaṃ pūrvarūpakṣaṇamanumāpayan yādṛśā tena janitaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4177: sa cānumāpakarasakṣaṇasamānakālarūpakṣaṇāntarajanaka eva svakāraṇam iti tādṛśameva gamayati /
GSP29nystik_u:4186: sa kiṃ tajjanakasya rūpakṣaṇasya svabhāva ata tatsvabhāvāvacchedako 'svabhāvabhūtaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:4192: nanu naitāvatāpyasya tulyakālasya rūpasya kāraṇabhāva iti kathaṃ kāryaṃ hetorgamyeta?
GSP29nystik_u:4195: sa kiṃ kāraṇānumiteḥ prāgathānumitisamaye paścād vā?
GSP29nystik_u:4196: na tāvat prāk na hi sattāmātreṇa kāraṇaṃ tad gamayatyatiprasaṅgāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4203: tathā ca rasāt kāryāt tatkāraṇaṃ rūpamanumātavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4204: tathā ca kāraṇāt kāryānumānaṃ tādātmyatadutpattibhyāmanyata iti nābhyāmeva pratibandhasiddhiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4208: na ca lakṣaṇānurodhena lakṣyasyānyathākaraṇaṃ yuktaṃ parīkṣakāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4220: na hi tadeva karma ca kartṛ ceti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4222: yadyapi ca vṛkṣatvaśiṃśapātve paramārthato na bhinne tathāpi bhedāntarapratikṣepāpratikṣepābhyāṃ kalpitabhedayorgamyagamakabhāva iti cet---na,
GSP29nystik_u:4224: api ca kālpanikamapi rūpaṃ vicāryamāṇaṃ na yathā bhinnamevamabhinnamapi na bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:4235: uktaṃ hi yathā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na bhāvānāmabhedasādhakam /
GSP29nystik_u:4236: jātyādiśabdā hi jātyādīn nimittīkṛtya dravye vartante /
GSP29nystik_u:4240: tasmād yatra gamyagamakabhāvo na tatra tādātmyam,
GSP29nystik_u:4241: yatra tādātmyaṃ na tatra gamyagamakabhāva iti saddhim /
GSP29nystik_u:4243: tasmāduccatvameva vṛkṣaśabdapravṛttinimittamiti manyamānaṃ mūḍhaṃ prati śiṃśapātvena vṛkṣavyavahāramātraṃ sādhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4246: tatrāpi ced vyavahāraḥ sādhyaḥ sa śiṃśapāyā bhinna iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4253: asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃbandhyekāryasamavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam vai. sū. 9/2/1 //
GSP29nystik_u:4254: iti, atrāpi saṃbandhipadenaiva sarvāpasaṃgrahāt śeṣābhighānaṃ vyartham /
GSP29nystik_u:4256: tathā sati śeṣapadānyeva santu kṛtaṃ saṃbandhipadena,
GSP29nystik_u:4261: api ca bhūtaṃ varṣam abhūtasya vāyvabhrasaṃyogasya kathaṃ virodhi?
GSP29nystik_u:4262: taddhi tadanukūlameva evam abhūtam varṣaṃ bhūtasya vāyyabhrasaṃyogasyāpratikūlam /
GSP29nystik_u:4263: evaṃ bhūto nakulajayo na bhūtasya sarpaparājayasya virodhī /
GSP29nystik_u:4271: tasmād yo vā sa vāstu saṃbandhaḥ kevalaṃ yasyāsau svābhāviko niyataḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4272: sa eva gamako gamyaścetaraḥ saṃbandhīti yujyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4279: tato na niyataḥ svābhāvikastu dhūmādīnā vahnyādisaṃbandhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4281: kvacid vyabhicārasyādarśanāt māno 'pi darśanānarhatayā sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhovana sandihyamāna upādhiḥ saṃbandhasya svābhāvikatva pratibadhnātīti sāṃpratam //
GSP29nystik_u:4283: iti dattāvakāśā khalviyaṃ laukikapramāṇāmaryādātikrameṇa śaṅkāśicī labdhrapasarā na kvacit nāstīti nāyaṃ kvacit pravarteta /
GSP29nystik_u:4292: tasmādupādhi prayatnenānviṣyanto 'nupalabhyamānā nāstītyavagamya svābhāvikatvaṃ saṃbandhasya niścinumaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4294: anyenānyasya sahakāreṇa cet svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho bhavet,
GSP29nystik_u:4304: nanveṣa svabhāvānāmanuyogo bhinnānāmakāryakāraṇabhūtānāmapi svabhāvapratibandhe tulya eva /
GSP29nystik_u:4306: kaḥ punaḥ pramāṇena svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho gṛhyate?
GSP29nystik_u:4309: yadā tāvat prathamaṃ vahnidhūmayoḥ sahādrendhanayoḥ saṃbandhaṃ paśyati tadā dvayorapi kiṃ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandha aupādhiko vā?
GSP29nystik_u:4311: vahnervaupādhiko dhūmasya tu svābhāvika iti na śakyaṃ nirdhārayitum /
GSP29nystik_u:4312: tatra vahneranārdrendhanasya vinādhūmamayogolakādau darśanād ādrendhanopādhirasya dhūmena saṃbandho,
GSP29nystik_u:4314: dhūmaviśeṣasya tu vinā vahnimanupalabhbhād upādhibhedasya cādṛśyamānasya kalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvād viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣasya ca saṃśayasyānupalabdhapūrve
GSP29nystik_u:4315: utpāde vā atiprasaṅgāt prekṣāvatāṃ pravṛttyucchedāt svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ avadhāryate /
GSP29nystik_u:4319: na hi mano nimittam ityeva mānasaṃ pratyakṣaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4322: tattadasādhāraṇakāraṇāpekṣayo tu tatpramāṇavyapadeśe atrāpi bhūyodarśanam asādhāraṇamiti pramāṇāntaraṃ jātam /
GSP29nystik_u:4324: evaṃ mānāntaraviditasaṃbandhiṣu mānāntarāṇyeva yathāsvaṃ bhūyodarśanasahāyāni svābhāvikasaṃbandhagrahaṇe pramāṇamunnetavyāni /
GSP29nystik_u:4325: svabhāvataśca pratibaddhā hetavaḥ svasādhyena yadi sādhyamantareṇa bhaveyuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4326: svabhāvādeva pracyaveranniti tarkasahāyā nirastasādhyavyatirekavṛttisandehā yatra dṛṣṭāḥ tatra svasādhyamupasthāpayantyeva /
GSP29nystik_u:4328: annapānapariṇatibhedasyopādheḥ śyāmatāyā maitratanayasaṃbandhaṃ prati vidyamānatvena maitratanayatvasyāgamakatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4329: etena pakvānyasya vṛkṣasyāgravartīni phalāni etadvṛkṣaprabhavatvāt patitaphalavadityādayo 'pyaupādhikasaṃbandhā vyākhyātāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4331: nanvantimapratyakṣamatītābhyāṃ pratyakṣābhyāṃ kathamanugṛhyate ityata āha---smṛtyā ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4336: saṃbandhasamṛtisahakāriṇā indriyeṇa svasādhyāvinābhūtaliṅgavijñānaṃ yadupajanyate tat parāmarśa
GSP29nystik_u:4338: tathābhūtaliṅgagocara eva caturtho vākyāvayava upanaya ityākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4344: sa ca liṅgaviṣayaḥ kriyā ca liṅgiviṣayeti viṣayavaiṣamyāt na kriyākaraṇabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4350: vṛkṣoddeśena pravartitaḥ paraśuḥ kartrā na tadavayavoddeśena,
GSP29nystik_u:4358: na kevalaṃ samānaviṣayatvāniyamaḥ kartuḥ karaṇaṃ bhinnamityapi niyamo nāstītyaniyamābhidhānaprasaṅgenāha-kvacit punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:4359: sthitiḥ sāvayaveṣu samavāyo vā pradeśaviśeṣe saṃyogo vā /
GSP29nystik_u:4360: evamaniyamaṃ dṛṣṭānta uktvā dārṣṭāntike yojayati---evamanyaviṣayasyeti dhūmaviṣayasya pramāṇasyāgniviṣayā kriyā pramitiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4361: yadā agniviṣayameva jñānaṃ pramāṇaṃ tatrāha---kvacit punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:4368: yadi anyaviṣayaṃ karaṇamanyaviṣayā kriyā bhavet tataśchedane khadiraṃ prāpte panasādāvapi cchidā syādityatiprasaṅgaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4369: yadyapi vṛkṣoddeśena kartrā paraśuḥ prayuktastathāpyayaṃ vṛkṣamiva tadavayavānapi prāpta iti tadviṣayo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4370: tena tadavayavadvaidhībhāvamukhena vṛkṣaviṣayāmapi dvaidhībhāvakriyāṃ janayatīti na vaiyadhikaraṇyaṃ karaṇaphalayoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4374: na tu liṅgajñānaṃ liṅginaṃ vinā na nirūpyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4375: tasmāt pratipattayanubandhitayā viṣayo na liṅgajñānasya liṅgī,
GSP29nystik_u:4385: sthitau tu bhedo darśayiṣyate kartuḥ karaṇasya ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4386: tadevaṃ tāni te iti vigrahadvayaṃ parasparāpekṣamupapādya tāni taditi vigrahadvayaṃ parasparāpekṣamupapādayati---yadā punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:4387: liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhadarśanaṃ ca anantaraliṅgadarśanaṃ ca tatsmṛtiśceti vigrahaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4390: nanu yadi pramāṇaphalayorekaviṣayatvaṃ tarhi parāmarśajñānaviṣayīkṛta evārtho viṣayīkartavyo nānyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4391: sa ca pratyakṣapramāṇaviṣaya eveti kṛtamanumānenetyāśayavān pṛcchati---kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:4394: pratyakṣapramitāt liṅgādanyo liṅgī tadviṣayatvaṃ ca liṅgaparāmarśasyoktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4398: na tvanumitiranumānaṃ pramāṇavyāpāratvenātannimittatvāt karaṇakārakādanyatvād atatpūrvakatvācceti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4405: saṃbhavati hi tasyāpi siddhasya phalabhāvanāyāṃ nimittatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:4407: etasmiśca kalpe tatpūrvakamityatra tadā hānādisaṃbandhāvadhāraṇasamaye prathamaṃ vahnitvasya liṅgasya darśanam,
GSP29nystik_u:4410: tatpūrvako hi tathā cāyamanumīyamāno vahniriti liṅgaparāmarśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4425: tat kimidānīṃ nāstyeva guṇapradhānabhāva ityata āha---pradhāneti /
GSP29nystik_u:4426: nānvayavyatirekāvatra prabhavato na tu nyāyāntaramiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4440: na ca saṃskāraḥ pratyakṣapūrvo 'pi tādṛśajñānakāraṇamiti na tasya prasaṅga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4442: vibhāgasūtrākṣiptapramāṇasāmānyalakṣaṇapūrvakaṃ viśeṣapramāṇalakṣaṇaṃ tadapekṣaṃ pravartamānaṃ nānupajanitaphale 'pramāṇe nirṇayamātre pravartitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:4451: anvayimātrāt vyatirekimātrācca vyāvṛtto 'nvayavyatirekī darśanīya iti hetutrayasādhāraṇe abādhitaviṣayatvātsatpratipakṣatve satī api heturūpe na darśite /
GSP29nystik_u:4458: tathā cāyaṃ nityebhya ākāśādibhyo ghaṭādiṣu cānityeṣvanvita iti bhavatyanvayavyatirekī /
GSP29nystik_u:4463: tena hetoryato vipakṣānnivṛttiḥ sa eva nāstīti kuto nivartatām,
GSP29nystik_u:4468: yasyābhāvādhikaraṇatvamapi na saṃbhavati nirūpākhyasya tasya bhāvādhikaraṇatvaśaṅketi subhāṣitam /
GSP29nystik_u:4469: na khalu mumurṣosatoyābhyavahāre 'pyasamarthasya śaṣkulībhakṣaṇaṃ śaṅkate cetanaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4470: tat kimidānīṃ bhāvābhāvau na parasparābhāvātmānau yadekaniṣedhenānyavidhiḥ syāt?
GSP29nystik_u:4471: satyam, yatraikatara etayorniṣidhyate vidhīyate vā tatra taditaravidharniṣedho vāvaśyaṃ bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:4474: nanu nirūpākhyo niṣedhādhikaraṇamiti ca vacaḥ svacaritaviruddham /
GSP29nystik_u:4475: na caitat tattvato nirūpākhye hetorvyatirekaṃ vā hetuṃ vā vyāsedhāmo nāpyanvayaṃ vidadhmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4479: atha nirūpākhye hetorvyatireka ityasya bhavadbhāṣitasya ko 'rthaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:4480: ahṛdayavācāṃ khalayahṛdayā eva prativāco bhavanti bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:4485: svābhāvikarūpasaṃpannaṃ hi pramāṇaṃ tattvajñānarūphalāya kalpate na kalpitarūpasaṃpadā,
GSP29nystik_u:4488: tasmādanupākhye vipakṣe hetorvyatirekanivṛttau vā vyatireke vā hetupravṛttau vā sahṛdayānāṃ mūkataivocitā /
GSP29nystik_u:4494: vipakṣasaṃbhave tu tatrāpi hetuvṛttiśaṅkānirākaraṇāya vyatirekagrahaṇam upāsanīyamiti sarvamavadātam //
GSP29nystik_u:4497: paramāṇvākāśādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvāt ghaṭavadityādayo draṣṭavyāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4500: tamimaṃ vyatirekiṇaṃ hetvavayavalakṣaṇavyākhyānāvasare vārttikakṛd upapādayiṣyatīti nehopapāditaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4501: tadevaṃ trividhamityavacchidya vyutpādya saṃprati pūrvavadityādinā ekavākyatayā vyācaṣṭa---atha vā trividhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4502: tisṛṣvapi vidhāsu sādhyavacanasya pūrvamapapādanāt pūrvaṃ sādhyaṃ tad yasyāstyadhikaraṇatayā tatpūrvavat /
GSP29nystik_u:4503: tathāpyanityāḥ paramāṇavo gandhavattvād ghaṭavadityapi hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4506: asti gandhavattvasya sādhyaṃ na tu vyāptyā,
GSP29nystik_u:4514: tathā ca bādhitaviṣayaṃ prakaraṇasamaṃ cānumānaṃ syādityata āha---caśabdāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4517: nanvevaṃ trividho 'pi hetuḥ pañcalakṣaṇaḥ syādityata āha---evamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4518: etaduktaṃ bhavati abādhitaviṣayamasatpratipakṣaṃ pūrvavaditi ca dhruvaṃ kṛtvā śeṣavadityekā vidhā,
GSP29nystik_u:4524: tadevaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya bhāṣyakṛnmatena vyācaṣṭa---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:4527: tad yasyāsti viṣayatayā parāmarśajñānasyānumānasya tat pūrvavadityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4535: kiṃ tarhi abhyupeyate ityata āha--kāryaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:4543: tathāpi yādṛśaṃ na vyabhicarati tatra nipuṇena pratipatrā bhavitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4544: anyathā dhūmamātramapi vahnisattāṃ vyabhicaratīti na dhūmaviśeṣo gamako bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:4546: api cāntyatantusaṃyogānantaraṃ paṭo jāyate tatrāpi śakyaṃ kāraṇāt kāryānumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4547: yadā khalvayamanyata evodbuddhasaṃskāro vyāptismṛtimān aviraleṣvitareṣu tantuṣu antyatantāvutpannāyāṃ kriyāyāmindriyasannikarṣāt prathamameva parāmṛśati tathā ceyamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:4550: tadā parāmarśāt tasmādavaśyaṃbhāvipaṭaviśiṣṭeyaṃ kriyetyanumānotpāda ityekaḥ kālaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4554: atha pratyakṣadarśanam ityanumānotpādasya parastāccaturthe kṣaṇe pratyakṣam /
GSP29nystik_u:4556: tathāpi tṛtīye kṣaṇe pratyakṣasya utpāda iti nānavasaramanumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4557: api ca badhiro murajamukhamabhihatya svapāṇinābhighātādeva śabdakāraṇāt tatkāryaṃ śabdaṃ niḥśaṅkamanumimīte /
GSP29nystik_u:4563: na tu vṛṣṭiranumīyamānā pūraviśeṣāt nātītā śakyānumātum,
GSP29nystik_u:4568: kāraṇasya hi kāryāt pūrvakālatā śakyā niścetum kāryeṇa liṅgena /
GSP29nystik_u:4571: sa ca kāryasya purastāt tato niścayavyāpta ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4574: atrāpi kāryeṇa saviturdeśāntaraprāptyā tatkāraṇasya vrajyāyā anumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4578: sādhyadharmāvinābhāvinā viśeṣaṇena sādhanadharmeṇa viśiṣyamāṇo dharmo gamyate gamakatvena /
GSP29nystik_u:4582: sa eva cobhayātmāṣa gamyo gamaka iṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4587: sāmānyenāvinābhāvinā hetunā avacchinnaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ dharmirūpamanumānaṃ sāmānyato dṛṣṭamanumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4589: tadetat pūrvavaccheṣavatorapi prāpakamapi tatpadasannidhānāt gobalīvardanyāyena te parityajyānyatra niviśate /
GSP29nystik_u:4597: deśāntaraprāptimānādityaḥ dravyatve sati kṣayavṛddhipratyayāviṣayatve ca prāṅmukhopalabhyatve
GSP29nystik_u:4598: ca tadabhimukhadeśasaṃbandhād anutpannapādavihārasya parivṛtya tatpratyayaviṣayatvāt maṇyādivat,
GSP29nystik_u:4600: so 'pi hi pratyabhijñāviṣayo bhavati tatraiva sthitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4613: mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalaṃ tvastācalacūḍāvalambi na prācyāṃ kasyacidupalambhagocara iti vaiṣamyam,
GSP29nystik_u:4614: tathāpi yadi draṣṭaiva puro 'vasthitasya paścimābhimukhasaya prāsādasya svayumupanipatya pṛṣṭato bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:4619: tamuddiśya khalvayaṃ padbhyāṃ saṃcaramāṇaḥ prāsādasya pṛṣṭato bhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4629: anyathāsiddhatayā aṅgulyā nirdeśasya dikpratyakṣatvena na svābhāvikaḥ pratibandha ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4631: apratyakṣāyāṃ diśi digdeśasaṃbandhiṣvityetadeva kuta ityata āha---ādityeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:4633: tat punaridaṃ pratyakṣam ā codayāt ā cāstamayād deśāntaraṃ sañcaraṇaṃ mārtaṇḍamaṇḍalasya anākalitadravyatve satītyādidaṇḍakānumānānāmindriyavyāpārāntaramupajāyamānatvāt
GSP29nystik_u:4636: mayukhabhāgabhedāḥ pratyakṣadeśā iti teṣāṃ pratyakṣāṇāṃ pratyakṣeṇa savitṛmaṇḍalena
GSP29nystik_u:4638: idaṃ tvatisphuṭatayā nābhidhāya śiṣyavyutpādanāyākṣuṇṇaṃ mārgāntaraṃ darśitamiti mantavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4640: śiṃśapātvena śrutena vṛkṣatvānu mānamityādi sāmānyatodṛṣṭena saṃgṛhītaṃ veditavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:4645: yadyapi avinābhāvaḥ pañcasu caturṣu vā rūpeṣu liṅgasya samāpyate ityavinābhāvenaiva sarvāṇiliṅgarūpāṇi saṃgṛhyante,
GSP29nystik_u:4646: tathāpīha prasiddhasacchabdābhyāṃ dvayoḥ saṃgrahe gobalīvardanyāyena tat parityajya vipakṣavyatirekāsatpratipakṣatvābādhitaviṣayatvāni saṃgṛhṇāti
GSP29nystik_u:4647: atrāpi yathāsaṃbhavaṃ caturṇāṃ pañcānāṃ vā rūpāṇāṃ liṅgeṣu saṃbandhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4653: tannirākaraṇāya traividhyamanumānasya ucyate iti trividhapadasyatātparyāntaramāha--atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:4660: yathā paramāṇvādayaḥ kasyacit pratyakṣāḥ prameyatvād ghaṭādivaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4661: tathā sapakṣe sadasad yathā tatraiva sādhye sattvād ghaṭādivaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:4676: evaṃ sādhyadharmiṇi anyataradharmadarśanena sādhanadharmadarśanenānyatarasya sādhyadharmasyānumānamanumiti darśanamiti bhavati kriyātulyatā
GSP29nystik_u:4678: atra dignāgena dhūmādagnirūpadharmāntarānumānam agnideśayoḥ saṃbandhānumānaṃ ca dūṣayitvā agniviśiṣṭadeśānumānaṃ samarthitam /
GSP29nystik_u:4682: liṅga dharme prasiddhaṃ cet kimanyat tena mīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4684: saṃbandhe 'pi dvayaṃ nāsti ṣaṣṭhī śrūyeta tadvati /
GSP29nystik_u:4690: tatra dignāgadūṣitān kalpān anyāṃśca vikalpān dignāgasamarthitaṃ ca kalpamupanyasya dūṣayati---anye punariti dharmadharmibhāvānupapatteriti
GSP29nystik_u:4699: yaḥ kaścidagnimattayā deśaḥ sādhyate na tasyāvaśyaṃ dhūmo dharma ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4706: na hyayamevaṃvādī dignāgo dhūmādhāraṃ deśaviśeṣaṃ paśyati /
GSP29nystik_u:4707: na hyasya mate parvato nāma kaścidavayavī yadādhāro dhūma upalabhyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:4708: kiṃ tu paramāṇavaḥ paramasūkṣmā atīndriyāḥ parvataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4721: na hi yadā yatra vā paṭaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4724: na hi yadā yadā saṃyogastadā karma /
GSP29nystik_u:4732: yadi hi vahnimābhyāmeko 'rthaḥ kaścit ārabhyeta tato 'sau tayoḥ samaveyāt,
GSP29nystik_u:4748: na hi bauddharāddhānte dravyaṃ nāma kiñcidasti yatra rūpasparśai samavetau,
GSP29nystik_u:4757: yatra tāvat parvatanitambavartinī dhūmalekhā santatamudgacchantī dṛśyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4758: tatrāsau deśa eva tadviśiṣṭo 'numīyate iti lokaprasiddhameveti kimatra vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4759: yatra tu bhūyiṣṭhatāyā tasya dhūmasya dūratvena deśo na dṛśyate,
GSP29nystik_u:4761: tatra deśānumānaprayāsālasatayā dṛśyamāno dhūmaviśeṣa evāgnimattayā sādhyate dhūmatvaikārthasamavāyibhiḥ tadgataiḥ saṃtatyerdhvagamanādibhirityāha--dhūmaviśeṣeṇa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4763: tena dhūmamātrād vahnivyabhicāriṇo vahnyavinābhāvī dhūmo viśeṣyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4766: dravyatvakarmatvayoḥ śabde nirākāryatvena upayuktatvāt tābhyāmanyad guṇatvaṃ śeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4789: na ca vaktṛvaktrāvaruddhaṃ nabhaḥpradeśaṃ tat prāpnoti /
GSP29nystik_u:4790: na cādravyaṃ śabdo gatvā śrotreṇa saṃbadhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4791: tasmād vīcītaraṅgarītyā svadeśānantaradeśe śabdāntarārambhaṇaparamparayā śrotradeśotpannaṃ śabdaṃ gṛhṇātīti siddhaṃ sajātīyārambhakatvāditi
GSP29nystik_u:4794: eṣa punaranvayavyatirekī dravyakarmānyatve sati sadādyabhedasya sapakṣe rūpādau sattvād,
GSP29nystik_u:4804: tatra pūrvasmin kalpe nānupalabdha iti vyāghātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4806: viśeṣasmṛtyapekṣo hi saṃśayo nātyantānupalabdhapūrvadharmavattayā kvacid bhavitum arhati /
GSP29nystik_u:4807: na khalu saptamarasavattayā kecid dravye saṃśerata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4809: na tāvat svarūpeṇānumīyate yena nānupalabdha iti vyāhanyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:4813: tajjātīyena tu dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇordṛṣṭena pratyakṣato vā mānāntarād vā sādhanadharmasya svābhāvikapratibandhagrahasaṃbhādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4815: tadevaṃ vibhajate--icchādayaḥ khalu dharmiṇo bhavanti mānasapratyakṣadṛṣṭāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4821: anupalabdhacaraścātmeti kathaṃ tadviśiṣṭā icchādayo nyāyaviṣayā iti śaṅkāmurīkṛtyata prayogaṃ sūcayati--paratantrā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4828: icchādīno hi bādhakairapanīte dravyāṣṭakaguṇatve guṇatvameva vyatirekī hetuḥ ātmapāratantrye pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4830: tathāpi dravyāṣṭakavyatirekādiśabdairadūraviprakarṣeṇa parāmṛṣṭaḥ śaknoti viśeṣṭuṃ dharmiṇi ca nyāyapravṛttyaṅgaḥ saṃśayam āpādayitumiti niravadyam
GSP29nystik_u:4831: atra bhāṣyaṃ vibhāgavacanādeva trividhamiti saddhi iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4833: trividham iti vibhāgavacanādeva trividhe pūrvavadādau siddhe kimarthaṃ pūrvavadādyupādānaṃ sūtreṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4835: mahataḥ trividhasya mahāviṣayasya atītānāgatavartamānaviṣayasya laghīyasā sūtreṇa
GSP29nystik_u:4837: 'nādaraḥ sūtrakārasyeti śiṣyān vyutpipādayiṣoḥ atraiva nidarśanam--tathā cāyam /
GSP29nystik_u:4838: asya samācāraḥ---itthaṃbhūtena vakyavikalpena vaicitryeṇa pravṛtta iti yojanā //
GSP29nystik_u:4839: evaṃ tāvat lakṣaṇabhedānumānaṃ bhinnaṃ pratyakṣād darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:4840: bhāṣyakārastu viṣayabhedādapi bhedamāha---sadviṣayaṃ ca pratyakṣaṃ sadasadviṣayaṃ cānumānam /
GSP29nystik_u:4846: yadyapi pratyakṣamapyatītānāgatayoḥ saṃprati niṣedhyaniṣedhayorniṣedhe pravartamānamasadviṣayaṃ tathāpi na pratiṣedhyayoḥ pravartate ityetāvatā sadviṣayamuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4847: anumānaṃ tu tayorapi pravartate ityetāvatā asadviṣayamuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4849: na hyanupalabdhasāmānye iti sāmānyata upalabdho viśeṣataścānirṇīto dharmo nyāyapravṛttāvadhikriyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4858: tathā ca na viśeṣaṇatayā gṛhyeteti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4862: kasmāt punarasya na samavāyāntaramabhyupeyata ityata āha---atheti /
GSP29nystik_u:4872: mā bhūd gośabdasāmyena vāgādīnām api viṣāṇitvamityaparitoṣāt nyāyāntaramāha--anāśritaḥ samavāya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4876: tacceha pratyayakāraṇe ātmāni ca samavāye cāvilakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4880: bhavatu vṛtteḥ prāganāśritaṃ kāryaṃ paścāt samavaiṣyati,
GSP29nystik_u:4881: turīsaṃyuktebhya iva tantubhya utpadya paṭaḥ paścāt turyā ityata āha--samavāyaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4884: pramāṇavattvāt prāptā samavāyasya vṛttirna śakyā anavasthābhiyā parityaktumityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4886: saṃyoge prāptitvasya nivṛttyā svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kāryatvasyopādheḥ tatprayojakasya vidyamānatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4887: atha prāptidharmo 'pi kasmāt na bhavatītyata āha---yadi punariyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4888: nanviyamanavasthā kasmād bījāṅgurādiṣvivehāpi nābhyupeyate ityata āha---na caināmanavasthāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4893: tattvamekatvaṃ samavāyasya bhāvena sattvayā vyākhyātamiti śāstramāha,
GSP29nystik_u:4897: vinaṣṭe ca tasmin yo dṛśyate sa tato 'nya utpanna iti siddhaṃ samavāyasya nānātvamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4902: kārya svāpādānena akṛtakasaṃbandhavad ādhāravattvāditi vyatirekī hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4906: na hi sahotpannau rūpasparśau mithaḥ saṃbadhyete /
GSP29nystik_u:4912: kāryāt pūrvamutpannaḥ samavāyaḥ paścādutpadyamānaṃ kāryamupādānādhārakaṃ kariṣyati kāryahetubalādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:4914: tribhyo hi kāraṇebhyaḥ kāryaṃ bhāvarūpaṃ jāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:4916: kāryāt prāg jātasya ca samavāyasya na kāryaṃ kāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:4919: tasmāt samavāyasya samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇābhāvat na kāryāt prāg utpāda iti suṣṭhūktam--tathāpi kasyeti vācyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:4922: na ca paṭaturīsaṃyogavat samavāyasya paścāt kāryakāraṇasamavāya iti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:4923: saṃyogajasya saṃyogasya kāraṇatrayasaṃbhavād asya tu samavāyāntaramantareṇa kāraṇatrayāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:4926: tataśca na jñāyate kimabhipretyata asadviṣayamityuktamityākṣepa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4938: visphāritākṣo hi tadā ghaṭo bhavatīti pratyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:4947: dhaṭo jāyata iti tu laukikaḥ prayogo ghaṭaśabdaṃ ghaṭārtheṣu tadavayaveṣūpacarya teṣāṃ ca siddhatayā kartṛtvādupapādanīya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4952: yathāsaṃbhavaṃ samāsaṃ vikalpya dūṣyati--nāntarīyakārtha iti ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:4962: ityatra viśeṣaṇapadopādādamātreṇa vā viśeṣyapadopādānamātreṇa vā anyatarasyārthāt
GSP29nystik_u:4963: prāpterūbhayapadopādānasyaitat prayojanam---yatrobhayoḥ pratyekaṃ vyabhicāraḥ samudāye tvavyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:4971: kiṃ pṛthivītvaṃ sāmānyamasya vivakṣitaṃ yathā paśunā yajeta iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4976: evaṃ dravyamityapyukte dravyatvaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ vyaktirveti vimarśe pṛthivītyetadupatiṣṭhate /
GSP29nystik_u:4977: na dravyatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ kiṃ tu pṛthivī /
GSP29nystik_u:4983: na hyasti saṃbhavo nāntarīyakaśca syāt na cārtha iti,
GSP29nystik_u:4986: na hi dignāgasya mate kiñcidasti vastu yannāntarīyakaṃ saddheturbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:4988: sarvo 'yamanumānānumeyabhāvo buddhyārūḍhena dharmadharmibhāvena na bahiḥ sadasattvamapekṣate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:4990: na hi vastveva nāntarīyakamasato 'pi nāntarīyakatvāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:4994: atastrirūpaliṅgadarśanasya siddheḥ kimaparamavaśiṣyate yadavarodhāya tadvida ityupādīyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5002: tadanena dignāgasya lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitvā anyeṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣitam //
GSP29nystik_u:5003: saṃprati dignāgasya svakīyalakṣaṇaprapañcārthaṃ vākyam anumeye 'tha tattulya ityādyupanyasya dūṣayati--apare tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:5006: na hi yo 'numeye saṃścāsaṃśca sa śakyaḥ sanniti vaktum
GSP29nystik_u:5009: yadyevaṃ syātad yo vipakṣe dvedhā sa vipakṣāvṛttiriti hetureva syāt na savyabhicāra ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5012: anumeye sadbhāva evetyavadhāraṇenānumeye sadbhāvasya niyatatvāt kutaḥ pakṣaikadeśavṛtteḥ prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5016: yathā nīlaṃ sarojaṃ bhavatyeva nātyantaṃ na bhavatīti gamyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5031: na hyasti saṃbhavo 'numeya evāsti tattulye ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:5034: anumeya eva sadbhāva iti pakṣaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ dūṣayitvā anumeye sadbhāva eveti dvitīyaṃ pakṣaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasyati---athottaramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5036: sadbhāva eveti kila viśeṣaṇasaṃgatamavadhāraṇamayogam avyāpti vyavacchindat vyāpti darśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5038: dūṣayati---tathāpyanumeyamavadhāritaṃ saṃbhavasya vyāptyā na dharmaḥ sadbhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5042: anumeyaṃ khalvavadhāritaṃ saddhetusaṃbhavaṃ parityajya nānyatra vartate,
GSP29nystik_u:5044: hetusaṃbhavastvanavadhāritaḥ sarvatraiva tattulye ca vipakṣe ca prasṛtaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5047: tadasya hetusaṃbhavasya vipakṣe 'pi prasaktasya pratiṣedhāya yuktamasati nāstīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5048: tattulye tu prasaktamapratiṣiddhamanumatameveti tattulye sadbhāva iti vyarthamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5050: tulyahetu sadbhāvasiddhāvapi tattulye vyāptyā hotoḥ sadbhāvo bhavatvityetadarthaṃ tattulye sadbhāva
GSP29nystik_u:5052: yadi punarvyāptirvivakṣyeta kṛtakatve sādhye prayatnānantarīyakatvaṃ na hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5058: pūrvapadena saha virodhe nidarśanamāha---na hi bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5059: anumeye sadbhāva ityanenānumeye vṛttau hetārlabdhāyāṃ tattulya eva sadbhāva iti samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇaṃ vipakṣamātrād vṛtti vyavacchinatti,
GSP29nystik_u:5061: naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameva cādau svataḥ sutau dvau janayāṃ babhūva /
GSP29nystik_u:5063: samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇe hi tattulyena yathānyayogavyavacchedenaivakāraḥ saṃbadhyate tathānumeyenāpi saṃbadhyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:5065: na khalu naraṃ ca nārāyaṇameveti nipāto nārāyaṇena sahānyayogavyavacchedena saṃbadhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5068: tathā tattulye 'yogavyavacchedena saṃbandha ucyeteti śaṅkate---atha tattulya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5072: na ca yasyānumeye sadbhāva evetyanūdya tattulya eva sattvamiti vidhātuṃ śakyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5074: tathā sati tadviśeṣaṇāya prayatnāntarāsthāne sati vākyabhedaprasaṅgāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5077: ityatra hi yadyapi svarūpeṇārteraśakyapratipattitvena haviṣā viśeṣaṇaṃ mṛgyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5078: tathāpi na śakyaṃ havirūbhayatvena viśeṣṭuṃ vinā prayatnāntarāditi vākyabhedabhiyā pratīyamānamapi ubhayatvamavivakṣitam,
GSP29nystik_u:5080: atha tadvivakṣayaiva vākyabhedamabhyupetya paścād vākyaikavākyatayā abhimatārthasiddhirāsthīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5084: tathā hi anumeye sadbhāva ityatrānumeya eva nānanumeye,
GSP29nystik_u:5087: evaṃ tattulye sadbhāva ityatrāpi tattulya eva nātattulye,
GSP29nystik_u:5096: yadi rūpameva cākṣuṣaṃ tato na dravyaṃ cākṣuṣaṃ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5099: atra hi rūpavaddravyasahitaṃ rūpameva cākṣuṣaṃ na gandharasādīti śakyaṃ samuccīyamānāvadhāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5104: tanna saditi śakyaṃ vyavahartum asaditi vā /
GSP29nystik_u:5105: bhavatu, tathāpi kasmāt tasmānna hetoḥ vyāvṛttirbhavatītyata āha---na hyasaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5107: svarūpeṇa dūṣayitvā etadgatamavadhāraṇaṃ dūṣayiṣyannanūdya vikalpayati--kimavadhāryata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5109: tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanena gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5111: tattulya eva sadbhāva ityanena gamyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5117: ato vipakṣa eva nāsti ityayamapi hetuḥ syāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5122: yathānumeye sadbhāva ityucyamāne yasya tattulye nāstitā vipakṣe ca vṛttiḥ so 'pi hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5123: tattulye astītyucyamāne vipakṣavṛtterapakṣadharmasya ca hetutvaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5125: nāstitāsatītyucyamāne yo 'pakṣadharmastattulye ca nāsti sa hetuḥ syāt yathā nityaḥ śabdo 'sattvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5128: anumeye 'styasati ca nāstītyetāvatyucyamāne nityaḥ śabdo jātimattve sati śrāvaṇatvādityayaṃ tattulyavṛttihīno 'pi hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5129: tattulye 'sti asati ca nāstītyetāvatyucyamāne anityāḥ paramāṇavaḥ kṛtakatvādityayam apakṣadharmo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5136: tathāpi yatrāvinābhūte liṅge bhavata ekasmin dharmiṇi virūddhāvyabhicāriṇī,
GSP29nystik_u:5142: yadi pratyakṣaśabdo jñānavacanaḥ jñānaṃ caikatvena viśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5154: tathā ca gṛhītāvinābhāvāt liṅgāt saṃprati pratyakṣādityupapannamityata āha---na cānyā gatirasti /
GSP29nystik_u:5158: tatra prathame kalpe mā bhūd viruddhāvyabhicārī,
GSP29nystik_u:5160: dvitīye tu kalpe na sarvarūpasaṃpanno heturviruddhāvyabhicārī saṃbhavatītyekasmāditi atiricyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5166: na ca pratikṣaṇapariṇāmavāde kuṇḍavadarādīnāmapi kaścidasti saṃbandha ityapi draṣṭavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5169: na hi sāṃkhyānāṃ bauddhānāṃ vā rāddhānte 'sti saṃbandhaḥ samavāyo nām /
GSP29nystik_u:5174: tathā ca yatra rūpaṃ tatra sparśa ityata āha--yatra rūpamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5180: na ca bhedābhedāvekatra saṃbhavato virodhāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5182: yathā hyāsandikāṅgāni bhinnānyanauttarādharyavyavasthitānyapi parasparāśrayatayā na patanti,
GSP29nystik_u:5186: kutaḥ? na rūpaṃ sparśo rūpe iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5200: sādharmyaṃ ca sāmānyamabhidadhatā na sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ nāma padārthāntaramastītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5201: sādharmyaṃ cāprasiddhaṃ na sādhyasāghanāyālamiti sādharmyaprasiddhirapi draṣṭavyā /
GSP29nystik_u:5202: sā ca yathā gaustathā gavaya ityāptavākyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5205: piṇḍasya hi gavayaśabdavācyatāṃ puruṣo 'tideśavākyasmaraṇasahakāriṇaḥ pratayakṣād gavayagatād gosādṛśyāt prajānan tena prajñāpyata iti pramāṇasya vyāpāraḥ prajñāpanamuktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5206: tatra vārttikakāraḥ prathamaṃ tāvat sūtratātparyamāha---sūtrārthaḥ pūrvavat /
GSP29nystik_u:5216: bhāṣyakāreṇa hi saṃjñitayā gavayapratipattiḥ phalaṃ sādhyasādhanapadavācyamuktā,
GSP29nystik_u:5224: na hi yo yatsadṛśaṃ yaṃ pratipadyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5225: sa tasya samākhyāmapyavagacchati ityāśayavān pṛcchati---kimuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5234: pratyakṣamayī ca yathā gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭo 'yamīdṛśaḥ piṇḍa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5236: yadyapi yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya ityetasmādapi gosadṛśasya gavayaśabdaḥ samākhyeti śakyamavagantum,
GSP29nystik_u:5241: gosādṛśyena copalakṣitaḥ piṇḍo ya iti sarvanāmnā parāmṛṣṭaḥ śakyo ghaṭādibhyo 'samānajātiyebhyo mahiṣādibhyaśca samānajātīyebhyo vyavacchinno 'vagantuṃ gavayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5242: tathāpi yāvadayamasau gavaya iti sākṣāt pratīte saṃbandhini saṃjñāṃ na niveśayati,
GSP29nystik_u:5243: tāvadayaṃ pariplutamatiḥ pramātā kaccit khalu drakṣyāmi tādṛśaṃ piṇḍaṃ yatra gavayasaṃjñā pratipatsya iti pramotsuka evodīkṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:5244: na cāsau vākyamātrasahāyo 'pratyakṣīkṛtagosadṛśagavayatvajātimatpiṇḍo 'sau gavayākhya iti pratipattumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:5248: dhik karabhamatidīrghavakragrīvaṃ pralamboṣṭhaṃ kaṭhoratīkṣṇakaṇṭakāśinaṃ kutsitāvayavasanniveśamapasadaṃ paśūnāmiti,
GSP29nystik_u:5249: tadupaśrutya dākṣiṇātya uttarāpathaṃ gatastādṛśaṃ vastūpalabhya nūnamasau karabha iti pratyeti,
GSP29nystik_u:5253: yadyucyeta nindāparaṃ vākyaṃ karabhasya tādṛśatve na pramāṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:5255: yatra tarhi tādṛktve paryavasyati vākyaṃ tatra kā gatiḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:5256: atha tatrāpi tādṛk karabha āgamāvagataḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratyabhijñāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5257: karabhaśabdavācyatā tu tasya tatpūrvaṃ tādṛkvarabhaparatve apyāgamasya prayogamātrādavagatā anumānāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5258: yo hi yatra prayujyate śabdo 'sati vṛttyantare sa tasya vācakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5262: tadidaṃ prāgeva prayogānumitaṃ vācakatvamasya pratyakṣasamaye kevalaṃ smaryate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5264: upamānavākye 'pi tatrāpi vākyādavagataḥ sādharmyavān piṇḍaḥ pratyakṣeṇa pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5265: prayogānumitaṃ ca gavayapadasya vācakatvaṃ smaryate iti na phalāntaramavaśiṣyate yatropamānaṃ pramāṇamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:5267: na tāvadākāśādiśabdavadeṣa gavayaśabdaḥ sākṣāt piṇḍasya vācakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5268: kintu gavayatvaṃ nimittīkṛtya piṇḍe vartate iti paramārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5269: na ca yathā gaurevaṃ gavaya iti vākyād gavayatvamavagatam,
GSP29nystik_u:5273: na khalvanupalabdhacareṇa gavayatvena gosādṛśyaṃ saṃbaddhaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:5276: tasmāt saṃbandhino gavayatvasya sarvathānupalabdheḥ kuto vākyād vā anumānād vā vācyavācakasaṃbandhāvasāyaḥ?
GSP29nystik_u:5278: gavayatvasāmānyaviśeṣavati tu piṇḍe pratyakṣe yuktaḥ saṃbandhāvagamaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5279: saṃbandhino gavayatvasya pratyakṣatvāt vākyārthasya ca smaryāṇatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5282: vākyārthasmaraṇasahakāri gavayatvajātimataḥ piṇḍasya gāsādṛśyadarśanameva tarkasahāyaṃ gavayatvābhidhāne pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5283: tarkaśca gosādṛśyaviśiṣṭapiṇḍābhidhāne kalpanāgauravaprasaṅgaḥ tathā hi sādṛśyaviśiṣṭa piṇḍābhidhāne,
GSP29nystik_u:5285: na ca śabdādanyatastadavagama iti śabdaśya tatra vācakatvaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5286: na cāviśiṣṭaṃ sādṛśyamapi piṇḍaviśeṣe gavayapadam avasthāpayitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:5287: yasya kasyacid yena kenacit saha sādṛśyāditi tadapi gavā viśeṣaṇīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5288: na cānyato gotvasyāpi pratipattiriti tadapi gavayapadenābhidhātavyam iti kalpanāgauravam /
GSP29nystik_u:5292: ata eva bahunyudāhaṇānyuktvāpyāha sma bhagavān bhāṣyakāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5295: tadīdṛśamupamānaphalamavidvān sādṛśyaviśiṣṭavastujñānaṃ copamānaphalamiti bhrānto bhadanto dignāga ākṣipati---pratyakṣeti /
GSP29nystik_u:5305: hanta bhoḥ kimabhimataṃ sādṛśyamāyuṣmato yadapratyakṣāyāṃ gavi na pratyakṣam?
GSP29nystik_u:5310: iti cet? tat kimidānīṃ karṇatvādisāmānyaṃ gogavayagatakarṇādibhedena bhinnamityapi vaktumadhyavasito 'si? tasmād
GSP29nystik_u:5311: yathā kālākṣyāṃ gavi gotvamīkṣitavataḥ svastimatyāṃ pratyabhijñāyamānaṃ tadevedamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:5314: tasmāt na sādṛśyapratītiphalamupamānaṃ pratyakṣād vākyād vā vyatiricyate iti sūktam /
GSP29nystik_u:5322: yadi tu na tebhyo vilakṣaṇamabhaviṣyad na tadvilakṣaṇāṃ pramāmakariṣyat,
GSP29nystik_u:5332: upadiśyate 'neneti upadeśo vākyajñānaṃ vā tadarthajñānaṃ vā abhighīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5347: āptānāṃ ṛṣyāryamlecchānāmupadeśaḥ śabdo na tvanāptānāṃ māyāmohanirmitānāṃ buddharṣabhādīnāṃ pramāṇaviruddhakṣaṇikasarvadharmanairātmyavādināmiti
GSP29nystik_u:5350: sudṛḍhena pramāṇenāvadhāritāḥ sākṣātkṛtā dharmāḥ padārthā hitāhitaprāptiparihāraprayojanā yena sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5351: tathāpi tattvaṃ vidvān akārūṇikatayā vā alasatayā vā anupadiśan,
GSP29nystik_u:5352: matsaritayā vā viparītamupadiśan nāptaḥ syādityata āha---yathādṛṣṭasyārthasya cikhyāpayiṣayā prayuktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5359: āpta iti prakṛtipratyayasamudāyāt prakṛti niṣkṛṣya tadarthamāha--sākṣātkaraṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5365: ārād yātaḥ pātakebhya ityāryo madhyamo lokaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5367: mlecchā api hi paripathamavasthitāḥ pānthānāmapahṛtasarvasvānāṃ mārgākhyāne hetudarśanaśūnyā avantyāptā iti pareṣāmāptalakṣaṇamavyāpakamityuktaṃ bhavati //
GSP29nystik_u:5370: ākṣeptā bhāṣyam ākṣipya sūtraṃ samādhatte tasmāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:5372: apauruṣeyo vaidika upadeśaḥ svargāpūrvadevatādiviṣayaḥ svataḥprāmāṇye siddhe nirdeṣatayā yukta upapannaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5377: tasmāt puruṣasyaivāptasyopadeśa āptopadeśa iti sādhu vyākhyānaṃ bhāṣyakārīyamiti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5380: yogipratyakṣaṃ na svargādiviṣayaḥ pratyakṣatvāt asmadādipratyakṣavaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5383: atra yāvati pakṣe yo hetuḥ siddhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5385: yogaje ca pratyakṣe siddhe tatsādhakādeva pramāṇāt tasya svargādiviṣayatvamapi siddhamiti
GSP29nystik_u:5386: dharmigrāhakapramāṇaviruddhaṃ mīmāṃsakānām anumānaṃ nodetumapyutsahate prāgeva tad bādhitum /
GSP29nystik_u:5387: asiddhe tu yogaje pratyakṣa āśrayāsiddho heturābhāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5388: asmākaṃ tu samyañco bahavaśca nyāyā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5398: na hi kadācidapyayamapūrvaṃ paśyati laukikaḥ puruṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5409: svābhiprāyeṇa nirākaroti---na dṛṣṭa iti brūma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5410: śaṅkitā pṛcchati--kiṃ punastat yadi na dṛṣṭam?
GSP29nystik_u:5418: na ca kalpito 'pūrvabhadaḥ pāramārthikāya kāryāyālamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5423: aśvamedhakriyayā tāvat tadapūrvaṃ svakāla evābhivyaktaṃ phaladānābhimukhīkṛtam, abhivya/
GSP29nystik_u:5430: tat khalu pūrvaṃ sadapi phalaṃ nākārṣīt caramabhāvinyāḥ kriyāyāḥ tajjanyāyā ābhivyakteranutpādāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5431: utpannāyāṃ tu kriyāyāmabhivyaktau vā kasmāt na karoti?
GSP29nystik_u:5433: tasmādakāmenāpi tvayā asatyā eva kriyāyā vya/
GSP29nystik_u:5437: tathā sati asattāyāḥ sarvatra sulabhatvāt na kiñcidapūrvaṃ nābhivyaktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5439: atra śabdaṃ pramāṇāntaramasahamāno dignāgaḥ tallakṣaṇaṃ vikalpyākṣipati---āptopadeśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5451: tasya vacanāt kāryāt kāraṇaṃ vivakṣā anumīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5455: te ca prāyeṇa visaṃvādakā dṛṣṭā ityāptagrahaṇena teṣāmavisaṃvāditvam /
GSP29nystik_u:5461: tathā hi yad yannirdeṣasattvīyaṃ vacanaṃ tatsarvamarthavat,
GSP29nystik_u:5468: atra hi upadiśyata ityupadeśa iti vyutpattyā artha ucyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5469: āptaḥ prāpta upadeśo yasmāt sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5470: etaduktaṃ bhavati yasmāt śabdādavagamyārthaṃ pravartamānaḥ prāpnoti tamevārtha sa āptopadeśaḥ śabdaḥ pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5471: evaṃ ca yathā śabdena yo 'rtho darśitaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5476: āptyā hi tathātvaṃ viniścanvan arthasya nāpratipannatayā niścetumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:5493: tadidamuktam---yā śabdollekhena padārthasmaraṇāvāntaravyāpārāt śabdādevārthaṃ pratyemītyanenollekhena pratipattiḥ sāgamasyārthaḥ phalamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5494: āptatvaṃ ca na vākyārthaṃ pratyāyayati api tvāgamasyāvyabhicāritām /
GSP29nystik_u:5495: na ca yataḥ prāmāṇyamavagamyate tataḥ prameyamapi /
GSP29nystik_u:5496: tathā ca sati prāmāṇyajñānahetoranumānādeva pratyakṣādiprameyāvagatiriti pratyakṣādīnāmapramāṇyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5503: tasmāt vaktṛjñānaviśeṣaṇāya pūrvaṃ śabdādeva kevalād vākyārthajñānam eṣitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5504: evaṃ ca kṛtaṃ vaktṛjñānānumānenārthapratipattyarthena kevalaṃ prāmāṇyajñānāya tadupayoga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5505: na cāvinābhāva eva saṃbandho yena śabdārthayorasaṃbandhena gamyagamakatvaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5511: na saṃgatigrahaṇamapi pratīkṣanta iti dūre 'numānād bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:5517: sa dvividho dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthatvāt iti sūtrasya tātparyamāha---niyamārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:5533: asyārthamāha na vigrahaṃ karoti pratyakṣata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5535: sa na manyeta dṛṣṭānāṃ vākyānāṃ prāmāṇyam /
GSP29nystik_u:5546: aparīkṣitaṃ ca na tattvanirṇayāya paryāptamiti parīkṣā vidhāyiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:5547: tatparikaraśca saṃśayādaya iti yuktaṃ teṣāṃ paścāllakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5548: tadiha prameyalakṣaṇāya tadvibhāgoddeśasūtramavatārayituṃ bhāṣyakāraḥ pṛcchati sma---kiṃ punaranena pramāṇeneti /
GSP29nystik_u:5551: tadetad bhāṣyam anūdya vārttikakāra ākṣipati---kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:5555: siśiṣṭaṃ tu prameyamadyāpi na sidhyatīti tadarthaṃ praśnaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5556: sa ca viśeṣo yathāvaditi na darśita iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5570: kiṃ tu yat tattvato jñāyamānamapavargasādhanaṃ tasmin,
GSP29nystik_u:5573: nanvasmin pakṣe na kadācidapi pramāṇatā syādityasti doṣa ityata āha---kimuktaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5576: anūdyata iti pramāṇāntaramūlakatvena vidhānasya dārḍhyaṃ darśayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5604: avidyamānaṃ pūrvaṃ śarīraṃ yasya tadapūrvaṃ śarīram /
GSP29nystik_u:5606: prameyatattvamaviduṣa ātmana avidyamānamuttaraṃ śarīraṃ yasya tad anuttaram /
GSP29nystik_u:5609: nanu yathā pūrveṣāṃ śarīrāṇām anāditā evamuttareṣāmapyanantatā,
GSP29nystik_u:5610: tathā ca mokṣamāṇānāṃ pravṛttayaśca tadarthāni śāstrāṇi cānarthakāni prasajyerannityata āha---uttareṣāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5612: nanu sūkhe 'pyuddeṣṭavye duḥkhamātroddeśaḥ kiṃ sukhaṃ pratyācaṣṭe?
GSP29nystik_u:5614: tadetad bhāṣyaṃ vārttikakāra ākṣepasamādhānābhyāṃ vyācaṣṭe---sukhaṃ punariti na cānyata ātmādipadāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5617: nirvidyate ityasya vyākhyānam---tāṃ copāsīnasya tayaiva virodhiguṇena tṛṣṇā vicchidyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5619: tathā ca sukhe 'sya vairāgyaṃ bhavatīti tātparyārthaḥ //9 //
GSP29nystik_u:5623: ahamiti jñānaṃ gaurādyākāraṃ śarīrāvabhāsaṃ na śakyaṃ ghaṭādijñānavad drāgātmani pramāṇayitumityabhiprāyaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5629: tataścātpoktatvānumānasiddhamapi prāmāṇyaṃ śabdasya anena tadarthasaṃvādakenānumānena dṛḍhataraṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5632: tadanena vārttikena anumānācca pratipattavya iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam icchāyā ātmaliṅgatvakathanaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ yajjātīyasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:5639: yaścāsāveko 'nubhavitā ca smartā cānumātā caiṣitā ca sa ātmā /
GSP29nystik_u:5642: nendriyam, indriyāntaragṛhīta indriyāntareṇāpratisandhānaprasaṅgāt yamaham asprākṣaṃ ta paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5648: asatyapi ātmani jñātari satyapi ca buddhyādīnāṃ bhede,
GSP29nystik_u:5652: tadabhyupagame vā sa evātmeti siddhaṃ naḥ samīhitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5657: nanvekaviṣayāṇāṃ smṛtyādīnāṃ nānākartṛkatve ko virodha ityata āha---na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5660: yad yasmāt nimittāt tvagindriyāt sparśamahamasparkṣaṃ tat tasmāt nimittāt cakṣuṣo rūpaṃ paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5661: nānākartṛtva udāharaṇamāha---na hi bhavati devadatta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5666: tatra kimakāryakāraṇabhāvāt pratisandhānasya vyatireka uta bhinnakartṛkatvāditi sandigdhavyatirekatvādasādhanāṅgaṃ pratisandhānamityāśayavāṃścodayati---kāryakāraṇabhāvāditi
GSP29nystik_u:5680: kaḥ punarasau hetuviśeṣa ityata āha---viśeṣitaṃ caitatpratisaṃdhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5681: tat kathayati--- smṛtyā saha pūrvāparapratyayayorekaviṣayatvena pratisaṃndhānam yajjātīyaṃ candanavanitādi sukhahetuṃ pratītaṃ smarāmi tajjātīyamimu pratyemīti pratisandhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5682: tadanena śālibījāṅgurasya paramparayā śālibījāntarajananalakṣaṇāt pratisaṃdhānāt kāryakāraṇabhāvaniyamād vyavacchinatti //
GSP29nystik_u:5686: uttaram---anyena nimittena anubhūtasya anyena nimittena asmaraṇāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5687: na hi bhavati yenaiva cakṣuṣā ghaṭamadrākṣam,
GSP29nystik_u:5689: nimittabhede pratisaṃdhānābhāvamuktvā viṣayabhede 'pyāha---na hyanyena svabhāvena ghaṭatvādinānubhūtasya anyena vṛkṣatvādinā smaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:5690: na hi bhavati yamahaṃ ghaṭamadrākṣaṃ so 'yaṃ vṛkṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5691: kartṛbhede pratisaṃdhānābhāvamāha---na hyanyena devadattena anubhūtamanyo yajñadattaḥ smarati /
GSP29nystik_u:5692: na hi bhavati yo 'haṃ devadatto 'drākṣaṃ so 'haṃ yajñadattaḥ paśyāmīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5693: na cedaṃ satyapi bhede kāryakāraṇabhāvāt pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:5694: na hi yatra sphuṭataraḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvaḥ tantupaṭayorghaṭakapālayorvā dṛśyate tatra pratisaṃdhānaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:5695: ye tantavaḥ sa eva paṭa iti vā yo ghaṭākṣaṇaḥ sa eva kapālakṣaṇa iti vā /
GSP29nystik_u:5696: vastutaḥ kāryakāraṇabhūtānāmagṛhītabhedānāṃ pratisaṃdhānahetubhāvaḥ sabhāgeṣu kṣaṇeṣu tathā darśanāditi cet?
GSP29nystik_u:5697: tanna, āmalakaphalasyaikasyāpanayane tatraiva sthāne āmalakāntarāvasthāpane bhavati pratisaṃdhānam /
GSP29nystik_u:5699: pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ smṛtyā sahaikaviṣayatvaṃ kartari kāryakāraṇabhāvanibandhanaṃ na karmaṇīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:5700: hanta, nairātmyasākṣātkārasātmībhāve 'pyasti vijñānānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāva iti tannibandhanaṃ pratisaṃdhānaṃ pūrvavadeva prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:5701: saiva cātmadṛṣṭirdeṣāṇāṃ nidānaṃ paramiti vyartho nairātmyasākṣātkārasātmībhāvaprayāsaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5702: athāsadapi pratisaṃdhānaṃ kāryavaśādāharati tathāgato naṭa iva rāmatvamātmanaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5707: sa tarhi tādṛśaḥ śālibījasyotpādaṃ vāstavaṃ na niyantumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:5709: na ca pratyayānāṃ bhedāgrahāt pratisaṃdhānamiti sāṃpratam,
GSP29nystik_u:5712: ahamiti ca sattvadṛṣṭeḥ kṣaṇikatvanirākṛtāvasati bādhake sthiravastuviṣayatvāt /
GSP29nystik_u:5713: tasmāt smṛtyā saha pūrvāparapratyayayoḥ ekaviṣayatvalakṣaṇasya pratisandhānasyānekakartṛkatvād vyatireko nirūpādhirekakartṛkatvaṃ sādhayati
GSP29nystik_u:5714: sa caikaḥ kartā śarīrendriyabuddhibhyo bhinna ātmeti siddham //
GSP29nystik_u:5716: tasmād yasmin pakṣe smṛtiḥ saṃbhavati tatra pratisaṃdhānaṃ nyāyyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5721: syādetat, yogicittamapi sarvajñasya cetasa ālambanapratyaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5729: tamimamasmadabhiprāyānabhijñaṃ paramanyathāpi bodhayituṃ vibhavāma iti siddhāntī anyathā smṛtyanupapattimāha---na,
GSP29nystik_u:5731: na hyajātānanvayadhyastayorasti kaścid viśeṣa iti pūrvotpanno 'nubhavaḥ kāñcana vāsanāmādhāya dhvaṃsate,
GSP29nystik_u:5733: na cāsthirā buddhiḥ śakyā vāsayitumityātmā sthiro 'bhyupeya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5737: nāsmākaṃ kṣaṇikavastuvādināmasti tajjagati yadavasthitaṃ vāsakena vāsyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti
GSP29nystik_u:5742: tena saha jātaḥ samānakālaḥ cenāviśeṣaḥ tadālayavijñānamityucyate /
