GSP29nystik_u:5748: upapādayiṣyate hi bhāvānāṃ sarvajanapratītisiddhā stharatā kṣaṇabhaṅganirākaraṇena /
GSP29nystik_u:5749: tathā ca sthirasya saṃbaddhasya ca vastrādeḥ mṛgamadādinā vāsyatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nāsthire 'saṃbaddhe ca bhavitumarhatītyarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5751: asthirayorapi jñānayoḥ samānakālatayā asti saṃbandha iti kasmāt anyataracittavāsitamanyataraccittaṃ smṛtiṃ nādhatte ityata āha---yaścāsāviti
GSP29nystik_u:5770: sthirameva hi kuṇḍaṃ sthirasyaiva vadarasya gurutvena patato gurutvaṃ pratibadhnadadhaḥpatanaṃ nivārayadādhāro bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5773: na tu bhaviturbhavitrantarāpekṣā yuktā anavasthāpātāditi āśaṅkate---athāpīdamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5784: tathā ca na virodho nāpyanabhyupaga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5791: tathā ca smṛteḥ bhāvasya bhavitā ātmaika nityaḥ pariśiṣyate ityāśayavānāha---yadā cotpattiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:5795: yā punarnābhyāmekakartṛkā sā nābhyāṃ tathā pratisandhīyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5799: tadevaṃ vyatirekisamarthanaṃ kṛtvā anvayavyatirekiṇamatrārthe pramāṇayati---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:5801: tenaiva gandha upalabhyate iti khalu mayeti smṛtyā saha pratisandhānaṃ tasmād bharatamatābhyāsenābhinaye
GSP29nystik_u:5813: asti ca teṣāmapi svagocarāvikalpotpādanadvāreṇa paraṃparayā mayeti pratisandhānahetubhāva iti yatkiñcidetadekatvaṃ tasya kalpitamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:5814: tadevaṃ pratisandhānadvāreṇecchādīnāmātmaliṅgatvamuktvā saṃprati guṇatayā liṅgatā vārttikakṛd āha---atha veti /
GSP29nystik_u:5817: na hyanityo bhāvo dravyāt svatantro bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5818: tasmād guṇatvaprasādhakādeva hetoḥ pāratantryasiddheḥ kṛtaṃ guṇatvena pāratantryasādhakeneti
GSP29nystik_u:5819: hṛdi nidhāya vārttikakāraḥ tadapi pūrvamuktamiti siddhena pāratantryeṇa guṇatvamapi sādhayati /
GSP29nystik_u:5822: tasmādanityatvasiddhena dravyapāratantryeṇa dravyakarmabhyāṃ vyatirecayati---na dravyaṃ karma vā icchādayaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5825: tathāpi dravyakalpanamātreṇaivopapattau tadavayayavakalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvena tad dravyamanavayavaṃ tāvat siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:5830: kvacidanyatarakarmaṇā kvacit svabhāvataḥ tatsaṃyogopapattau tadgatikalpanāyāṃ pramāṇābhāvāt siddhamasya vyāpakatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:5832: tadanayā vakroktyā nityatvaṃ paramamahattvaṃ cātmano darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5833: etacca sāmānyatodṛṣṭamanumānaṃ sūtrayatā sarvaṃ darśitamityāha---sāmānyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:5834: yat tatpūrvaṃ hṛdi sthitamicchādīnāṃ dravyapāratantrye sādhye 'nityatvahetukānumānam taduddhāṭayati,
GSP29nystik_u:5844: ātmānaṃ lakṣayitvātmano duḥkhanidānānāmindriyādīnāṃ sarveṣāṃ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa
GSP29nystik_u:5845: ca śarīramāśritya tannidānatvamiti tadevāsya duḥkhamūlakāraṇamityanantaraṃ śarīraṃ
GSP29nystik_u:5853: atra ceṣṭāśrayatvenendriyāśrayatvenārthāśrayatvena ca pratyekaṃ samānajātīyebhya ātmendriyādibhyo 'samānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇasaṃśayādibhyaḥ śarīraṃ vyavacchidyate //
GSP29nystik_u:5857: sa cātivyāpakatayā avyāpakatayā ca na lakṣaṇam,
GSP29nystik_u:5867: tathāpi mūrtāntarāprayoge satīti viśeṣaṇāt na vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5871: pāṭite pāṣāṇe tādṛśasya tadvyāpārasya darśanāditi bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5878: yadyapi gandhādayo viṣayā na svarūpeṇa śarīramāśrayante tathāpi yadeṣāṃ sukhādyupalambhahetutvaṃ kāryaṃ prayojanaṃ tadarthamāśrayante ityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:5885: atra prathame pakṣe ceṣṭāśabdo vyāpāraviśeṣe spandādivanmukhyārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5886: tadetat---lokastāvadityādinā tathā cāyaṃ ceṣṭāśabda ityantena darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5891: sā ca na kriyāmātra ityanena darśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:5893: evaṃ bhāṣyānusāreṇa svamatena ca pratyekaṃ ceṣṭāśrayatvādi śarīrasya lakṣaṇamiti varṇayitvā samastamevedaṃ śarīralakṣaṇamiti ye varṇayāṃbabhūvuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5906: ghrāṇasya pārthivatvena samavāyo na viruddha iti cet---na,
GSP29nystik_u:5912: api ca yadā ceṣṭendriyārthasya samavāyena śarīratvam,
GSP29nystik_u:5913: hanta bho indriyasamavāyikāraṇeṣu paramāṇuṣu samastam etadastīti teṣāmapi śarīratvaprasaṅga ityāha---samasteti /
GSP29nystik_u:5918: cakṣurādayastu unmīlanānmūrtena śarīreṇa prayujyante iti na prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:5919: śrotraṃ tu ceṣṭādhāra eva na bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5923: na ca viśeṣalakṣaṇamakṛte sāmānyalakṣaṇe śakyamiti bhāṣyakāraḥ prathamamindriyāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ nirvedopayuktamāha---bhogasādhanānīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5924: anena yaccharīrasaṃyuktaṃ satkārakadoṣavyatiriktaṃ sākṣātpratītisādhanaṃ tadindriyamiti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sūcitam /
GSP29nystik_u:5926: pāramparyeṇa ca bhogasādhanatvaṃ ghrāṇādīnām sākṣānmanasa eva tatsādhanatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:5949: atra ca ghrāṇādiśabdāḥ paṅkajādipadavadavayavārthaṃ nimittīkṛtya kvacit,
GSP29nystik_u:5953: avayavārthage 'pi ca gandhādyupalabdhisādhane sannikarṣādau ghrāṇādiśabdāprayogāt avayavārthānvitaṃ ghrāṇatvādyeva ghrāṇādiśabdapravṛttinimittam
GSP29nystik_u:5957: na ca sannikarṣeṇa gandhopalabdhisādhanena ca vyabhicāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5959: tadanena jighratītyādi svaviṣayagrahaṇalakṣaṇāni ityantaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:5962: tasyāpi tvaksthāne indriye sparśopalabdhisādhane eva upacāra iti //
GSP29nystik_u:5963: bhūtebhya iti sūtrāvayavatātparyavyākhyānaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ bhūtebhya itīti /
GSP29nystik_u:5967: uttaram---bhūtaguṇaviśeṣagrahaṇasādhanatvam ghrāṇenaiva hi pṛthivyā yo guṇaviśeṣo gandhaḥ sa gṛhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5969: evaṃ rasanenaivāpāṃ yo mādhuryaṃ guṇaviśeṣaḥ sa gṛhyate,
GSP29nystik_u:5973: evaṃ śrotreṇaiva śabdo nabhasa iti hi niyamaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:5987: dravyatve sati rūpādiṣu madhye gandhasyaiva vya/
GSP29nystik_u:5991: tasya pṛthivyāḥ pāthaso vā yo guṇaviśeṣo gandho vā madhura eva vā rasabhedaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:5995: na caive rasanā apāmiva pṛthivyā api rasabhedaṃ gṛhṇātīti pārthivī bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:5999: atra ca karṇaśaṣkulīsaṃyogopādhinā śrotrasya nabhasaḥ kathañcid bhedaṃ vivakṣitvā bhūtebhya iti pa/
GSP29nystik_u:6013: tathāpi gandhādyutpattau pūrvagandhādidhvaṃsānāṃ nimittānāṃ bhedādutpannaṃ bhedādutpannaṃ kāryanānātvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6014: tadidamuktaṃ ye pūrve rūpādayaḥ teṣāṃ svagato viśeṣaḥ pradhvaṃsa ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6015: atha rūpatvādisāmānyameva kasmāt svagato viśeṣo na bhavatītyata āha---evaṃ ca kṛtveti /
GSP29nystik_u:6017: pradhvaṃsānāṃ tu stokabhūyastvaṃ niḥśeṣatve nopadyate iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6041: etāvataiva lakṣaṇe paryavasite suhṛdbhāvena pravibhāgābhidhānaṃ pṛthivyādiguṇā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6047: yathākramaṃ pṛthivyādiṣvanilānteṣu gandhādayaḥ sparśāntāḥ catustridvyekaniyamena viniyuktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6050: yena krameṇa ghrāṇādaya indriyasūtre paṭhitāḥ yena ceha gandhādaya,
GSP29nystik_u:6052: atra vārttikakāraḥ pṛthivyādiguṇā ityatrānekasamāsapratibhāsanāt saṃśayaṃ kṛtvā dvandvasamāsamavadhārayati---pṛthivyādiguṇā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6054: nanu kaṇṭhekāla itivad vaiyadhikaraṇyena bahuvrīhirbhaviṣyati pṛthivyādīnāṃ guṇā yebhyo gandhādibhyaḥ, te tathā /
GSP29nystik_u:6056: nabhogataśca śabdo nabhasi samānajātīyaṃ śabdamityata āha---na cānyatheti /
GSP29nystik_u:6059: na ca gandhādīnāṃ pṛthivyādiguṇahetutvapratipādanaṃ kvacit nirvedādāvupayujyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6083: svasaṃvedanena vā mānasena vā jñānena rūpāddhālambanaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6089: rūpādiparamāṇava eva tena tenākāreṇa utpannā ekayodakāharaṇakriyayā vyavacchinnā ghaṭa ityucyante /
GSP29nystik_u:6091: yathāha ghaṭa ityapi ca rūpādaya evaikārthakriyākāriṇastathā vyapadiśyante iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6115: yastu bhinnalokamaryādatayā brūte ādimān mithyāpratyayaḥ samyagjñānaṃ nimittīkaroti,
GSP29nystik_u:6141: na khalu saṃyujyamānānāmabhāve saṃyogaḥ śakyābhyupagama ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6145: nāpi saṃhanyamānā iti kimanayā svarūpeṇāvriyeteti bhāvaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6146: tadevaṃ tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvād ityasya vyāghātadoṣaṃ darśayitvā svasāmarthyālocane na vivakṣitaliṅgābhidhāyitā,
GSP29nystik_u:6151: tannṛ tadettatadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvādityanena na śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP29nystik_u:6153: pṛthivyādayaśca dharmitayā pradhānamiti ta eva parāmarṣṭavyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6155: tathā ca pratijñātasteṣāṃ rūpādyabhedo na sidhyedityasaṃbaddham /
GSP29nystik_u:6159: evaṃ śabdāntareṇāpi pratijñāprayoge tulyaḥ prasaṅga ityāha---evaṃ rūpādimātramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6171: samānārthānāmapi prakṛtīnāṃ rūpabhedena tatparasya pratyayasya sāmarthyabhedāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6172: yathāptoyaśabdayostulyārthatve 'pi toyaśabdāt parā vibhaktistoyānīti toyasamavetāmeva bahutvasaṃkhyāmāha /
GSP29nystik_u:6176: tadgatarūpādayo vā bahava ityekasyāmapi pāthaḥkaṇikāyāṃ bahuvacanopapattirāpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6177: na ca sorastāḍaṃ krandato 'pi lokasyāvinivṛtternaivamiti sāmpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:6188: na ca nīlasya sphaṭikalakṣaṇasyotpattiriti tṛtīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:6197: nāpi yūṣajātīyaṃ toyasaṃyogi dravyaṃ kṣīrajātīyamiveti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6199: iha tu kāṭhinye na yūṣabuddhivyapadeśāviti saṃyogabheda eva toyamāṃsayoryūṣa iti nyāyyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6204: na ca parakīya sādhanadoṣodabhāvanamātrāt svapakṣasiddhiriti siddhāntinaṃ sādhanaṃ pṛcchati---atha rūpādibhyo 'rthāntare dravye kiṃ pramāṇamiti
GSP29nystik_u:6205: yato 'yaṃ paro rūpādibhyo 'rthāntaraṃ dravyaṃ pratyakṣeṇa vidvānapi svasiddhāntābhyāsāhitavyāmohāpasmāro na tathā vyavaharati,
GSP29nystik_u:6207: asti hi sarveṣāmeva laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ brāhyaṇasya kamaṇḍaluritivat candanasya rūpādaya iti vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6209: anyathā tadbuddhyabhāvādityetāvanmātre vaktavye kathamāha tadagraha iti?
GSP29nystik_u:6221: tathāpi rūpādīnāṃ mūlakāraṇaṃ pradhānamityasti sāṃkhyānāṃ vyapadeśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6223: tathāpi rūpādīnāṃ parasparabhinnānāmanyonyaṃ vyapadeśyavyapadeśakabhāva upapatsyata ityuktam---samastairiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6225: upalabhyasyopalabhyeneti vaktavye pratyakṣsya pratyakṣeṇeti vacanaṃ rūpāvagamasamaye 'numeyebhyo rasādibhya ekāntato vyapadeśaṃ vyāvartayitum,
GSP29nystik_u:6229: vidhīyamānaṃ pratiṣidhyamānamiti yathāsaṃkhyaṃ niṣedhasya vidhyadhīnanirūpaṇatayā niṣedhyamekatvam aṅgīkāryam,
GSP29nystik_u:6241: carmaṇi dvīpinaṃ hanti itivad ghaṭādiviṣayanimittavyatirekabhāja ityatrāpi pratyayagrahaṇaṃ kartavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6246: sā yeṣāmasti te gajavājipadātiprabhūtayaḥ sthāninaḥ pratyekaṃ mahāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6248: kvacit punaḥ svajātīyasthānyaṅgāntarasannidhāne satyupacitāḥ sahasraṃ bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:6250: na caitāvatā yatra śataṃ gajādayaḥ yatra ca sahasraṃ tayoḥ senayormahattvāviśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6253: pratyayabhedād dravyādibhyaḥ saṃkhyāyā bhedamuktvā vyapadeśādabhedādapyāha---ata eveti //
GSP29nystik_u:6255: mūrtānāṃ samānadeśatvābhāvāt na parvasu khadiraśca sthāṇuśca samavetau /
GSP29nystik_u:6257: yasya dravyasya yāvān saṃyogapracayo 'samavāyikāraṇaṃ sa tāvānutpannamātra eva tajjanakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6259: tasmāt parvaṇāṃ saṃsthānaviśeṣa eva sthāṇuriti gamayitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6280: yastu yogyapramāṇābhāvāditi viśeṣayet taṃ pratyāha---yaśca tadagraha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6289: ātmādīnāṃ buddhihetūnāṃ lakṣaṇasyānantaraṃ hetumatī buddhirlakṣaṇīyetyāha vārttikakāraḥ---atha buddheravasaraprāptāyā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6296: api tu lakṣaṇaparādayamapyarthaḥ pratīyamāno 'pekṣitaśca nopekṣaṇīya ityuktaṃ bhavati //
GSP29nystik_u:6300: paryāyaśabdāśca saṃketamātrādhīnapravṛttayaḥ kva nāma na sambhavanti?
GSP29nystik_u:6320: tadidaṃ buddhitattvaṃ jaḍaprakṛtitayā indumaṇḍalam iva svayamaprakāśaṃ caitanyamārtaṇḍamaṇḍalacchāyāpattyā prakāśate,
GSP29nystik_u:6334: tasmāt kṛpaṇadhanamivātmacaitanyaṃ na svaparopakārīti buddheḥ svābhāvikaṃ caitanyamāstheyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6341: gandhādiviṣayatayā sukhaduḥkhaviṣayatayā ceyaṃ buddhirbhāvyamānā nirvedāya kalpata iti //15 //
GSP29nystik_u:6343: bhāṣyakāraḥ kramaprāptaṃ manolakṣaṇasūtramavatārayan utsūtramanyānyapi lakṣaṇāni āha---smṛtītyādi /
GSP29nystik_u:6350: tathāpi ākāśādīnāmapi manastvaṃ māṃ bhūdityata uktam---sahakārīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6355: atra ca ya ātmano viśeṣaguṇāste sarve indriyajanmāno yathā gandhādipratyayāḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6358: evaṃ ca saṃskārādiṣu na karaṇatvaprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6361: yadā tasyaiva manaḥsaṃyuktasyendriyasya krameṇa nīlādayo 'rthāḥ sambadhyante tadā tatkramāt krama
GSP29nystik_u:6363: bubhutsākramaṃ gṛhītvā siddhānte 'pi manaḥparityāgo mā bhūditi bhiyā uktam---satyāṃ bubhutsāyāmayugapadgrahaṇa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6364: na hi kiñcitkaraṇaṃ sambaddhamapi saditi syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6366: dvitīyādijñāneṣvapi saiva sāmagrīti sakṛdeva yāvat kartavayakaraṇāt samarthasya kṣepāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6367: kṣepayoge vā paścādapi na janayet, aviśeṣāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6368: na ca karturapyayaṃ kramakāritādharmaḥ sa hyanekakaraṇādhiṣṭhānena yugapannānākāryāṇi karoti /
GSP29nystik_u:6374: tadidamapimanaḥ smṛtyādisādhanatayā bhāvyamānaṃ nirvedāya kalpata iti saddhim//26 //
GSP29nystik_u:6378: na cāpratipādite manasi śakyā darśayitumiti manaso 'nantaratvaṃ pravṛtterityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:6382: tatra yā jñānotpādadvāreṇa puṇyapāpahetuḥ sā vākpravṛttiḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6384: tena manasā iṣṭadevatādyanucintanaṃ cakṣurādibhiśca sādhvasādhudarśanādi sūcitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6388: na ceyaṃ kṣaṇikā satī āmuṣmikaṃ janma sādhayitumarhati /
GSP29nystik_u:6393: prava---ṣāḥ //18// rāgadveṣau mohaprabhavau puruṣaṃ pravartamānaṃ pravartayataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6401: na pratyātmavedanīyeṣu samānāsamānajātīyavyāvṛtteṣu sphuṭatareṣu tad yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6407: sā ca pravṛttyā kāryeṇa lakṣyata iti karmalakṣaṇā ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6408: yataḥ karmaṇā pravṛttyā pravartakarāgādiyuktāḥ puruṣā lakṣyante,
GSP29nystik_u:6413: tadetat sarvaṃ vārttikakāraḥ praśnapūrvakaṃ vyācaṣṭe---kā punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:6415: sā punariyaṃ pravartanā pravartakānāṃ doṣāṇāṃ vyāpāraḥ kathaṃ gamyate?
GSP29nystik_u:6420: mauhaikārthasamavāyo hi rāgādīnāṃ mānasa pratyakṣavedanīya ityarthaḥ //18 //
GSP29nystik_u:6424: nanvātmano notpattiḥ saṃbhavati nityatvādityata āha bhāṣyakāraḥ---utpannasya saṃbaddhasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6437: tathāpi pravṛttidoṣajanitatvenāpi rūpeṇāmī nirvedopayogina iti tena rūpeṇa lakṣyante //
GSP29nystik_u:6439: atra ca pravṛttijanita iti vaktavye doṣagrahaṇaṃ na kevalaṃ pravṛtti prati doṣāṇāṃ hetubhāvaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6440: api tu pravṛttikārye sūkhaduḥkhe api prati iti darśanārtham /
GSP29nystik_u:6441: doṣasalilāvasiktāyāṃ khalvātmabhūmau dharmādharmabīje sukhaduḥkhe janayataḥ, nānyathā /
GSP29nystik_u:6442: na cāsti sambhavo na tatra tṛṣyati tacca tasya sukham,
GSP29nystik_u:6443: na ca tad dveṣṭi tacca tasya duḥkhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6451: nānukte śarīrādau teṣāṃ duḥkhatvaṃ śakyaṃ lakṣayitumiti tallakṣaṇebhyaḥ paramidanduḥkhalakṣaṇam ---
GSP29nystik_u:6452: bādha---kham //21// atra ca bādhaneti bādhanāviṣayāṃ buddhimupalakṣayati /
GSP29nystik_u:6453: tena bādhanā ca tadanuṣaṅgiṇaśca śarīrādayo gauṇamukhyabhāvena lakṣitā bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:6457: vaśitayā yoginaḥ svayamupalabhante svayamupanīteṣvapi viṣayeṣu audāsīnyamupekṣābuddhirvairāgyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6463: viraktaṃmānyā mānyante na sukhaṃ nāmāsti svarūpata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6468: tathāpyadhikādhikotkarṣaphalānāṃ darśapaurṇamāsādīnāṃ sahasrasaṃvatsaraparyantānāṃ vidhāyakebhyo vacanebhyo bhāvaphala eva dharmo gamyate bhāvasyaibotkarṣaśālitvāditi
GSP29nystik_u:6471: tadar---gaḥ //22// tadityanantaraṃ gauṇamukhyabhedabhinnaṃ duḥkhaṃ parāmṛśatītyāha bhāṣyakāraḥ---tena duḥkheneti /
GSP29nystik_u:6472: mukhyameva duḥkhamiti bhramo mā bhūdata āha---janmaneti /
GSP29nystik_u:6473: anena jāyamānā duḥkhaśabdena sarve śarīrādaya ucyanate ityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6477: ye tu brahmaiva nāmarūpaprapañcātmanā pariṇamata ityāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6482: ekadeśapariṇāme tu sāvayavatvāt ghaṭadivadanityatvaprasaṅgaḥ iti sūktam---ajaramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6493: tayā ca brahmaṇo nityatvāt tadapi nityamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6494: ātmana iti ca ṣaṣṭhī rāhoḥ śira itivat mantavyā /
GSP29nystik_u:6506: na cātmaiva vijñānasvabhāvaḥ tattadviṣayopadhānenodayavyayadharmeva bhavatīti sāṃpratam /
GSP29nystik_u:6507: ghaṭamahaṃ jānāmīti mānasyāṃ buddhau trayāṇāmapi jñānajñeyajñātaṇāṃ bhedenānuvyavasāyāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6509: na caitadasati bādhake bhedajñānaṃ bhrāntamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6514: na ca tadā viṣayaśūnyaṃ svaniṣṭhamātmacaitanyamiti yuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6517: na ca kiñcidapi sava prakāśamastīti caturthe vijñāna vādaṃ nirākurvan vakṣyati //
GSP29nystik_u:6518: tadevaṃ vyavasthite dūṣaṇa bhāṣyavārttikoktaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ yathāyamātmamanaḥsaṃyoga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6519: saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ tāvadayamātmamanaḥsaṃyogo dharmaṃ nimittamapekṣamāṇaḥ sukhajñānam ākārṣīt /
GSP29nystik_u:6520: yadi tu muktyavasthāyāṃ tadanapekṣa eva sukhajñānaṃ karoti,
GSP29nystik_u:6523: na vayaṃ viṣayamātrāpekṣāṃ brūmo yena rūpādiṣvapi jñānamutpādayet,
GSP29nystik_u:6524: api tu saṃsārāvasthāyāṃ yat sukhajñānāyānenāpekṣitaṃ tadapekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:6525: dharmaśca tadā tenāpekṣita iti muktyavasthāyāmapi dharmamevāpekṣate /
GSP29nystik_u:6527: tathā ca na rūpādivijñāna prasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6531: evamasmanmate 'pi sukhasaṃvedanahānāya ghaṭiṣyata ityata āha---na cāyaṃ sukhamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6532: asmanmate hi duḥkhahānāyaiva tadanuṣaktaṃ sukhaṃ jihāsitam /
GSP29nystik_u:6533: nityaṃ tu sukhaṃ sarvaduḥkhavinirmuktaṃ sanna duḥkhahānāya jihāsitaṃ saṃbhavati ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6535: pratyuta muktyavasthāyāmapi kalpanīyatā ityāha---nityaṃ śarīrādi iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6548: tasmāt nityānanda eva mokṣa ityata āha---yadi punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:6552: tau ca vītarāgeṇāsaktena satā śakyau bhogena kṣetum,
GSP29nystik_u:6554: sa hi saktasteṣu teṣu viṣayeṣu upāttamupāttaṃ bhu/
GSP29nystik_u:6555: jānaḥ tyaktaṃ tyaktaṃ copādadānaḥ saṃsārāt na mucyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:6558: anyathā tu nityasukhāvadhāraṇalāliteyaṃ tṛṣṇāpiśācī labdhaprasarā viṣayasukheṣvapi
GSP29nystik_u:6559: pratyāsanneṣu purūṣaṃ pravartayantī mokṣamasya sūdūraṃ pratikṣipediti manāgapi prasaro 'syā na dātavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6560: tasmāt nityānandapratipādakaśrutirātyantike duḥkhaviyoge bhāktīti yuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6563: tasya ca tvayā prasaro datta iti tulayo doṣa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6566: yathā nityasukhopādānaṃ mokṣam apratikūlayā saktyā sapratikūlaṃ naivamātyantikaduḥkhahānaṃ duḥkhadveṣānuṣaktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6570: alaṃ pratyayo hi sa ityapratikūlaṃ duḥkhahānamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6571: tadanena nityaṃ sukhamātmano mokṣe 'bhivyajyate ityādi tasmin prahīṇe nāsya nityasukharāgaḥ pratikūlo bhavatītyevamantaṃ bhāṣyajātaṃ vyākhyātaṃ veditavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6574: muktasya yadi nityaṃ sukhaṃ bhavati kāmaṃ bhavatu mā vā bhūt,
GSP29nystik_u:6575: ubhayorapi pakṣayoḥ vītarāgasya pravṛttau na mokṣādhigamo vikalpyate,
GSP29nystik_u:6580: na cātmani nitye rāgādayaḥ saṃsāraṃ kartumutsahante,
GSP29nystik_u:6598: nivṛttiśceyameva tasyā yat tatsantānavartinaścetaso 'nāgatasyānutpāda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6604: sa hi antyaḥ kṣaṇaḥ kiñcidārabhate na vā?
GSP29nystik_u:6608: tataḥ pūrve sarve 'pi kṣaṇā asantaḥ syuriti kasyoccheda iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6616: yathā cākṣaṇikasyopakāryatvaṃ tathā kṣaṇabhaṅgabhaṅge upapādayiṣyata iti saddhim //22 //
GSP29nystik_u:6632: atra ca vimarśaḥ saṃśaya iti saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6637: tadanenāsamānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇādibhyaḥ samānajātīyebhyaśca viparyayādibhyaḥ saṃśayo nivartito bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6640: atra viśiṣṭo 'vamarśo vimarśaviśiṣṭaḥ saṃśaya iti lakṣyapadam /
GSP29nystik_u:6643: trividha eveti ye pañcavidhamācakṣate te nirākṛtāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6644: tadanavadhāraṇajñānaṃ sa saṃśaya iti saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇaparaṃ bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---tatra viṣayasvarūpeti /
GSP29nystik_u:6649: jñānatvaṃ ca sāmānyaṃ saṃśayādiṣvapyastīti na virodha iti //
GSP29nystik_u:6654: guṇa eva kasmāt na karotīti praśnārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6664: na ca sadṛśo dharmaḥ sattāmātreṇa saṃśaye hetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6671: asmadāyatte hi śabdaprayoge kimityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6678: tasmād viśeṣāpekṣayā vighṛkṣālakṣaṇayeha viśeṣayoḥ purovartivastusādṛśyāt smaraṇe satyagrahaṇaṃ lakṣaṇīyam,
GSP29nystik_u:6685: tathā ca vinigamanāyāṃ ko heturityata āha---yaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:6687: tat kuto na virodha ityata uktam---svatantramiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6690: yathā ca dhūmo na sattāmātreṇa hetustathoktaṃ prāgiti //
GSP29nystik_u:6692: te kila manyante vyavacchedaheturapi dharmaḥ samāno bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:6693: yathā kṛtakatvaṃ sādhyadharmiṇi śabde dṛṣṭānta dharmiṇi ca ghaṭādau samānam,
GSP29nystik_u:6718: viśiṣyate hyanena purūṣaḥ sthāṇoriti anupalabdhasāmānyasyāpi kvacidupalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāstīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6721: na hi tatra sādhakaṃ bādhakaṃ vāsti pramāṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6724: tad yathā hastinaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatsaṃbandhino sthūṇāhastipakau smarati na ca tatra saṃndigdhe //
GSP29nystik_u:6726: naudolārūḍho hi gacchan vidūre ārohapariṇāvadvastudarśane 'pi satyapi ca sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāve viśeṣasmṛtyamāvāt naga iti vā nāga iti vā na sandigdhe /
GSP29nystik_u:6727: evamupalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthāto viśeṣāpekṣa iti padadvaye vidhīyamāna'nyataḥ smaryamāṇād viśeṣāt sadṛśadharmavati dharmiṇyanupalabhyamāne saṃśayaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:6729: no khalvanupalabhyamāne samānadharme dharmiṇi tadgatā vakrakoṭarādayo vā śiraḥ pāṇyādayo vā śakyagrahā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6737: na tu sādhakabādhakapramāṇābhāva iti na saṃśete /
GSP29nystik_u:6743: viśeṣaṃ bubhutsamāna iti viśeṣāpekṣa ityasya vivaraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6747: kathaṃ bubhutsamānaḥ saṃśeta ityata uktaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā,
GSP29nystik_u:6750: seyaṃ sādhakabādhakapramāṇānupapattau satyā samānadharmopalabdhirvinaśyadavasthā viśeṣasmṛtyā sahāvinaśyadavasthā ekasmin kṣaṇe satī saṃśayajñānasya heturiti siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:6753: anekadharmopapatterityatra bhāṣyakṛto vyākhyāṃ grahītum ekadeśivyākhyānamupanyasya dūṣayati---aneketi /
GSP29nystik_u:6755: saṃyogajatvaṃ hi kārye dravye guṇe ca rūpādau śarīrādikriyāyāṃ cāstīti dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ samānam /
GSP29nystik_u:6757: evaṃ śabdagato 'neko 'pi dharmaḥ samānatayaiva dravyatvādisandehahetuḥ triṣu,
GSP29nystik_u:6769: tadanena samānajātīyam asamānajātīyaṃ cānekamiti bhāṣyaṃ tasmād viśeṣa ityadhyāhṛtya vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:6778: tadevaṃ lakṣaṇābījadvayopanyāsena asādhāraṇo dharma iti grahaṇakavākyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GSP29nystik_u:6780: ekaṃ cāneka ca tadubhayamanekaṃ tasyānekasya pratyayaheturdharmo 'nekadharmaḥ bhedābhedapratyayaheturityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6783: tadidamāha---yato vibhāgajatvāt eṣa pratyayo bhavatīdaṃ vibhāgajaṃ śabdajātam ekam /
GSP29nystik_u:6785: tatra ya eva ekapratyayahetuḥ dharmo 'bhedaḥ sa eva anekapratyayaheturviśeṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6789: tadidamāha---yataḥ sadādereṣa pratyayo bhavatīdamekaṃ yataśca vibhāgajatvādepa pratyayo bhavatīdamanekamiti,
GSP29nystik_u:6798: yad yena sahacaritaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tat kkacid dṛśyamānaṃ tat smārayat tadviyaruddhenāpi ca saṃbandhānaniścāyayat saṃśayaheturbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:6800: asādhāraṇastu dharmo vibhāgajatvaṃ narte śabdāt kkacit pṛthivyādau vā utkṣepaṇādau vā gandhādau vā dṛṣṭa iti kathra smārayet,
GSP29nystik_u:6801: asmārayad vā kathaṃ tatra saṃśayaṃ janayet?
GSP29nystik_u:6802: tasmāt ko 'yaṃ bhavedityayo dharmāditi jijñāsāmātramutpādayet na tvayaṃ vāyaṃ veti saṃśayamityata āha---na hīti /
GSP29nystik_u:6806: nanvata evoktaṃ na saṃśayaheturityataḥ āha---vibhāgajatvaṃ saṃśarye karoti sarvato vyāvṛtteriti /
GSP29nystik_u:6808: yadyapi vibhāgajatvaṃ na dravyādau kvacid dṛṣṭam,
GSP29nystik_u:6809: tathāpi tadvyatirekaḥ pratyekaṃ dravyādau dṛṣṭa iti vibhāgajatvena sadādyaviśeṣavān śabdo dravyakarmabhyā vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ guṇaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6811: guṇadravyābhyāṃ vyāvartamānaḥ kiṃ karmeti vyatirekamukhena tattat smārayan asādhāraṇo dharmo bhavati saṃśayakāraṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6818: avayavakriyā hi tadavayavāvaruddhanabhobhāgavibhāgajanikā dravyārambhakasaṃyogāpratidvandvivibhāgajanakatvena vyāptā vikasatkamalakuṅmaladaleṣu dṛṣṭā /
GSP29nystik_u:6819: na hi tatra tatra mukulitād vikāsi kamalamanyat,
GSP29nystik_u:6823: tathā ca dravyaṃ kāryamapi na naśyet /
GSP29nystik_u:6829: anabhyupagamabījaṃ ca kutaḥ punarevadevamavagataṃ padmapatrāvayavakriyā vibhāgadvayajaniketi,
GSP29nystik_u:6834: athaṃ viparyayaḥ kasmāt na bhavatīti vaṃśadaladvayakriyaiva vibhāgadvayajanikā,
GSP29nystik_u:6841: kriyāvailakṣaṇyāt tu svahetuvailakṣaṇyajanmanaḥ kāryasya vibhāgasya vailakṣaṇyaṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:6843: tathāpi caitadvailakṣaṇyaṃ kriyāyā abhyupetavyam yadekā vibhāgamekaṃ janayati /
GSP29nystik_u:6852: tasmāt hastāditaruvibhāgaḥ kriyato 'saṃbhavannaṅgulyāditaruvibhāgameva kāryaikārthasamavāyalakṣaṇayā pratyāsattyā nimittīkarotīti vibhāgajavibhāgasiddhiṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6855: tathāpi vibhāgajatvamīdṛśamasādhāraṇamevetyata āha---astu vā tasya abhyupagatavibhāgasya api vibhāgajatvamasādhāraṇaṃ viśiṣṭam /
GSP29nystik_u:6857: pāṭyamāne hi vaṃśe śabdotpattau vaṃśadalayormitho vibhāgo nimittakāraṇam /
GSP29nystik_u:6872: tathāpi kāraṇamātravibhāgajavibhāgāsamavāyikāraṇakatvāditi hetuḥ bhāṣyakāreṇa vibhāgajatvāt ityanena sūcitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6878: na tu yo vyāvṛttaḥ tena sahāsyāsāhacaryāditi śaṅakāmapanetuṃ bhāṣyakārīyamuttaramāha---tulyajātīyeṣvitiṃ /
GSP29nystik_u:6881: yat khalu sadādirūpasaṃpannaṃ viśeṣavat tatsamānajātīyebhyo 'samānajātīyabhyaśca vyāvṛttam,
GSP29nystik_u:6883: abādibhyaśca dravyāntarebhyāṃ guṇakarmabhyaśca vijātīyebhyo gandhavattvena vyāvṛttaṃ dravyajātīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:6886: tathāvidhaḥ śabdaḥ sadādirūpasaṃpanno vibhāgajatvena samānāsamānajātīyebhyo viśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:6887: tasmād bhavati dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma veti saṃśaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6889: saṃprati samānaśabdaparyālocanayāpyanekapadamasādhāraṇe vartate lakṣaṇayaivetyāha---samānadharmasya saṃśayakāraṇatvena upayogād veti /
GSP29nystik_u:6890: samānaṃ hi pratigogitayā asamānaṃ buddhau sannidhāpayati /
GSP29nystik_u:6891: tatra dvayasyāpi samānaśabdena śrutyarthābhyāmupāttasya samānasya dharmasyāsamānasya ca,
GSP29nystik_u:6894: asmadāyatte śabdaprayoge kimityavācakaṃ prayokṣyāmaha iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6898: sā ca lākṣaṇikānekapadādhīnā nāsamānapadāt labhyata iti prayojanavallākṣaṇikapadopādānam /
GSP29nystik_u:6899: lakṣaṇaiva ceyam anekasmādvyāvṛtto dharmo 'nekadharma iti vigraheṇa nirvarṇyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6916: nityaḥ śabdaḥ śrāvaṇatvāt śabdatvavadityekaḥ pañcarūpopapanno 'vyabhicārī hetuḥ1 anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād ghaṭavaditi cāyamaparaḥ pañcarūpopapanno 'vyabhicārī heturiti /
GSP29nystik_u:6919: na cāyaṃ prativādinaḥ prayogo 'pi yuktaḥ iti /
GSP29nystik_u:6927: na ca yadā nivartakatvamasyāsti tadā janakamapītyāha---na hi viśeṣadarśane satīti //
GSP29nystik_u:6929: pratyakṣameva sa evāyaṃ gakāra ityevamākāraṃ pratyabhijñāsamājñātaṃ śabdasya sthemānamākalayat,
GSP29nystik_u:6931: iti nityatvaṃ paricchetsyatītyata āha---nāyamarthaḥ pratyakṣasya viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6932: tadeva hi pratyakṣaṃ saṃśayasya nivartakaṃ yadananyathāsiddham,
GSP29nystik_u:6934: idaṃ tu sādṛśyenāpi saṃbhavāt svayaṃ sandigdhaṃ sanna saṃśayocchedāyālamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6945: tathāpi svasvasāmānyaviśeṣagatvādyupahitā gavādivyaktaya iva gotvādyupadhānāḥ śakyasaṃketā iti na nityatāmākṣipatyāgama ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6947: na khalu candramasaḥ parabhāge hariṇasadasadbhāvasandehaḥ śakyaḥ kadācidapyucchettumasmadādīnāmityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6949: sandigdhanityānityabhāve śabde kṛtakatvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti nānityatvena svabhāvataḥ pratibaddham /
GSP29nystik_u:6960: sautrāntikamate hi rūpaṃ sapratighamiṣyate mūrtaṃ ca,
GSP29nystik_u:6961: nitya eveti vā anitya eveti vā abhilāpo nopapadyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:6962: sthāṇureveti vā puruṣa eveti vā abhilāpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6975: tathā ca bahu vyāhataṃ bhavatītyāśayavān pṛcchati---yadā punarevaṃbhūtāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:6977: nanu kṛtakatvasya sādhyatvāt śrāvaṇatvasya ca siddhatvāt prathamabhāvinā nityatvānumānena
GSP29nystik_u:6980: siddhamapi śravaṇatvamanumānasikatādyanityadharmasādhāraṇatayā savyabhicāraṃ sannityatvasya sādhanaṃ na bhavitumarhatoti /
GSP29nystik_u:6985: tathāpi tasyā vādiprativādigatāyā atyantaparokṣatvāt saṃśayakāraṇatvānupapatteḥ svakāryaṃ pravādaṃ lakṣayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:6986: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ upalabdhyavyavasthāyā anupalabdhavyavasthāyāśca pṛthak saṃśayakāraṇatvaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:6987: matvā samānadharmopapatterityanena gatārthatāṃ pariharannāha sma---purvaḥ samāno 'nekaścetyādi /
GSP29nystik_u:6990: satyāṃ ca viśeṣasmṛtau sādhakabādhakapramāṇāsadbhāve saṃśayo bhavatītyuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:6994: tat kimidānī sarveṣāṃ jñātṛsthatvāviśeṣaṇa trayāṇāmapi saṃśayakāraṇānāṃ samānānekavipratipattīnāmabhedaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:6998: asādhāraṇo hyadṛṣṭapūrvaḥ kvacidapi na saṃśayaṃ kartumutsahate,
GSP29nystik_u:6999: yat punarasādhāraṇavattvaṃ saṃśayahetutvenopavarṇitaṃ bhāṣyakṛtā tat samānameva,
GSP29nystik_u:7005: yacca vārttikakāreṇa sarvato vyāvṛttyā asādhāraṇasya saṃśayakāraṇatvamuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:7006: tatrāpi tadabhāvasya sādhāraṇasya saṃśayahetutve kimāyātamasādhāraṇasya? yathāhuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7012: sa ca sādhāraṇe niviśate iti sūktam sarva evāyaṃ samānadharma evābhidhīyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7015: na vayaṃ sarvatra sādhāraṇamapajānīmahe anvayavyatirekavyabhicāravaktṛgatatvabhedamātramādriyamāṇāḥ kāraṇabhedena trividhaṃ saṃśayamācakṣmahe ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7018: api caitayoḥ pṛthak saṃśayakāraṇatve 'tiprasaṅgāt niścayapūrvaṃ na pravarteta lokaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7021: na cānabhyāsadaśānne upalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthayāṃ saṃśaya iti vācyam,
GSP29nystik_u:7022: anabhyāsadaśāpanne hi dūrād vahnijñāne upalabdhyavyavasthāyā api na nāgo vā nago veti saṃśerate,
GSP29nystik_u:7023: kiṃ tu kiṃśukakusumanicayo vā uṣarbudho veti,
GSP29nystik_u:7027: sāmagrībhedena bhede trevidhyaṃ saṃśayasya sāmagrīniveśikāraṇabhedena tu pañcavidhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7033: upalabdhapūrvāyāṃ vyaktau saṃśaye tadgatā viśeṣāḥ susmūrṣitāḥ tajjātīyavyaktyantarasaṃśaye tvanyagatāste sāmānyadvāreṇopalabdhā eveti---sāmānyapratyakṣāditi
GSP29nystik_u:7042: bauddhānāṃ hi rāddhānte na rūpādidharmāśrayaḥ kaścidasti dharmī /
GSP29nystik_u:7044: yadi tvāha bhavatu rāddhāntavyākopo na hi śāstrāśrayo vāda iti,
GSP29nystik_u:7052: sāmānyaviśeṣatadvadabhyupagame 'pi tadvato 'śravaṇāt sādharmyasya sāmānyasya viśeṣā iti gamyeta,
GSP29nystik_u:7053: na ca sāmānyasya viśeṣā iti viruddhārthamabhidhānaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7062: yadi tāvat saṃśayasāmānyalakṣaṇe sthite trīṇi viśeṣalakṣaṇāni tataḥ saṃśayatvenopagṛhītānāṃ trayāṇāṃ parasparavyavacchedakamātraṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyam
GSP29nystik_u:7067: tathā cānyānyapi saṃśayakāraṇāni santīti tānyapi vaktavyāni /
GSP29nystik_u:7070: so 'yamasyātmanaḥ sannikarṣajanmā saṃśayaḥ āntarasya śamāderviṣayasyeti samādhatte---astu tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7073: tathā ca pratipattigauravaṃ syāditi tallāghavāya śeṣāpekṣā yuktā /
GSP29nystik_u:7077: vipratipanno 'pi puruṣaḥ saṃdigdhavat pratipādya evati manvānaścodayati---saṃśayavaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7079: kiṃ tu jalpavitaṇḍābhyāṃ śiṣyato nītvā sandigdha eva pratipādya ityabhiprāyeṇa pariharati---satyamiti //23 //
GSP29nystik_u:7088: na ca sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārau svarūpeṇa pravṛtti nivṛttigocarāviti tadupāyapravṛttyaiva cetanapravṛttigocarāviti darśayati---tadāptihānopāyamanutiṣṭhatīti
GSP29nystik_u:7094: tat kuto na virodha ityata āha---vyavasāyo 'rthasyādhikāra ityādi /
GSP29nystik_u:7112: yathā ca pramāṇasya pramāṇopapannatā na cānavasthā,
GSP29nystik_u:7114: na ca prasiddhataratayā na prayojanaṃ lakṣaṇīyam iti yuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:7127: yā khalu niṣprayojaneti na brūmaḥ prayojanaṃ nyāyasyāṅgamityapi,
GSP29nystik_u:7128: mukhyaṃ prayojanameva hi tanna syād yadṛte puruṣādanyārthamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7129: prayojanavāṃstu nyāyo niṣprayojanāṃ tadgatāṃ cintāmaṅgī karoti,
GSP29nystik_u:7131: tasmādanaṅgamapi prayojanaṃ parīkṣāyā mūlaṃ svarga iva setikartavyatākasya yāgādyanuṣṭhānasyeti siddham //24 //
GSP29nystik_u:7132: NyS_1,1.25: laukikaparīkṣadāṇāṃ yasminn arthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:7142: tadviparītāḥ tadubhayaṃsapannāśca parīkṣakāḥ pratipādakā iti yāvat kathābahutvācca bahuvayanam /
GSP29nystik_u:7149: lakṣitaśca dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇalakṣaṇāya kalpate ghaṭate iti bhāṣyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7155: na khalvasiddhaḥ sādhyena sādhanasyāvinābhāvo dṛṣṭāntena sādhyate ityarthaḥ//25 //
GSP29nystik_u:7157: atra bhāṣyakāraḥ siddhāntasāmānyalakṣaṇamapaṭhitvaiva tātparyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---atha siddhāntaḥ ityādinā /
GSP29nystik_u:7158: tatra idamitthaṃbhūtamiti vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭe---idamiti sāmānyata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7159: bhāṣye ca saṃsthitiritthaṃbhāvavyastheti sāmānyopakramasya abhyupagamasya pramāṇato viśeṣaparyantatāparisamāptiḥ saṃsthitirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7165: na khalu sāmānyalakṣaṇamantareṇa śakyo vibhāga ityuktam//26 //
GSP29nystik_u:7170: tadevādhikaraṇam āśrayo jñāpakatvena yeṣāmarthānāṃ te tathoktāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7180: sākṣācchāstre nopātto yathā manasa indriyabhāva iti //27 //
GSP29nystik_u:7191: yatra ca saṃbandhagrahaḥ sa dṛṣṭānta ityarthaḥ //28 //
GSP29nystik_u:7197: cetanā ātmanaḥ niratiśayā apariṇāmino na kenacid dharmeṇopajanāpāyadharmeṇa yujyante /
GSP29nystik_u:7198: prākṛteṣu ca dehādiṣu tatkāraṇeṣu mahadahaṅkārapañcatanmātrabhūtasūkṣmeṣu viśeṣo 'tiśaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7203: yat---ntaḥ//30// yasyārthasya sādhyasya vā hetorvā siddhau iti viṣayasaptamī,
GSP29nystik_u:7208: sa pakṣo vā bhavatu heturvā anena rūpeṇa adhikaraṇasiddhāntaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7210: atra hi pṛthivyādigatenotpattimattena upalabdhimatpūrvakatvaṃ tadgataṃ sādhyamānaṃ svasiddhyantargatānuṣaṅgisarvajñatvādyupetameva sidhyati,
GSP29nystik_u:7215: pūrvo 'rtho yaḥ sākṣāddhikṛtaḥ tasya siddhāvantargata iti bhāṣyārthaḥ//30 //
GSP29nystik_u:7226: evaṃ svamatena sūtraṃ vyākhyāya bhāṣyakāravyākhyānaṃ dūṣayati---śāstrānabhyupagata iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7229: na ca pramāṇānadhīnābhyupagamastadanvetīti nāyamīdṛśo 'bhyupagamasiddhānto bhavitumarhatīti hṛdi nidhāyāyuktāpi darśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:7230: ajñaṃ pratyasadācāratvāt pramāṇikaṃ ca puruṣaṃ pratyaśakyatvāt buddhimato 'vajñānasyāyuktatvāt aśakyatvādityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7235: tarhi siddhāntabhedināmarthānāṃ prāmāṇikatvena viruddhadharmasamāliṅgitā bhāvāḥ prasajyerannityata āha---tatpratyayāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7239: karmatayā vyajyamānatayā vā upādānaṃ svārthasya pakṣa iti padam /
GSP29nystik_u:7242: kriyāviśeṣayukta iti avāntaravyāpārayukte tena hi pradhānakriyāyāṃ kārakāṇāṃ vaicitryaṃ bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7246: na ca dharmiṇi anabhyupagate tadāśrayo 'bhyupagato bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7249: yathā daṇḍiśabdena daṇḍasaṃbandhopahitasīmānaḥ samānāsamānajātīyāḥ sarve saṃgṛhyante,
GSP29nystik_u:7250: tathā pakṣaśabdenāpītyarthaḥ ayaṃ tu kalpaḥ sarvatantrasiddhāntāvyāpakatvakathanenaivārthādapākṛta iti na pṛthak nirākṛtaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7252: na ca vyajyamānatvamasti nisargavyakte sarvatantrasiddhānta iti bhāva /
GSP29nystik_u:7254: pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkte iti vākyasya divābhojananiṣedho 'rthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7256: sā ca na yathā pramāṇāntarulaṃ tathā dvitīye nivedayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7264: anyaparādapi vākyāt pratīyamāno 'rtho 'pekṣita svīkriyata eveti śābdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7268: tasmāt tathāvidhārthapratyāyanameva pratijñādīnāmavayavasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ siddhamiti sūtramityanena darśitaṃ vārttikakṛtā iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7276: tasya pravarttikā utpādikā jijñāsā pratyayasādhanānusaraṇadvāreṇa pratyāsattiḥ saṃśayatattvajñānayorviśeṣagatā na tu svarūpagatā,
GSP29nystik_u:7286: na syāt kṛtaka iti anityatvasya nityatvaṃ pratipakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7291: vyudasyate hi tena pramāṇābhyanujñānadvāreṇa itikartavyatābhūtena saṃśaṃya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7292: tadetad bhāṣyajātaṃ praśnapūrvakaṃ vārttikakṛd vyācaṣṭe---kathaṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:7295: svapratipādakā eva kasmāt na bhavantītyata āha---niścitatvācceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7299: tat kiṃ sarvathaivānaṅgaṃ jijñāsādaya ityata uktaṃ bhāṣyakatā,
GSP29nystik_u:7304: te ca jijñāsādaya utpannāḥ prakaraṇasyotthāpakāḥ svarūpeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:7305: na punaḥ svajñānena yena śabdapratipādyāḥ santaḥ prakaraṇe 'pyaṅgaṃ bhaveyuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7318: sa ca parvate 'gnimati sādhyamāne viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhalakṣaṇo niyamo 'rthāt sidhyati /
GSP29nystik_u:7322: atrānyayogavyavacchedaṃ vākyārthaṃ manvāno bhadantaḥ pratijñālakṣaṇamativyāptyavyāptibhyām ākṣipati---ubhayeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7323: ubhayoravadhāraṇayoḥ prāptau saṃśayena kimidamavadhāryate kiṃ cedamiti prasaktāvityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7325: yata evakaraṇaṃ na tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇam iti hi śābdā iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7331: yathendriyārthasannikarṣotpannamityukte jñānaṃ sukhādi ca sāmanyena prāptam /
GSP29nystik_u:7337: tat kri loke na kpacidavadhāraṇam ityata āha---yatra ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7354: prajñāpanīyena dharmaiṇa dharmiṇo viśiṣṭasya parigrahavacanam iti sūtrārthaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7359: ito 'pi nāsiddhayorhetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅga ityāha---sādhyanirdeśa iti ca pratijñāyāmiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7363: nanu yadi sarvatantrasiddhāntātiriktānāṃ siddhāntāntarāṇāṃ sādhyatvaṃ tarhi sādhyenaiva caritārthatvād apārthakaṃ pṛthagabhidhānameteṣāmiti,
GSP29nystik_u:7368: dhibhāgasūtreṇa prakaraṇotthānahetavo vākyāvayavatayā nirākāryatvena jijñāsādayo buddhisthīkṛtāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7370: na ca cākṣuṣatvādiṣu pramāṇabādhiteṣu santi ta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7373: evaṃ tāvad vyutpattyādyālocanayā sādhyaśabdasya na hetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgaḥ ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:7376: anyatarāsiddhayorhetudṛṣṭāntayoḥ prasaṅgo mā bhūditi karmatayā te upādīyanta ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:7384: tathā ca na sākṣāt tatpratyāyanāya te vibhavantīti tadarthaṃ sādhane vyāpriyante /
GSP29nystik_u:7385: tena siṣādhayiṣitadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī teṣāṃ pradhānaṃ viṣayaśca /
GSP29nystik_u:7386: pradhānaṃ ca prathamaṃ buddhau viparivartate iti sādhyaśabdena sa evocyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7388: tadevamaduṣṭamasmallakṣaṇamiti yadasmallakṣaṇamanena doṣeṇa bhaṅktvā bhadantena anyathā lakṣaṇaṃ praṇītam,
GSP29nystik_u:7390: nanu yatra sādhyapadam asti bhavatu tatreṣṭagrahaṇamanarthakam,
GSP29nystik_u:7394: tadapi hi pacyamānaṃ vyajyamānaṃ sādhyamevāha---tacca karma,
GSP29nystik_u:7397: nanvaniṣṭaḥ pakṣa iti vipratiṣiddhamityata uktam---arthataḥ kileti /
GSP29nystik_u:7405: no khalu mahatī pradīpe ghaṭo mahān alpe vā alpa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7406: mahati tu kāraṇe mahān śabda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7415: yadyapyāgamo 'pi śabdānityatve 'sti yathā somaṃ rājānamasṛjata tatastreyo vedā asṛjyanta //
GSP29nystik_u:7417: tathāpi nāsadāsīnno sadāsīdāmnāya eva khalvayamagra āsīt //
GSP29nystik_u:7420: prasiddhivirodhaṃ tu na budhyamāhe pramāṇavirodhād bhedena /
GSP29nystik_u:7428: asmākaṃ tu mānasapratyakṣavirodha iti sarvathā na pramāṇādanyā prasiddhiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:7431: vastu hi yādṛśaṃ svakāraṇādutpannaṃ tādṛśameva tat /
GSP29nystik_u:7432: na tasyānyathābhāva iti na tatra doṣo niviśate /
GSP29nystik_u:7434: yā punaḥ ṣauruṣeyī dṛṣṭamanyatrārthamanyatra samāropya bhrāntyā vā paravipralambhāya vā pratijñādirūpeṇa vākyakriyā,
GSP29nystik_u:7438: svārthāpavādaḥ svavacanavirodhaḥ kartṛdoṣo bhramo vā vipralambho vā kriyāyāmupacaryate /
GSP29nystik_u:7439: na ca kriyāyāṃ bhramo vā vipralambho vā,
GSP29nystik_u:7440: tayorabhiprāyabhedatayā puruṣadharmatvāt kriyāyā vastubādhanāt puruṣābhiprāyāvagatiriti kriyādvāreṇetyuktam //
GSP29nystik_u:7445: sa triṣu rūpeṣvanyatamena rūpeṇa rahito nyūno 'siddho vā viruddho vā anaikāntiko vā bhavatīti so 'yaṃ nyūnatādoṣo hetoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7451: sa hi vādino vā prativādino vābhiprāyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7454: pratijñāgatā hi doṣā yadi tadgatatvena udbhāvyamānā na vādino nigrahamāpādayeyuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7456: pārayanti tu pratijñāgatāni dūṣaṇāni nigrahituṃ vādinamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7462: iṣṭagrahaṇamanakṣarārūḍhamapyabhiprāyavyāptaṃ sādhyaṃ tathā syādityevamarthaṃ yathā parārthāścakṣurādaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7466: tacca noccārayati mā bhūdananvayo hetuḥ saṃghātatvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7473: tātparyaṃ cāsya kvacid vācye kvacillakṣya iti sarva evāsau vacanārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7482: tataśca saṃśayaviṣaya iṣyamāṇo jijñāsyamānaśca sādhya eva bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7493: ata evaṃ vaktavyaṃ pakṣo yaḥ sādhayitumiṣṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7495: tathāpi tumunā ya eva sādhayitā vādī sa evaiṣitetyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7496: na punarvādino niyoktā sādhayitā vādī caiṣiteti /
GSP29nystik_u:7501: sa hi sidhyantaṃ sādhyaṃ vādī tasminniyaṃ sādhanā samavetā /
GSP29nystik_u:7502: yastu tasyāpi prayojakastṛtīyasthānapatito na tasmin sādhanā samavaitīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7503: yaḥ kārayati sa karotyeveti kathañcidasya bhaktyā kartṛtvam,
GSP29nystik_u:7508: yastāvat śāstrāviruddho 'rthaḥ pramāṇasiddhaḥ sa śāstrīya eva śāstrābhyupetapramāṇasiddhatvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7510: yastu pramāṇīkṛtavaiśaṣikatantraḥ śabdanityatvaṃ sādhayati so 'navadheyavacanaḥ na hetvabhidhānaṃ yāvat pariṣatprativādibhyāṃ nīyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7512: yastu vaiśeṣikatantrādhyayanamātrād vaiśeṣikatvamātmano darśayitvā śabdanityatāṃ pratijānīte nāsau pramāṇīkṛtavaiśeṣikatantra iti na nigṛhyate iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7521: tathā hi parapratyāyanāya vacanam uccārayanti prekṣāvantaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7522: tadeva ca pare bodhayitavyā yad bubhutsante /
GSP29nystik_u:7524: no khalvāmrān pṛṣṭaḥ kovidārānācakṣāṇaḥ praṣṭuravadheyavacano bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7526: yathā ca māṭhara samidhamāhareti guruṇā preṣita eṣohamāharāmītyanuktvā tadarthaṃ tadaryaṃ yadāyaṃ dātrāya gṛhaṃ praviśati,
GSP29nystik_u:7527: tadāsmai kupyati guraḥ āḥ śiṣyāpasada chāndasavacara māṭhara māmavadhīrayasīti bruvāṇaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7528: evamanityaṃ śabdaṃ bubhutsamānāyānityaḥ śabda ityanuktvā yadeva kiściducyate kṛtakatvāditi vā,
GSP29nystik_u:7530: kṛtakaśca śabda iti vā tat sarvamasyānapekṣitam āpātato 'saṃbaddhābhidhānabuddhyā,
GSP29nystik_u:7532: yat kṛtakaṃ tat sarvamanityaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7537: na ca pariṣatprativādinau pramāṇīkṛtavādinau yadetad vacanaṃ saṃbandhāya pratīkṣete,
GSP29nystik_u:7540: anityaḥ śabda iti tvapekṣita ukte kuta ityapekṣāyāṃ kṛtakatvāditi heturupa tiṣṭhate /
GSP29nystik_u:7541: so 'yaṃ pañcāvayavaprayoge ca tallakṣaṇe ca pratijñānantarakāla evāvasaro hetoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7545: sa ca vibhāgoddeśe vākyāvayava iti vacanarūpaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7546: tasya sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ sādhyasādhanamiti sādhyate 'neneti vyutpattyā yadyapi pārārthyāpannaṃ kṛtakatvādikamartham āha,
GSP29nystik_u:7548: yadi ca vacanaṃ heturityucyeta tatsādhyena samabhivyāhṛtaṃ pratijñā syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7553: kiṃ tu prātipadikārthapradhānatayā svaniṣṭhamiti na tatrāpi prasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7566: sādhyasyeti dharmimātre buddhirmā bhūdityata uktaṃ dharmasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7573: yo dharmo dhūmādi---sādhye bhavati sa tathābhūta evodāharaṇe 'pīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7574: udāhniyata ityudāharaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntadharmī tasmin na punaḥ sa eva /
GSP29nystik_u:7578: sā hi tattvānyatvavirodhinītyata āha---kiṃ tu tattulyaḥ sa evetyucyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7579: yathā tāneva śalīn upayuṅkte tāneva tittirīnīti tadanena sāmānyād iti bhāṣyaṃ vyākhyātam //
GSP29nystik_u:7581: sādharmyamātratvaṃ hi viruddhe cāsādhāraṇe savyabhicāre cāstīti teṣāmapi vacanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7583: nanu tathāpi savyabhicāre 'pyudāraṇasādharmyamiti kathaṃ nivartyate ityata āha---udāharaṇeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7586: sādharmyādityato viśeṣeṇa sarvasādharmyaprāptau udāharaṇasādharmyamapi prāptameveti vidhānānarthakyaṃ parisaṃkhyāyakaṃ sadavadhāraṇārthameva bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7587: tadavadyotanāya ca evakāraḥ sādharmyameva ityatra sādhyapadaṃ yojanīyam /
GSP29nystik_u:7594: sādhyasādhanamiti ca padena sannidhāpitamiti tadeva dvitīyam avadhāraṇaṃ sphuṭīkaroti---atrāpi ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7604: etat kila hetulakṣaṇa bhadanto dūṣayāṃbabhūva sādhanaṃ yadi sārdhmyaṃ na vākyāṃśaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7606: yadi sādhanasādharmyayoratyantābhedo yadi vā sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvena kathañcid bhedaḥ ubhayathāpi na pañcamī,
GSP29nystik_u:7618: na tatrāpi dvidhā doṣāt sākṣād vā sādhanaṃ pāramparyeṇa vā?
GSP29nystik_u:7620: vaktṛjñānaṃ tarhi sākṣāt sādharmyasamutthaṃ pāramparyeṇa ca śrotuḥ sādhyavijñānasādhanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7622: tarhi śrotṛjñānaṃ pāramparyeṇa sādharmyasamutthaṃ sākṣāt sādhanaṃ hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7639: yadā hi sādhyasādhanaṃ nāmodāharaṇasādharmyādatiriktaṃ nāsti kiṃ tu śabdamātramavaśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7641: tathā ca sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñā ityanena virodhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7648: tadetallakṣaṇaṃ vyācakṣāṇairasmābhiḥ parihṛtamiti na parihārāntaraṃ prayojayatītyāha---tatra tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:7649: uktaṃ yathā hetupadasannidhau sādhanapadaṃ hetupade pravartate,
GSP29nystik_u:7653: sādharmyasya liṅsya kṛtakatvādihetupadavācyasya vyabhicāritvādiyogādudāharaṇaviśeṣaṇayogo na punaḥ sādhyasādhanapadavācyasya kṛtakatvādityāderhetuvacanasyetyarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:7664: tathā prātisvikamapi bhedaṃ sarveṣāmeva śabdānāmitikaraṇo darśayatītyāha---dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7667: anabhyupagato 'rthāntaraṃ vipakṣo yasya hetoranityatve sādhye kṛtakatvādeḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7668: yadabhyupagataṃ bhadantena tasmāt ṣaṣṭyastviti tad dūṣayati---yadapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7672: na tu ṣaṣṭhī vā hetupañcamī vā kārakavibhaktiriti /
GSP29nystik_u:7673: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa śuddhaṃ hetuvacanamudāhṛtam---utpattidharmakatvāditi tasya codāharaṇasādharmyasamutthatvajñāpanāyodāharaṇamapi darśitam utpattidharmakamanityaṃ dṛṣṭamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:7677: sato vināśo vā anityatvam, tadyogo vā?
GSP29nystik_u:7681: tataścānityaḥ śabda iti samānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7686: na ca sāmānyātiriktaṃ sādṛśyaṃ vastvantaraṃ dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā /
GSP29nystik_u:7691: aparānteti vaktavye ubhayāntagrahaṇena pūrvāntaniveśanaṃ hetorutpattimattvasyātyantiṅkīṃ pratyāsattimavinābhāvopayoginīṃ darśayitumiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7694: taccāparāntasya bhinnakālasya saṃbaddhasyāpi virodhitayā buddhisthasya saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7695: tathā ca yaivāparāntāvacchinnasya sattā piṭharasya saivāparāntāvacchinnasya śabdasyāpi /
GSP29nystik_u:7707: tenāsadviśeṣaṇasya sata ityetāvataiva pūrvāntaparicchinnasya sattāsaṃbandhaḥ sattā vā tadviśeṣaṇotpattirdarśitā /
GSP29nystik_u:7711: na caivaṃ labdhotpattini vastuni utpadyata iti pratyayaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7713: tasmāt pūrvāntāvacchinnavastusattayā tatsaṃbandhena vā tasyaiva vastuno 'parāntāvacchinnā sattā vā tatsaṃbandho vā jñāpyate iti sarvaṃ ramaṇīyam
GSP29nystik_u:7714: nanu bhāṣyakṛd abhūtvā bhavatītyasya vākyāsyārthamutpattiṃ vakṣyati,
GSP29nystik_u:7716: ataḥ kuto na virodha ityata āha---vākyārtheti / ya
GSP29nystik_u:7720: api svasadviśeṣaṇasya sataḥ sattā vā tatsaṃbandho vetyuktamityarthaḥ//34 //
GSP29nystik_u:7724: yadā viṣāṇitvena sādhyate tasyāsti pakṣavaidharmyamiti hetuḥ syādityata āha---udāharaṇena vaidharmyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7726: tathāpi yadā śarīramātraṃ pakṣīkṛtya sātmakatvaṃ sādhyate prāmādimattvena,
GSP29nystik_u:7727: tadāsti tasyodāharaṇena vaidharmyamiti so 'pi hetuḥ syādityata āha---eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:7731: tathāpi anvayavyatirekiṇo hetāranaikāntikasya vipekṣaikadeśavyāpinaḥ saṃgrahaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7733: utpattidharmakatvād anityo mūrtatvādityata āha---vaidharmyameva codāharaṇeneti vipakṣodāharaṇenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7741: prāṇādinā ca svakāraṇaṃ prayatnecchādyupalakṣayati---yadubhayapakṣasaṃpratipannaṃ nirātmakaṃ ghaṭādi tatsarvamaprāṇādimad dṛṣṭam iti vyatyāsena yojanā /
GSP29nystik_u:7747: anvayivyatirekiṇastadvivekasya ca tantrāntaraprasiddhena nāmnā tantrāntaraprasiddhatāṃ darśayati---so 'yamavīta iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7755: gṛhītāvinābhāvo hi hetuḥ sādhyena tasya paricchedakaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7756: sa ca dṛṣṭāntadharmiṇi hetusādhyadharmayordarśane satyavinābhāvo dṛṣṭo bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7759: darśane vā nāvītaḥ kiṃ tu vīta evetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7768: atrāpi yāvannirātmakaṃ tat sarvam aprāṇādimad dṛṣṭamiti vyatyāsena yojanā,
GSP29nystik_u:7772: yadi punarevamucyate nivartatāmaprāmāṇādimattvaṃ jīvaccharīrāt prāṇādimattvasya pramāṇata upalabdhermā nivartiṣṭa nairātmyam, tasmād
GSP29nystik_u:7775: kiṃ jīvaccharīre sādhye nairātmyaniścayād vyabhicāra uta tatsandehāt?
GSP29nystik_u:7789: gṛhītvā jīvaccharīre vyāpakasyāprāṇādimattvasya nivṛttyā nairātmyasya vyāpyasya nivṛtterātmā avagantavyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7790: evaṃ ca sati kalpanākoṣasyāparimeyatvāt yad yadeva kalpyate tattadabhāvasyadhaṭādau
GSP29nystik_u:7798: akṣaṇikatve ca vyavasthite kāryaṃ samavāyikāraṇāpekṣamitīcchādīnāṃ samavāyikāraṇena bhavitavyam,
GSP29nystik_u:7800: śarīrendriyādīnāṃ ca samavāyikāraṇatvaniṣedhe sati yad icchādīnāṃ samavāyikāraṇaṃ pariśiṣyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7801: tad dravyamātmeti ca kṣetrajña iti ca jīva iti cākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7802: tadasya viśeṣato 'navagatasyāpīcchādisamavāyikāraṇatayā sāmānyarūpeṇāvadhāritasya śakyaḥ prāṇādirahiteṣu ghaṭādiṣvabhāvaḥ pratipattum /
GSP29nystik_u:7805: so 'yaṃ jīvaccharīre kāryasyābhāvo vyāpako nivartamānaḥ svavyāpyaṃ tatkāraṇābhāvamādāya nivartate iti siddhaṃ jīvaccharīre prāṇakāraṇam, sa cātmeti /
GSP29nystik_u:7811: sa eva svabhāvo yasya sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7815: ye 'pi hi nairātmyavādino buddhiṃ vā bhūtapatiṇāmabhedaṃ vā icchādikāraṇamācakṣate,
GSP29nystik_u:7819: so 'yaṃ jīvaccharīre kāryābhāvo vyāvartamānaḥ kāraṇābhāvaṃ vyāvartayati /
GSP29nystik_u:7822: ṛjumārgeṇa sidhyantaṃ ko nu vakreṇa sādhayet
GSP29nystik_u:7833: yathā ca bhūtānāṃ pariṇatibhedo na kāraṇaṃ tathā hi tṛtīye upapādayiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:7834: vyatirekamukhenāpi prāmādeḥ sātmakatvenānvayasiddhau na kevalavyatirekīti cet?
GSP29nystik_u:7836: kiṃ tu sapakṣābhāvena vidhimukhenāsya pratibandhaṃ nirākurmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7842: sapakṣābhāvastu nairātmyenāpyavyapadeśya iti kathaṃ nairātmyaniṣedhena vyapadiśyatām?
GSP29nystik_u:7850: vipakṣavyatirekamātreṇa vyatirekiṇo gamakatvaṃ matvā codayati---yadi tarhīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7856: nanu mā bhūd gandhavattvaṃ heturvyatireka vyabhicārād anityādivannityādapyasya vyatirekāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7857: tasya tu pakṣa eva kevalaṃ na tu sapakṣavipakṣau,
GSP29nystik_u:7858: na tasaya vyatirekavyabhicāro 'stīti sa kasmāt na heturiti codayati---yaḥ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:7865: yadi hi pakṣaikadeśavṛttirapi vipakṣābhāvāt na vyatirekī hetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7866: tarhi tasya pakṣaikadeśavṛtterapi sato vipakṣanivṛttirasti sa hetuḥ prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:7871: atra ca yena pakṣaikadeśavṛttervyatirekyābhāsasya nirākaraṇaṃ tadavadhāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ darśitam /
GSP29nystik_u:7873: asya tu pakṣeṇāpīti vyatirekyapi na hetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7891: tatra pūrvayoḥ prakārayoryathākramamasādhāraṇasya cāsiddhasya ca hetutvaprasaṅga iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7896: sa cāyaṃ viśeṣe cāviśeṣe ca prasṛta iti vipakṣekadeśavṛtterapi pakṣasapakṣasādhāraṇasya hetutvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7901: viśeṣa evetyavadhāraṇena vipakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ gaurayaṃ viṣāṇitvāditi hetutvena pratiṣiddhaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7903: tathā ca vipakṣādeva yo viśeṣa eva sa hetuḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7904: sapakṣāttu yo viśeṣa eva sa na heturityuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7905: yathā ca aśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇitvāt iti sapakṣād viśeṣa eveti hetutvena pratiṣiddho bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7906: yastu sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnanāntarīyakatvādiḥ sa sapakṣād viśeṣa eva na bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:7910: yadi sapakṣādapi yo viśeṣaḥ sa sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnānantarīyakatvādirhetuḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7911: evaṃ sati vipakṣādeveti avadhāraṇaṃ bādhitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7913: na vipakṣādevetyetanmātramavadhāryate yena sapakṣaikadeśavṛttiḥ prayatnāntarīyakatvādinarna hetuḥ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:7914: api tu yo viśeṣa eva sa heturiti prāpte vipakṣādeveti niyamyate,
GSP29nystik_u:7915: tena sāvadhāraṇasya viśeṣasya vipakṣavṛtterhetutvaṃ pratiṣiddhaṃ bhavati yathā aśvo 'yaṃ viṣāṇītvāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:7917: tasya hetutve 'pi na vipakṣādeveti bādhitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:7918: yadyapi caivaṃ satyapi sapakṣaikadeśavṛtterhetutvaṃ na śrutam,
GSP29nystik_u:7925: pakṣadharmatve sati viśeṣa eva vipakṣādeveti niyame kutaḥ pakṣaikadeśavṛtteḥ prāptiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7946: heturvipakṣād viśeṣa iti ca yadā sautrāntikapakṣamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:7947: yadā tvanityatvahetau lakṣye lakṣaṇaṃ vicāryate iti vipakṣaśabdārtho vācyaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7948: nanu ca nityo vipakṣa ityata āha---na hyasatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7950: na cāsyāpādānatvaṃ nāpyadhikaraṇatvaṃ yena pañcamī vā saptamī vā prayujyeteti āha---na cāsatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7951: na cāsato vipakṣād vyāvṛttyabhāvena viśeṣo 'pītyāha---vipakṣāsaṃbhave ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:7954: pakṣasyaiva dharma iti hetulakṣaṇe asādhāraṇa eva hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7955: samāna eva siddha iti tu hetulakṣaṇe aśvasya viṣāṇitve sādhye gotvādirhetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7957: tathā ca pakṣasya dharmaḥ samāne ca siddhaḥ ityatra savyabhicāro hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7958: pakṣasya dharmo vipakṣe ca nāstītyatrāsādhāraṇo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:7959: samāne ca siddho vipakṣe ca nāstītyatra anityaḥ paramāṇuḥ kṛtakatvāditi hetuḥ syāditi trayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7962: atra dignāgena sapakṣe sannasan dvedhā pakṣadharmaḥ punastridhā /
GSP29nystik_u:7964: iti nava pakṣadharmān hetutadābhāsān darśayitvā tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā cāsaṃstadatyaye /
GSP29nystik_u:7968: yaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ sa sapakṣe san asan dvedhā iti trividhaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:7969: sa punarasapakṣe sadasaddvividhatvataḥ pratyekaṃ tridhā bhavatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:7980: tadeteṣu hetutadābhāseṣu heturnirdhārito yena tadupanyasya vārttikakāro vyācaṣṭe---tatra ya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:7982: tatra yaḥ san sajātīye dvedhā cāsaṃstadatyaye ityetāvanmātrāt na labhyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:7995: hetuhetvābhāsāveva pakṣadharmau nānya iti niyamajñāpanārthamavadhāraṇamiṣṭaṃ bhavadbhirityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8004: yadyavadhāraṇaṃ yujyeta avadhāraṇārtho yukta ārambhaḥ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8007: pakṣasya dharma eva ityetasmin pada ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8012: sajātīye dvedhā ceti padopādāne cānupādāne cetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8013: sajātīya eva dvidhetyanenaiveti hetutadābhāsayorautsargike pakṣadharmatve sthita ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8014: śaṅkate---atha mā bhūditi sajātīya eva dvidheti nāvadhāraṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8021: yadi ca tadatyaya eveti nāvadhāryeta tato 'naikāntiko 'pi hetuḥ syāditi doṣaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8028: tadaṃśena vyāpta ityasya vivaraṇālocanena sapakṣe sattvaṃ vipakṣācca vyāvṛttirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8039: yastu tādṛśavinābhāvīti vipakṣe sattāpratiṣedhāt sapakṣe sattvaṃ gamyate eva,
GSP29nystik_u:8046: vauddhānāṃ rūpatvādijāternityāyā abhāvād na cākṣuṣatvamanityatvena vinā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8048: tathā copadarśanapadena pakṣe hetoḥ sattopadarśanaṃ bhavatīti taṃ pratyupetyāha---upetya veti /
GSP29nystik_u:8052: prayatnanāntarīyakatvaṃ prayatnakāraṇakatvaṃ tat sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā?
GSP29nystik_u:8061: yat tāvadupalabdhikarma tatsarvaṃ prayatnādeva puruṣavyāpādādevopalabhyate nānyathetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8074: prāyeṇa tasya tatra tatra sulabhatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8079: na hi bhavatāmasmākamiva viśeṣātiriktamasti sāmānyaṃ vastu sad yo hetuḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8080: na ca kalpanāropitaṃ hetuḥ samyagjñānasya bhavitumarhati,
GSP29nystik_u:8088: yasya tu janmaiva nāsti tasya tadviśeṣaṇaṃ dūrotsāritamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8091: tasyāpi hi prāgasataḥ savakāraṇena samavāya iti janma nāstīti na tadviśeṣaṇayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8098: dṛṣṭānto 'rtharūpo nodāharaṇasya vacanātmakasya svarūpato lakṣaṇaṃ saṃbhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8099: tasmāt svābhidhāyakavacanopalakṣakatvena lakṣaṇatvaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ ca bhajata ityabhisandhinoktam---udāharaṇopalakṣaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8100: anena ca samānajātīyebhyaḥ pratijñādibhyaḥ asamānajātīyebhyaśca pramāṇādibhya udāharaṇaṃ vyavacchinnaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8106: kaddhyanityatvena sādhye ca śabde dṛṣṭānte ca sthālpādau samānam /
GSP29nystik_u:8108: taddharmabhāvī tasyaiva sādhyasya śabdasya yo dharmo dharmāntaram,
GSP29nystik_u:8115: tatra vārttikakāraḥ sūtrapadaṃ vyācakṣāṇa eva phalato bhāṣyaṃ vyācaṣṭe---sādhyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8126: avadhāraṇadvayayoginaḥ sādhyasādharmyād dṛṣṭānto 'vaśyameva taddharmabhāvī bhavatīti gatārthaṃ taddharmabhāvītyetaditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8128: yathā nitye śabde sādhye amūrtatvādeḥ sādhyena śabdena karmaṇaḥ sādharmyāt karma na taddharmabhāvi bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8133: atra ca sādhyasādharmyagrahaṇena sādhanavikalamanudāharaṇaṃ bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8139: pañcamyupādānena ca sādhyasādharmyaprayuktaṃ taddharmabhāvitvaṃ yatra vacane pradarśyate tadevodāharaṇaṃ nānyaditi darśitaṃ bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8140: prayojakatvaṃ ca sādhyasādharmyasya hetoḥ svābhāvikaḥ saṃbandho vyāpyatvamiti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:8145: yo yo 'nityaḥ sa sarva utpattimān yathā ghaṭa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8146: samākhyānirvacanasāmarthyāt sāmānyalakṣaṇamapyanena sūcitamityāśayavatā bhāṣyakṛtā samākhyāyā niruktiḥ kṛtā /
GSP29nystik_u:8156: tadetad bhāṣyam anubhāṣya vyācaṣṭe---tasya dharma iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8157: tasya dharmastaddharma iti hi dharmasya saṃbandhitvena pṛthagvacanam /
GSP29nystik_u:8161: anena bhāṣyakārīyāmanupapattimuktvā vārttikakāraḥ svakīyāmapyāha---dharme ca sādhya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8171: anuvṛttena pūrayitvā savyākhyānaṃ sūtraṃ paṭhati---sādhyavaidharmyādataddharmabhāvī ca dṛṣṭānta udāharaṇamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8172: sātmakatayā sādhyena jīvaccharīreṇa vaidhamyād ghaṭāderdṛṣṭāntasya sātmakatvasādharmyavirahāditi yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:8173: yasya sādhyasya jīvaccharīrasya dharmaḥ prāṇādimattvaṃ taddharmaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8188: tatra tatpūrvakatvād vaidharmyapratīteḥ ṛjumārgeṇa sidhyato 'rthasya vakreṇa sādhanāyogāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8191: anyathā sapakṣaikadeśavartī na hetuḥ syāditi manyamāno vārtikakāra āha---udāharaṇamavītahetāviti /
GSP29nystik_u:8193: atra ācāryadeśīyāṇām anārṣasūtrapāṭhadūṣaṇaṃ nāsmākamārṣasūtrapāṭhe 'stiti pratipipādayiṣurācāryadeśīyānāṃ pāṭhamabhiprāyaṃ cāha---anye tviti
GSP29nystik_u:8207: na ca jñāpanādanyā kriyā saṃbhavatīti gamakatvam /
GSP29nystik_u:8210: anye tu taddharmabhāvītyetad vikalpya dūṣayantītyāha---anye tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:8213: tasmāt na kiñcidetat taddharmaṃ bhāvayituṃ śīlamasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8217: tadidaṃ pareṣāṃ dūṣaṇaṃ daṇḍinyāyamālambya pariharati---na vaktavyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8221: sā ca bahuvrīhiṇai labhyata iti kṛtamatreninetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8224: atra ca vasubandhunā pratijñādayastrayo 'vayavā durvihitā akṣapādalakṣaṇenetyuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:8226: tadevamudāharaṇalakṣaṇamupapādya pareṣāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayitumupanyasya vyācaṣṭe---yathā siddha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8227: yathā ca sa eva sādhyo viśiṣṭaḥ pratyayabhedabheditveneti,
GSP29nystik_u:8231: prāgabhāvo hi sthālyāḥ kṛtakatvaṃ pradhvaṃsābhāvaścānityatā rāddhānte bauddhānām /
GSP29nystik_u:8237: asmadrāddhānte tu yathā tayoḥ sthālyādau saṃbhavaḥ tathoktaṃ hetulakṣaṇasūtra iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8239: NyS_1,1.38: udāharaṇāpekṣaḥ tathā iti upasaṃhāraḥ na tathā iti vā sādhyasya upanayaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8240: svapratipattau vyāptismaraṇānantaraṃ tathā cāyaṃ na tatheti vā parāmarśajñānotpādādudāharaṇavacanasya
GSP29nystik_u:8252: tathā cānupapannaḥ sādhyasyopasaṃhāra ityata uktam---sādhyasya śabdasyotpattidharmakatvamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8255: tathā na tatheti sāmānyalakṣaṇāpekṣe viśeṣalakṣaṇe iti bodhyavyam //
GSP29nystik_u:8256: atra kecit āhuḥ hetuvacanādeva sodāharaṇāt sādhyasiddherasādhanāṅgamupanaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8259: tadanena vyutpannāvyutpannatayā pareṣāmaniyatapratipattisādhanatvāt svapratipattyanusāreṇa pare bodhayitavyāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8269: tathāpi tannāsiddhaṃ tatra sādhanatvena vyavatiṣṭhata iti svasiddhimākṣipati sāmarthyāditi bhāva /
GSP29nystik_u:8271: yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti śābdāḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8274: asyāpi sādhanasāmarthyādākṣepāt avyāptasya sādhanatvāyogāt tadvidhasyāpi prameyatvādeḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8279: sādharmyeṇa vaidharmyeṇa dvividhānāmapi hetūdāharaṇopanayānāṃ samānaṃ nigamanalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8281: hetvapadeśāt taddhetukam anityaḥ śabda iti pratijñāyā punarvacanam /
GSP29nystik_u:8285: tasyaiva nigamane siddhatvamityavasthāvantamekamāśritya samānaviṣayatayā nigamanaṃ pratijñetyupacaryate /
GSP29nystik_u:8290: atra prathamasūtravadeva yathāsvamavayaveṣu pramāṇānāṃ paramanyāyaṃ stotuṃ saṃbhavamāha---avayavasamudāye ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:8302: sādhyasādhanayoḥ pratibandhaṃ saṃdṛśya samyag dṛṣṭvā liṅgasya pratīteḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8304: tathāpi tadekadeśe madhyame 'pi liṅgadarśane samudāyopacārādanumānavyapadeśa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8306: kasmāt? dṛṣṭena udāharaṇe pratibandhena adṛṣṭasya sādhyadharmiṇyanumeyasya siddheḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8310: pratijñādīnāmupanayāntānāmeko 'rthaḥ svabhāvapratibaddhaṃ liṅgaṃ vā anumeyaṃ vā,
GSP29nystik_u:8320: taduttarakālaṃ hi sādhanākāṅkṣāyāṃ pratijñāmāśritya hetupadaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8326: avayavānāṃ prātisvikaṃ prayojanamuktamapi śiṣyahitatayā bhāṣyakāraḥ pratipādayati---atheti /
GSP29nystik_u:8329: vyavasthāpite tu na jāteravasara ityāha---vyavasthite hīti //
GSP29nystik_u:8332: tanmatam apākartuṃ vārttikakāraḥ saprayojanaṃ nigamanaṃ darśayati---pratijñāviṣayasyārthasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8333: caturbhiḥ khalvavayavairhetostrīṇi rūpāṇi dve vā pratipādite,
GSP29nystik_u:8335: pañcasaṃ vā caturṣu vā rūpeṣu hetoravinābhāvaḥ parisamāpyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8339: so 'yaṃ pratijñāviṣayārthasya aśeṣapramāṇamūlāvayavopapattau satyāṃ pratijñeyasyārthasya siddhatayā punarvacanena nigamanena pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8345: yathā ca trairūpyātiriktametadrūpadvayaṃ tathopapāditam asmābhiḥ prathamasūtre /
GSP29nystik_u:8347: etasmin sūtrārthe parasya pratijñāyāṃ nigamanaṃ gatārthaṃ manyamānasya avakāśo nāstīti //
GSP29nystik_u:8348: yastu manyeta na hetoravinābhāvasiddhimantareṇa siddhanirdeśo nigamanaṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8371: yacca paraiḥ upanaye dūṣaṇaṃ vikalpyābhyadhāyi tat tāvadupanyasyati---yadapi yathā tatheti /
GSP29nystik_u:8378: tasmāt sāmānyapratiṣedhe viśeṣapratiṣedhe ca kṛtakatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ pariśiṣyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8380: tathā ca na hetorvyatireka upanayaḥ syādityāha---pariśeṣāditi /
GSP29nystik_u:8386: sādhye śabde sādhanasya kṛtakatvasya sthālīgatasya yaḥ sarvathābhāvaḥ sthālītvādyekārthasamavāyaḥ tamāśritya na pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8387: tathā ca śabdasthālyoḥ abhedaprasaṅgād yathā tathetyeva na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8391: tathā ca na hetoratireka ityuktamityata āha---kṛtakatvasāmānyaṃ tviti /
GSP29nystik_u:8392: na hi jātu śāvaleyasannidhau gotvasāmānyamātraṃ bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8399: vyāptipradarśanaviṣayo dṛṣṭāntaḥ dṛṣṭāvyāptikasya hetoḥ sādhyadharmiṇyupasaṃhāra upanaya iti mahān bheda ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8400: etena nigamanaṃ pratijñāyāḥ samānābhidheyatve 'pi pratijñārthatvena pratyuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:8403: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa ekasminnanvayavyatirekiṇyeva vītāvītavākye pañcāvayave udāhṛte /
GSP29nystik_u:8404: tatra kadācid bhrāntiḥ syādekodāharaṇatayā dve api vākye parasparāpekṣe eveti,
GSP29nystik_u:8411: //40// tarkapravṛttikramamāha---avijñāyamānatattve 'rthe iti yadyapi saṃśayasya paścādeva jijñāsā bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8415: tarkeṇa hi prasaṅgāparanāmnā dvayoḥ pakṣayorekataraniṣedhenaikataraḥ pramāṇaviṣayatayā abhyanujñātavya iti viṣayapratyāsattyā tarkapravṛttiṃ pratyaṅgatā saṃśayasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8423: yasmin viṣaye pramāṇaṃ pravartitumudyataṃ tadviparyayāśaṅkāyāṃ na tāvat pramāṇaṃ pravartate,
GSP29nystik_u:8425: tadapanaya eva ca svaviṣaye pramāṇasaṃbhava iti copapattiriti vyākhyāyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8426: tayā pramāṇasyopapattyā itikartavyatayā pramāṇaviṣayamabhyanujānatyā viśodhite viṣaye pramāṇāmapratyūhaṃ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8427: na copapattirevāstu niścayahetuḥ kṛtaṃ pramāṇeneti vaktavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:8431: svakṛtasya karmaṇa ityādinā pūrvasya kāraṇamityantena saṃsāro darśitaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8433: tena saṃsārāpavargāvicchantau vādiprativādinau prati ātmanityatvaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaṃ
GSP29nystik_u:8434: pravartamānamanena tarkeṇānugṛhyata iti pramāṇaviṣayaviparyayānanujñaiva ca pramāṇaviṣayābhyanujñā,
GSP29nystik_u:8436: ata evānte bhāṣyakāra upasaṃjahāra---yatra kāraṇam anupapadyamānaṃ paśyati,
GSP29nystik_u:8440: kathaṃ punarayaṃ tattvajñānārtho na tu tattvajñānameveteti deśayati---kathaṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:8447: hanta bhoḥ kimarthaṃ tarhi vāde pramāṇatarkasādhanetyuktamityata āha---so 'yaṃ tarka iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8454: tathāpi na kāraṇopapattita iti tayorvyavaccheda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8467: na tvatra hetuḥ abhidhīyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8470: jñeyena hi jñānaṃ nirūpyate na jñātrā,
GSP29nystik_u:8475: nādyāpi anena svābhiprāyo darśita iti mattvā punaścodayati---anukte 'pīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8478: sāmarthyaprāptasyānabhidhāne 'tiprasaṅga iti na sāmarthyamāśritya lakṣaṇe saṃśayo nirākaraṇīya iti tannirākaraṇārthamarthagrahaṇaṃ kartavyamiti
GSP29nystik_u:8480: na hi tattve jñāte tattvajñānārthitā bhavati /
GSP29nystik_u:8486: yadyapi nāsmākaṃ rāddhānte śuśrūṣādayo buddhidharmā buddhitattvasyaivābhāvāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8491: tato vijñāte 'pi tattve ya ūhaḥ pūrvānubhūtaparicchedātmā jāyate punastattvajñānārthaṃ so 'pi tarkaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8495: tathā hi adhigataparicchedātmāpyūhaḥ kāraṇasyopapattyā saṃbhavena jāyate,
GSP29nystik_u:8498: tathā ca sati pramāṇamapi tarkaḥ syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8509: nityatvādayo viśeṣāḥ samavāyino vahnyādayaśca dhūmādisaṃyogina iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8513: anye tvanumānameva yuktyapekṣaṃ viparyaye 'niṣṭaprasaṅgāpekṣaṃ tarka iti varṇayanti /
GSP29nystik_u:8517: viśeṣadarśanāditi viśeṣadarśanāt niścayaḥ pramāṇena bhavati na tarkeṇa,
GSP29nystik_u:8521: tarhi tasya svarūpaṃ vaktavyamiti pṛcchati---kiṃ punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:8533: nanu yadeva kiścit svaviṣayādhigame anumānamapekṣate saivāpekṣaṇīyā yuktiranumānasya bhaviṣyatītyata āha---svaviṣayadhigame ceti //
GSP29nystik_u:8542: anumānabhedasya cedṛśasya pramāṇa evāntarbhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8549: yuktaṃ vyatirekiṇi jīvaccharīre dharmiṇi prāṇādimattvasya sādhanadharmasya darśanāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8551: na saṃsārāpavargāvupapatsyetāmityatrātmani dharmiṇi sādhanadharma utpattirasti yaddarśanataḥ saṃskārodbodhe sati liṅgaliṅgisaṃbandhasmṛtirbhavedityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8561: nirṇayabhedalakṣaṇamiti nāvyāpakaṃ tatra tallakṣaṇamiti darśayituṃ bhāṣyakāro nirṇayalakṣaṇamavatārayati---etasmiśca tarkaviṣaye //
GSP29nystik_u:8562: vimṛ---yaḥ //42 // atra pakṣapratipakṣayoḥ karmatayā na nirṇayasādhanatvamityanupapattyā
GSP29nystik_u:8563: sādhanopālambhau vādasūtragatau lakṣaṇīyaviti tāveva tāvad bhāṣyakṛd vibhajate---sthāpanā sādhanam,
GSP29nystik_u:8573: tasya sādhanasya vā upālambhasya vā yo 'rthaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣo vā tasyāvadhāraṇamityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8574: atra pakṣapratipakṣaprayogād vāde saṃśayo 'stīti vādabhrāntyā codayati---nedamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8577: dvitīyasya prativādinaḥ pratiṣiddhaṃ pratiṣedhaṃ vādyuktasya hetordūṣaṇamiti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:8579: dvitīyena tu prativādinā vādyuktasya hetoḥ sthāpanāhetutvaṃ pratiṣidhyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8581: sa vādino vā prativādino vā heturvopālambho vā nivartate /
GSP29nystik_u:8586: na tāvat saṃśayaviṣaye nirṇaye vādiprativādinau staḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8589: vādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavaḥ prativādina upālambhasya asaṃbhavaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8590: evaṃ prativādinaḥ sādhanasya saṃbhavo vādina upālambhasyāsaṃbhava iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8597: na nirṇayamātrasyedaṃ lakṣaṇamapi tu parīkṣāviṣayasyetyāha---na cāyaṃ nirṇaya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8600: na hi jyotiṣṭomādīnāṃ svargādisaṃbandhanirṇaye āgamena kartavye vimarśo 'sti,
GSP29nystik_u:8608: nanu bhavatu pakṣaśabdalakṣitasya sādhanasya nirṇayaṃ prati karaṇatvam,
GSP29nystik_u:8609: pratipakṣalakṣitasya tu taddūṣaṇasya na sākṣātsādhakatvamityata āha---pratipakṣācceti hetutvaṃ pāramparyeṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8614: tadā hi yata evakāraḥ tato 'nyatrāvadhāraṇamiti nirṇaye niyamo bhavet /
GSP29nystik_u:8620: tasmin vikalpe nirṇayaḥ pakṣapratipakṣavimarśātilaṅghanenānyatra na pravartata iti pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ nirṇayaphalaṃ na syāt /
GSP29nystik_u:8622: nāpi vimarśa iti pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ bādhyate ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8626: tadā nirṇayasyāniyamāt pakṣapratipakṣau ca tadabhāvaśceti tadubhayam,
GSP29nystik_u:8632: na nirṇaya iti na nirṇayamātra ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8636: pakṣapratipakṣābhyāmeva vāde nirṇayo na tu vimarśaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8637: śāstre tu nirṇaya eva na tu tatra śāstrātiriktaṃ sādhanāntaramāśrīyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8639: lakṣaṇāyāṃ hi yena yat lakṣyate tadavacchedakatayā tadapi buddhau sannidhīyate /
GSP29nystik_u:8655: kadācit prathame kadācid dvitīye kadācit tṛtīye ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8659: taṃ nivartyaṃ vādinaḥ sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇena nivartya prativādī svapakṣe sādhanaṃ bravīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8671: na ca phale pramitirūpe nirṇaye pramākaraṇatvaṃ phalatve nāstīti nānumānatvaṃ tadviśeṣa
GSP29nystik_u:8673: itaścānumānāt nirṇayo bhidyate ityāha--nirṇayaḥ svaviṣaya eveti na hi nirṇayo nirṇayatvena pratipattyanubandhibhūtād viṣayādanyatra,
GSP29nystik_u:8676: yadā tu dhūmajñānenāgniranumīyate tadānyatra ceti gamayitavyam /
GSP29nystik_u:8678: NyS_1,2.1: pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pañcāvayavopapannaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraho vādaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:8681: uddeśakramaprāptaṃ vādalakṣaṇaparaṃ sūtram avatārayituṃ bhāṣyam---tisraḥ kathā bhavantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8685: vādādayaśca kathāviśeṣā ityata āha vārttikakāraḥ---tisraḥ kathā bhavantīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8688: api tu yannānāpravaktṛke vicāre vasati tad vicāravastu /
GSP29nystik_u:8690: tasyāḥ kathāyā eṣa niyamaḥ tisra eveti /
GSP29nystik_u:8691: tathā ca nānāpravaktṛkavicāraviṣayā vākyasaṃdṛbdhiḥ katheti sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraha
GSP29nystik_u:8711: tathāpi na pramāṇamūlairavayavaistarkeṇa ca sādhanopālambhāviti jalpavitaṇḍabhyāṃ pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambhagrahaṇena vyavacchedaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8715: tarkasyetikarttavyatārūpasya pramāṇānugrāhakatayā pramāṇamūlā avayavāstarkamūlā api bhavanti /
GSP29nystik_u:8716: tathā ca tarkasyāpi sādhanopālambhahetubhāvaḥ siddho bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8732: dharmī dharmaviśiṣṭaḥ pakṣaḥ pratipakṣo vā karma,
GSP29nystik_u:8734: tasya dharmiṇo vāstavaṃ tādṛśatvamatādṛśatvaṃ vā karaṇasya tu karmaiva viṣayaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8740: yathā ākāśe niśātamasiṃ vyāpārayataḥ puruṣasyāparādho nākāśasya śabde samarthasya,
GSP29nystik_u:8745: vacana upacaryate na tu pakṣe pakṣadvāreṇānudbhāvanāditi siddham /
GSP29nystik_u:8746: yathāyamarthaḥ sūtrapadebhyo labhyate tathā praśnapūrvakaṃ darśayati---kathaṃ punariti //
GSP29nystik_u:8757: tarkānugṛhītapramāṇamūlā avayavāḥ paramārthato bhavantu mā bhūvan,
GSP29nystik_u:8763: yathā cāsya śāstre vyutpādanaṃ nāsadṛśaṃ yathā caiṣa satāmācāraḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8768: upālambhagrahaṇādeva vāde 'pi nigrahasthānasya labdhatvādityata āha vārttikakāraḥ---chalajātīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8773: hanta bho na jalpād vādasya viśeṣaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8782: bhāṣyamate dūṣite pṛṣṭvā svamatena vyācaṣṭe---atha kimidaṃ padamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:8786: adhikaṃ tu na yadyapi tattvapratipattiṃ sākṣād
GSP29nystik_u:8787: vyāhanti, tathāpi tatprayojanānusaraṇe paraḥ pratipattā samākulitabuddhirna tattvaṃ pratipattumarhatītyadhikasyāpi tattvapratipattividhātahetutvamiti
GSP29nystik_u:8795: pāramārthikāt tarkasahitāt pramāṇādekasmin viṣaye sādhanopālambhayoḥ saṃbhave viruddhadharmasamāliṅgitamekadā vastu prasajyata
GSP29nystik_u:8798: vāde 'bhiprāyo niyamyate vādiprativādinoḥ prāmāṇikadhiyā sādhanopālambhau tābhyāṃ prayoktavyau,
GSP29nystik_u:8802: tathā ca vāde abuddhipūrvaṃ chalādiprayoge tadudbhāvanamapi saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8809: na hi pañcāvayavopapannatvaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca tadanugrāhakaṃ ca tarkamantareṇa bhavatīti
GSP29nystik_u:8812: anyathaikaḥ svasthānasthita eva śabdasyānityatvaṃ prati pañcāvayavopapannaṃ vākyaṃ prayuṅkte,
GSP29nystik_u:8813: aparo 'pi tādṛśaḥ śabdanityatā prati tādṛśameva vākyaṃ prayuṅkte iti so 'pi vādaḥ prasajyeta /
GSP29nystik_u:8825: jalpagataśca nigraho na vāda iti sa mā vijñāyati /
GSP29nystik_u:8829: tadevaṃ svābhimataṃ vādalakṣaṇaṃ vyākhyāya vāsubandhavaṃ lakṣaṇa dūṣayitumupanyasyati---apare tviti svapakṣasya siddhiḥ parapakṣasya cāsiddhiḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:8835: ekasya vā śabdasya dharmino 'nekanityānityaviśeṣaṇābhisaṃbandhinaḥ puruṣābhisandhibhedāt anekaśabdābhidhānam,
GSP29nystik_u:8838: tāvad bhūmidhanādiṣviva svocitāsu arthakriyāsu yatheṣṭaviniyogayogyatvaṃ svatvamarjanāpāditamanityatvādinā pratijñāte śabdādau saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:8845: api copakārakatvena vyāptaṃ satvaṃ goghaṭādiṣu tathā darśanāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8846: pakṣāt nivartamānamupakārakatvaṃ svatvamapi svavpāpyaṃ nivartayati vṛkṣatvamiva śiṃśapātvamityāha---yacca yasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8850: api cedaṃ viśeṣaṇapadaṃ viśeṣyaṃ sāmānyataḥ prasṛtaṃ viśeṣe 'vasthāpayati na vā?
GSP29nystik_u:8856: tataśca śaknoti samānamarthaṃ vaktumiti codayati---sāmānyaśabdā apīti /
GSP29nystik_u:8859: varuddhopadarśanena sphuṭā pratītirbhavatīti ayuktapratipādanārthaṃ yuktasyāpyupanyāsa iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8860: yadi na pakṣeṇa dūṣaṇaṃ saṃbadhyate kastarhi tasya viṣaya iti śaṅkate---atha dūṣaṇasyeti /
GSP29nystik_u:8873: lakṣaṇe tato varamevaṃ kriyatāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ lāghavāyetyāha---yadi ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:8887: iti sūtre hi niyameva svapakṣe sādhanaṃ parapakṣe dūṣaṇamuktam,
GSP29nystik_u:8892: api cāyuktasya pūrvapakṣasya sādhaṇaṃ yuktasya cottarapakṣasya dūṣaṇamiti viparītaprasaṅga
GSP29nystik_u:8902: na kevalaṃ viśeṣyāt pṛthak svārtho viśeṣaṇaṃ nāvadhāryate,
GSP29nystik_u:8905: na kevalaṃ patyurviśeṣyāt senā na bhidyate 'pi tu tato 'nyebhyo 'pi hāstikāśvīyarathapadātibhya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8910: uktaṃ nismṛtya śaṅkatī---atha manyase svārtha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8914: api ca svaḥ pakṣo yasya sādhayituḥ sa tathoktaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8921: api ca pakṣāt svapakṣabhede sūtrāntaravyāghāto 'bhede vā etasya vyāghāta
GSP29nystik_u:8923: api ca vākyasamāsayoḥ samāso jyāyān lāghavādityāha---āstāṃ tāvaditi /
GSP29nystik_u:8925: siddhyasiddhyarthamityayaṃ samāsaḥ svaparapakṣayoḥ pratyekaṃ na saṃbandhārtha ityarthāt kasyacit siddhiḥ kasyacidasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8930: anityatve 'pi samāsavidheḥ samāsa eva vigrahāt jyāyāniti codyasamādhānābhyāṃ darśayati---anitya iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8935: akke cenmadhu vindeta kimarthaṃ parvataṃ vrajet /
GSP29nystik_u:8937: iti atarthakaprayogaścānapekṣitaḥ śiṣyairiti teṣāmaśāsanāt na śāstraṃ syāt,
GSP29nystik_u:8949: na tāvat jñānaṃ pakṣaviṣayaṃ prāśnikādhikaraṇaṃ ceti bauddharāddhānte saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:8959: yasmāt so 'rthastathā bhavati tasmāt tathābhāvādadhikaraṇapratyāyanaṃ bhavatīti dvitīyaṃ kalpamāśaṅkate---athāsiddha iti /
GSP29nystik_u:8960: yāvat pakṣaviṣayaṃ sādhanaṃ na prayujyate tāvadyadyadhikaraṇapratyāyanaṃ tataḥ sādhanaprayogāt prāgadhikaraṇapratyāyanamastīti vādavaiyarthaṃ sādhanadūṣaṇaprayogo 'narthakaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8966: mañcasthāḥ krośantīti vaktavye vināpi prayojanaṃ mañcāḥ krośantītyupacāro dṛṣṭa ityata
GSP29nystik_u:8969: nanvihāpi vināpi prayojanaṃ pramāṇāsaṃbhavamātreṇopacāro mañcāḥ krośantītivadbhaviṣyatītyata āda---lokaprayukteti lokaprayuktaśabdārthavat /
GSP29nystik_u:8970: upacāro 'pi laukiko na prayojanābhāvena śakyo 'pavadituṃ na lokaḥ paryanuyojyo yataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8971: idānīntanastu asmadādiprayogaḥ prayojanābhāve na śakyaḥ paryanuyoktumityāśayenāha---na cedaṃ laukikamiti //
GSP29nystik_u:8978: yataḥ tayoḥ pakṣadharmatvāt etadbhavati siddhaḥ pakṣo 'siddhaśceti /
GSP29nystik_u:8981: naiva draṣṭrādhāratā jñānasya viṣayatā ca bauddharāddhānte saṃbhavatīti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:8983: asti khalvālayajñānaṃ yadupāśritya ṣaḍapi pravṛttijñānāni jāyante /
GSP29nystik_u:8996: punaḥ śaṅkate---atha tathātathāne iti pramāṇayoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9002: tathāpi prameyasya prādhānyāt tatraivābhidhānapratyayāviti prameyadharmāvucyete vyaktyavyaktī,
GSP29nystik_u:9007: iha sūtre dhananimittādivacanatārthaśabdasya na saṃbhavatīti trayamavaśiṣyata iti tredhā pravartata ityuktam /
GSP29nystik_u:9008: sādhanaṃ sādhanābhāso dūṣaṇaṃ dūṣaṇābhāsa iti caturvidhaṃ vākyam /
GSP29nystik_u:9011: granthāntare yuktāyuktatvena viśeṣaṇāt caturvidhavākyasaṃgrahārtho hyuddeśe arthaśabdo vyākhyātaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9012: na ca yuktāyuktatvaviśeṣaṇe caturvidhavākyasaṃgraho bhavati sādhanābhāsasaṃbandhinaḥ pakṣasya yuktatvābhāvāt dūṣaṇābhāsaṃbandhinaśca pratipakṣasyāyuktatvābhāvādityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:9013: atha na sādhanādiyogo 'pi tu sādhyadharma eva sādhanānapekṣo yuktāyuktatvamiti śaṅkate---atha punariti /
GSP29nystik_u:9020: tathāpi karma karaṇaṃ na saṃbhavatīti vyāghāta ityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9025: na hi vahniriti gṛhītaḥ khadyoto dahati pacati vetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9035: na hi siddhirdhanaṃ vā svaparapakṣayoḥ sādhanaṃ vā nivṛttirvā saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9044: avācakapadaprayogāt sādhanadūṣaṇābhāsavādinaśca vāditvena lokasiddhasyāvāditvāpādanāt siddhyasiddhiśabdayośca vādatvāpādanārthatvādityarthaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:9049: pakṣavyatirekeṇaṃ pakṣādhāraṃ sādhyaṃ jñānamanyad vā siddhiśabdābhidheyaṃ saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:9051: pakṣasya tu bhavet kenacit saṃbandhena yādṛśatādṛśenetyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9056: api ca yuktāyuktārthābhyāmabhede sādhanadūṣaṇapadamanarthakaṃ te ityanenaiva yuktāyuktatvāvamarṣiṇā gatārthatvādityāha---yuktāyuktatvaśabdābhyāṃ ceti /
GSP29nystik_u:9060: sādhanadūṣaṇe ca viśeṣa iti śaṅkate---atha manyase iti /
GSP29nystik_u:9064: na khalu yogo nāma bauddhānāṃ sādhyasādhanavṛttirdūṣyadūṣaṇavṛttirvā kaścidastītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9065: api ca sāṃvṛto 'pi yogaḥ sādhyasādhanajñānādhīnanirūpaṇatayā nānirūpite sādhye nirūpito bhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:9066: nirūpaṇaṃ ca nirṇaya iti yoganirūpaṇāt prāk sādhyanirṇayāt kṛtaṃ yoganirūpaṇena sādhyanirṇayārtheneti /
GSP29nystik_u:9071: yuktāyuktatvenādhikaraṇapratyāyanamiti yuktāyuktatvayoḥ karaṇatvaṃ darśitam tat tathātvātathātvapakṣe na saṃbhavati,
GSP29nystik_u:9074: na tu vyavacchedasya paricchedasya sādhane iti //
GSP29nystik_u:9084: na khalvādhyātmikaśaktisaṃpannaḥ samāhitaḥ samagre sādhanaprayoge sati santamarthaṃ na pratipadyata iti saṃbhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9092: na cāyamunajñāniṣedho na pratipadyate iti vāde vītarāgakathātvena jigīṣāyā abhāvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9099: vādasya jalpavitaṇḍābhyāmabhedam abhipretya codayati---yadā tu nāyamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:9108: sūtroktaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ vṛttau āha---tadarthaṃ vacanaṃ siddhyasiddhyarthamityarthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9111: prāśnikā eva tāvad vāde na santi,
GSP29nystik_u:9121: mā bhūd gardabho 'pi dhūmasya kāraṇamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9122: codayati, yadi prāśnikā na santi tadvāda iti /
GSP29nystik_u:9123: tayorvādiprativādinorvādasya parīkṣā kā kasya ca tayorvādasya kva ca,
GSP29nystik_u:9126: vītarāgau hi vādiprativādināveva vādasvarūpajñānaṃ ca tatparīkṣāṃ ca kartuṃ śaknutaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9131: tadarthaṃ parīkṣārthaṃ tasmin vāde 'dhikāro vītarāgayoreva vādiprativādinoḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9133: tasmāt saptamyartho 'dhikaraṇārthaḥ parābhimataḥ prāśnika iti yāvat /
GSP29nystik_u:9135: yadapi vṛttau coditaṃ yadi siddhyasiddhyarthaṃ vacanaṃ vādaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9136: tataḥ prāśnikaprativādinoḥ priyāpriyavacasi rathyāvāde prasaṅga iti tadapyatinirbījamityāha---yadapīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9137: na hi priyāpriyavacasaḥ sākṣāt pāramparyeṇa vā siddhyasiddhyarthatā,
GSP29nystik_u:9150: seyaṃ sūkṣmekṣikā parairiha kṛteti tadanubandhena vārttikakṛtāpi kṛteti//1 //
GSP29nystik_u:9153: atrāpi samānajātīyābhyāṃ vādavitaṇḍābhyāmasamānajātīyebhyaḥ pramāṇādibhyo vyavacchedo jalpasya sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9164: api tu tadarthe pratīte tasyānyataḥ siddhau satyāṃ gamyata iti pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha ityetadatidiśyata
GSP29nystik_u:9166: tena pramāṇatarkasādhanopālambha pañcāvayavopapannaḥ siddhāntāviruddhaḥ pakṣapratipakṣaparigraha ityetasya vādapadavarjaṃ samastasya lakṣaṇasyātideśaḥ
GSP29nystik_u:9175: yathā gobhiryukto ratho goratha iti yuktapadalopa
GSP29nystik_u:9178: iha vādalakṣaṇaṃ paṭhatā bhāṣyakāreṇa niyamo 'pyatidiṣṭa iti manvānaścodayati---bhāṣyam
GSP29nystik_u:9184: atra bhāṣyakāreṇa chalādīnāṃ niṣedhārthatayā sādhanāṅgabhāvamākṣipya parapakṣavighātena svapakṣarakṣaṇādaṅgabhāva
GSP29nystik_u:9193: na hi sahasreṇāpyandhaiḥ pāṭaccarebhyo gṛhaṃ rakṣyata ityarthaḥ //
GSP29nystik_u:9197: tathāpi teṣāṃ tattvam avidvān ebhirahaṃ sādhanaṃ vihaniṣyāmītyanayā buddhyā upahṛtaḥ vyāmohitaḥ pravartate /
GSP29nystik_u:9199: yatra tveṣāṃ tattvaṃ vidvān pravartate, na sa vādaḥ,
GSP29nystik_u:9202: nanu jalpavitaṇḍayoḥ prayogāt sādhanamaṅgaṃ vā syādata
GSP29nystik_u:9207: sādhusādhanopādāne ca vādinā kṛte pareṇa prativādinā jigīṣuṇākulitabuddhirdrāk pāramārthikamuttaramapratipadyamānaścchalādīni prayuṅkte /
GSP29nystik_u:9221: pūrvavādipakṣāpekṣayā prativādina ātmīya eva pakṣaḥ pratipakṣaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9228: tayorekataraṃ prativādī ātmīyaṃ pakṣaṃ na sthāyapatīti /
GSP29nystik_u:9238: prathamapakṣavādino hi sthāpanāyā abhāve kiṃ vaitaṇḍika
GSP29nystik_u:9239: āhanti? na ca pakṣaḥ śakya āhantum /
GSP29nystik_u:9240: tasmāt prathamapakṣavādino 'sti sthāpaneti dvitīya eva pakṣaḥ sthāpanāhīna iti samārthyād yuktamiti /
GSP29nystik_u:9246: vaitaṇḍiko 'pi hi vādī pāriśeṣyāt matpakṣaḥ setsyatīti buddhyā svapakṣamasthāpayan parapakṣasthāpanāmāhanti /
GSP29nystik_u:9247: tasmāt parapakṣapratiṣedhalakṣaṇaṃ vākyam asya pakṣaḥ parapakṣaniṣedhena pāriśeṣyāt pakṣasiddhihetutvādupacārataḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9258: na tāvadasthāpyamānasyāpi sthāpanārhatālakṣaṇā pakṣatā na yujyate,
GSP29nystik_u:9261: tathā ca caturvargābhyupagame virodho 'nabhyupagame vā nāyaṃ laukiko na parīkṣaka iti prasaṅga iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP29nystik_u:9263: yastu manyate caturvargābhyupagame 'pi dūṣaṇamātraṃ vitaṇḍetyeva vaktavyaṃ lāghavāyeti,
